bar.Name: AIR BAR STOOL, SOLD IN SETS OF 2
bar.Body: Air Bar Stool is produced with a single injection of polypropylene reinforced with glass fiber obtained by means of the latest generation of air moulding technology. Available in a variety of colors, maintenance free and suitable for any outdoor use.

bar.Name: AIR COUNTER STOOL/ORANGE, SOLD IN SETS OF 4
bar.Body: Air Counter Stool is produced with a single injection of polypropylene reinforced with glass fiber obtained by means of the latest generation of air moulding technology. Available in a variety of colors, maintenance free and suitable for any outdoor use.

bar.Name: ALLUX 59x31.5 BAR TABLE/ABSTRACT TEAK SLAT /PC ALUMINUM FRAME
bar.Body: ALLUX bar tables are highly practical 'high dining' solutions. This option uses irregularly shaped, smooth teak slats for an unusual and highly contemporary design dining look.

bar.Name: AMALFI 28 INCH ROUND BAR TABLE W/MESH TOP, EPOXY COATED STEEL
bar.Body: The Amalfi Bar Table is handcrafted from solid steel and and features a mesh top. Pair this table with bar stools for a luxurious backyard setting.

bar.Name: AMALFI BAR STOOL IN EPOXY COATED STEEL
bar.Body: The Amalfi Bar Stool is handcrafted in solid steel and features a bold square pattern on the back. A deep, soft cushion provides extra comfort while contrast piping back adds a touch of elegance to the chair.

bar.Name: BRICKELL COMMUNAL COUNTER HEIGHT TABLE WITH PIETRA TOP
bar.Body: Miamiâ€™s Brickell neighborhood bustles with a growing number of businesses and people, but never loses its historic and iconic feel. The Brickell collection also has a growing fan base for its classic appeal. The mid-century design features a modern low profile that keeps us coming back for more. The chair-back angles and elegant tapering lines are reminiscent of coveted Scandinavian styling. Brickell is a beautiful addition to any outdoor space.

bar.Name: COAST 71x24 BAR TABLE
bar.Body: Coastâ€™s combination of dynamic contemporary looks with worry-free, durable FSC certified teak makes this an ideal table for any outdoor entertaining area.

bar.Name: COAST TEAK BAR STOOL
bar.Body: A fusion of contemporary looks with practical utility, the Coast Bar Chair evokes a natural feel in any outdoor space. The waterproof sling material and mortise and tenon joined teak combine to create a luxury bar seating experience.

bar.Name: CORAL COUNTER HEIGHT CHAIR - GRAY
bar.Body: The Coral Counter Height Chair looks beautiful in any setting. The chair is designed in all-weather wicker. The weave is on a powder coated aluminum frame and the base is made of FSC certified Ipe timber.

bar.Name: CRANDON ARMLESS COUNTER STOOL WITH BACK
bar.Body: Powder-coated poetry is just what a patio needs. Meet the Crandon Collection. Architectural and versatile, it boasts a pleasing repetition of parallel lines that artfully frame the environment. Crandon Park in Miami is known for both its wild natural preserves, and planned recreational spaces. Whether your backyard is wild or tame, Crandon will welcome you into the outdoors to lean back on its beautifully angled cushions.

bar.Name: DAISY MAE SWIVEL BAR CHAIR
bar.Body: The DAISY chairs and seater chairs are inviting, comfortable, and fun to look at.  The rounded barrel style backrest comes in two distinct versions: DAISY RAE which has a hand-fitted rope backrest developed for outdoor use and DAISY MAE which has a meticulously handwoven wicker back. Each version is available in four distinct colors, allowing you to create unique patterns from soft and natural to bold and vibrant.  Three distinct leg options are offered for the DAISY dining chairs, depending on style and function: tapered aluminum legs, a swivel base or teak round legs. With its sturdy powder coat base, the swivel versions are great for outdoor clubs, rooftops or high wind areas.

bar.Name: FLIGHT BAR CHAIR WITH ARMS IN GRADE A SLING
bar.Body: The Flight Bar Chair has a welcoming seat height to ensure maximum comfort with a blend of simplicity and sophistication forged from cast and extruded aluminum. All-weather mesh offers excellent resistance to sunlight and moisture.

bar.Name: FREMONT 42 ROUND BAR TABLE WITH SOLID TOP/NO UMBRELLA HOLE
bar.Body: Brown Jordan introduces Fremont Tables, a collection that blends modern simplicity with formal elegance. Designed for outdoor use in any climate, Fremont's finely crafted powder coated aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

bar.Name: FREMONT 42 ROUND BAR UMBRELLA TABLE WITH SOLID  TOP
bar.Body: Brown Jordan introduces Fremont Tables, a collection that blends modern simplicity with formal elegance. Designed for outdoor use in any climate, Fremont's finely crafted powder coated aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

bar.Name: FREMONT SLING SWIVEL BALCONY CHAIR WITH GRADE A SLING
bar.Body: The Fremont Sling collection speaks to our customers' desire for luxury, function, and ease and instills a sense of warmth and comfort. The finely crafted aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

bar.Name: FREMONT SWIVEL BAR CHAIR WITH GRADE A SLING
bar.Body: The Fremont Sling collection speaks to our customers' desire for luxury, function, and ease and instills a sense of warmth and comfort. The finely crafted aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

bar.Name: FUSION BAR CHAIR IN BRONZE
bar.Body: This innovative and contemporary design evokes an attitude of couture furniture while it generates international appeal. Fusion features a uniform and textural pattern that weaves the entire form into a solid structure. In Bronze or Parchment color weave.

bar.Name: ILLUM 60x39.5 COUNTER HEIGHT TABLE / ALUMINUM BASE / CERAMIC TOP
bar.Body: The simplest designs are often the most elegant ones. The Illum counter height table, which is 13cm lower than the regular bar table, is a subtle style statement and makes the perfect setting for outdoor aperitifs, especially paired with our Tosca counter height chairs. The softly curved lines of the slender aluminium frame look more carved than moulded. The top is available in plantation teak from East-Java or numerous subtle shades of ceramic.

bar.Name: ILLUM 83.5x28 BAR TABLE / ALUMINUM BASE / CERAMIC TOP
bar.Body: The simplest designs are often the most elegant ones. The Illum counter height table, which is 13cm lower than the regular bar table, is a subtle style statement and makes the perfect setting for outdoor aperitifs, especially paired with our Tosca counter height chairs. The softly curved lines of the slender aluminium frame look more carved than moulded. The top is available in plantation teak from East-Java or numerous subtle shades of ceramic

bar.Name: KOS BAR CHAIR / TEAK
bar.Body: Basic chic with an excellent, well-studied seating comfort is the best way to describe the Kos collection. The combination of the broad slats and the pure but powerful design, reinvents teak in a modern, robust way. TribÃ¹ uses only the very best Javanese plantation wood for its teak outdoor furniture. Its quality is locally controlled by subsidiary TribÃ¹ Asia.

bar.Name: MACKINAC BAR STOOL WITH GRADE B FABRIC/SELF WELT
bar.Body: The Mackinac collection is suspended in a more innocent time. Enjoy simple pleasures within its open weave, deep seated comfort. The romantic styling of this collection is complemented by its bold woven framework and luxuriously comfortable seating.

bar.Name: MAD 33x33 BAR TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
bar.Body: With three sizes, the square design of the MAD bar tables bring versatility, style and comfort to your patio, balcony and bar. Available in bar or balcony height in sizes 33x33, 40x40 and 40x85, with 13 colors to choose from.

bar.Name: MAD BAR SIDE CHAIR / STANDARD COLOR
bar.Body: The MAD armless bar chair design complements the MAD tables as well as any table from our collection. Now with FUSION mix or match frame and slat colors for an almost endless array of design possibilities. 10 frame color options and 15 slat color options.

bar.Name: MAD BAR SIDE CHAIR / WHITE FRAME / CHARCOAL SLATS
bar.Body: The MAD armless bar chair design complements the MAD tables as well as any table from our collection. Now with FUSION mix or match frame and slat colors for an almost endless array of design possibilities. 10 frame color options and 15 slat color options.

bar.Name: MOOD BAR CHAIR / TEAK BASE
bar.Body: The airy design of the Mood collection and its warm combination of teak and handwoven backs will immediately create an intimate atmosphere on your patio. The rounded design of the durable teak gives the bar chair a warm and friendly tone. The weave in Tricord has a very soft touch, but can nevertheless defy all weather conditions. TribÃ¹ has developed a range of natural colours that fit in with any type of outdoor environment. The back cushions are available in various styles to match every taste.

bar.Name: NORM BAR STOOL
bar.Body: 18W x 18D x 30  -  The barstool has a way of initiating the telling of tales and the Loll modern outdoor barstool will fit that purpose well. This American made furniture will last for years even if the stories dont. Available in both bar height and counter height.

bar.Name: NORM COUNTER STOOL
bar.Body: 18W x 18D x 30  -  The barstool has a way of initiating the telling of tales and the Loll modern outdoor barstool will fit that purpose well. This American made furniture will last for years even if the stories dont. Available in both bar height and counter height.

bar.Name: O-ZON BAR CHAIR/EP STAINLESS/CAPPUCCINO BATYLINE
bar.Body: The O-ZON barstool is a combination of comfort and refinement. Offered in stainless steel and powder coated stainless frames with multiple color choices of batyline mesh fabric for the seat.

bar.Name: OPAL SWIVEL HI DINING CHAIR - BAR HEIGHT
bar.Body: The Opal HI Dining Chair is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to an elegant silver patina. Available in counter height.

bar.Name: OSCAR BAR STOOL GRADE A
bar.Body: Designed in collaboration with Ann Marie Vering, the Oscar Bar Stool is perfect for indoors or out. It's powder coated frame and multi-dimensional rope forms striking silhouette visible from all angles. It's striking design and plush cushions make it the best-in-class daybed for designer comfort. Available in all Brown Jordan finishes and fabric. Rope colors are Pebble and Coal.

bar.Name: PANAMA BARSTOOL IN BRONZE (MTO PRICE/QTY, 5 PC MIN)
bar.Body: Its special charm is created through the contrasts in its design: the linear form is made even more striking because of the gently curving lines. With its no frills form the furniture of the PANAMA Collection attractively represents the New Edge Design.

bar.Name: PARKWAY 36 INCH ROUND BAR TABLE / SOLID TOP (no umbrella hole)
bar.Body: The Parkway bar table is available with or without an umbrella hole to cater to various needs. Coordinate with any sling or cushion bar seating pieces for the perfect for outdoor gatherings during any season.

bar.Name: PARKWAY 36 SQ BAR TABLE W/SOLID ALUMINUM TOP/UMBRELLA HOLE
bar.Body: The Parkway bar table is available with or without an umbrella hole to cater to various needs. Coordinate with any sling or cushion bar seating pieces for the perfect for outdoor gatherings during any season.

bar.Name: PARKWAY FLEX SLING BAR CHAIR
bar.Body: The Parkway Bar Chair features an alluring mixture of clean, broad lines and smooth, arching curves. Parabolic seat and back are fashioned to contour to the shape of the body for comfort. Impeccable design and comfort while having a drink at the bar.

bar.Name: PARKWAY SERVING CART WITH GLASS TOP AND SHELF
bar.Body: Large wheels are added for convenient mobility. Three classy, spacious layers of glass tabletop. Smooth, sleek lines are hand forged from extruded aluminum.

bar.Name: PARKWAY SLING BAR CHAIR WITH GRADE A SLING
bar.Body: With its pure lines and precise geometry, Parkway Sling offers an inspired take on modernist design. The collection echoes superior ergonomics with a supple Parabolic sling that flexes and offers support. Multiple frame and sling colors options.

bar.Name: PASADENA SLING BARSTOOL W/ ARMS - GRADE B
bar.Body: Pasadena defines understated sophistication with its sleek profile. The collection frame features a smooth, flat aluminum extrusion that is gently curvilinear. Sweeping lines seen on the arms and back legs highlight the beauty of the chair's construction.

bar.Name: PORTSMOUTH PARTY BAR WITH UMBRELLA HOLE / STANDARD COLOR
bar.Body: Take entertaining to a new level with our Portsmouth Party Bar. Practical, functional and beautiful, it invites a party wherever it goes. Deep open shelves and a generous work area keeps the focus on the fun.

bar.Name: RICHMOND BALCONY RAIL TABLE
bar.Body: The Richmond Rail Table is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

bar.Name: RICHMOND COUNTER HEIGHT CHAIR
bar.Body: The Richmond Counter Height Chair is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

bar.Name: ROMA 42 INCH  ROUND BAR TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
bar.Body: Inspired by the city known for its great art, spectacular architecture and vivid sense of style, our Roma Collection has an easy elegance and just enough detail to create visual interest and give outdoor spaces a sophisticated lift.

bar.Name: SEASHELL BARSTOOL IN CHALK
bar.Body: Open shapes and breezy outlines are merged with comfort. The wide backrests are ergonomically designed, hugging the body comfortably in a timeless design.

bar.Name: SOFTSCAPE STRAP BAR CHAIR
bar.Body: Characterized transitional styling, Softscape represents the innovation and refined aesthetics for which Brown Jordan is known. Softscape reflects the needs and preferences of design enthusiasts who are creating stylish interior and exterior spaces.

bar.Name: STIZZY SWIVEL BAR CHAIR - PREMIUM FINISH
bar.Body:
MAMAGREEN furniture is designed for a luxurious casual lifestyle, where mind and body relax. Constantly evolving collections are developed to highly exacting standards, for maximum comfort and performance.

MAMAGREEN furniture is manufactured using a majority recycled or recyclable materials. More than 90% of the teak is carefully sourced from abandoned buildings, with the remainder coming from sustainably harvested teak. Selecting MAMAGREEN is making a conscious choice for style combined with durability.

Product concept, quality management, production process and materials selection all have the same goal: creating contemporary outdoor furniture, made to last in any outdoor environment

bar.Name: STIZZY SWIVEL BAR CHAIR / STAMSKIN / PC GALVANIZED STEEL
bar.Body: None

bar.Name: STRIPE BAR CHAIR/PC ALUMINUM FRAME AND TWITCHELL SLING
bar.Body: MAMAGREEN Stripe sling brings fun, vibrancy and design flair to any outdoor area. Comfortable and absolutely all-weather, choose from four of these nautically inspired, barcode spaced, color combinations, available across a complete range of styles.

bar.Name: SUNSET BAR (WSL)
bar.Body: The Sunset Bar is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

bar.Name: SWIM BAR STOOL WITH GRADE A SLING
bar.Body: The Swim collection represents a fresh, light and sporty perspective for outdoor and casual living spaces with its linear profile made of powder-coated aluminum frames and Versatex mesh taut sling upholstery.

bar.Name: SYM 50x25 PUB TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
bar.Body: The SYM Pub Table's unique design allows for a variety of creative seating options. Multicolor frames and panels provide just the right pop. Perfect with the SYM Bar stool but works with any bar height chair.

bar.Name: SYM BAR STOOL / STANDARD COLOR
bar.Body: Simple and versatile, the multi-color SYM Bar Stool is beautifully designed to match the SYM Pub Table but adds a modern touch to any bar setting. The back kick provides just the right amount of leanbackability not found in any other backless bar stool.

bar.Name: VENETIAN BAR CHAIR WITH SEAT CUSHION IN GRADE A FABRIC
bar.Body: The x-back and cross-stretcher on the Venetian chair are elegantly scaled by rectangular lines, including a subtly contoured back. Spiral details on the arms and architectural details on the legs are proportionately placed to enhance the overall balance.

bar.Name: WAVE SWIVEL BAR CHAIR WITH FLEX SLING
bar.Body: Constructed in extruded aluminum, its contoured seating surfaces twist in a ribbon-like profile, giving it a sense of motion and enhancing its shape. With its ergonomic seating it conforms to the range of human shapes, weights and also to movement.

bar.Name: XQI 79x28 TEAK BAR TABLE
bar.Body: Royal Botania XQI furniture includes a range of rectangular and square solid teak outdoor tables. The XQI understated contemporary design makes this first class teak patio furniture ideal for use in contemporary and more traditional surroundings.

bar.Name: XQI BAR CHAIR/TEAK FRAME/BLACK BATYLINE
bar.Body: Royal Botania XQI furniture includes a range of certified teak outdoor chairs. The XQI understated contemporary design makes this first class teak patio furniture ideal for use in contemporary and more traditional surroundings.

bar-tables.Body: With three sizes, the square design of the MAD bar tables bring versatility, style and comfort to your patio, balcony and bar. Available in bar or balcony height in sizes 33x33, 40x40 and 40x85, with 13 colors to choose from.

bar-tables.Name: PARKWAY 36 INCH ROUND BAR TABLE / SOLID TOP (no umbrella hole)
bar-tables.Body: The Parkway bar table is available with or without an umbrella hole to cater to various needs. Coordinate with any sling or cushion bar seating pieces for the perfect for outdoor gatherings during any season.

bar-tables.Name: PARKWAY 36 SQ BAR TABLE W/SOLID ALUMINUM TOP/UMBRELLA HOLE
bar-tables.Body: The Parkway bar table is available with or without an umbrella hole to cater to various needs. Coordinate with any sling or cushion bar seating pieces for the perfect for outdoor gatherings during any season.

bar-tables.Name: PORTSMOUTH PARTY BAR WITH UMBRELLA HOLE / STANDARD COLOR
bar-tables.Body: Take entertaining to a new level with our Portsmouth Party Bar. Practical, functional and beautiful, it invites a party wherever it goes. Deep open shelves and a generous work area keeps the focus on the fun.

bar-tables.Name: RICHMOND BALCONY RAIL TABLE
bar-tables.Body: The Richmond Rail Table is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

bar-tables.Name: ROMA 42 INCH  ROUND BAR TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
bar-tables.Body: Inspired by the city known for its great art, spectacular architecture and vivid sense of style, our Roma Collection has an easy elegance and just enough detail to create visual interest and give outdoor spaces a sophisticated lift.

bar-tables.Name: SUNSET BAR (WSL)
bar-tables.Body: The Sunset Bar is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

bar-tables.Name: SYM 50x25 PUB TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
bar-tables.Body: The SYM Pub Table's unique design allows for a variety of creative seating options. Multicolor frames and panels provide just the right pop. Perfect with the SYM Bar stool but works with any bar height chair.

bar-tables.Name: XQI 79x28 TEAK BAR TABLE
bar-tables.Body: Royal Botania XQI furniture includes a range of rectangular and square solid teak outdoor tables. The XQI understated contemporary design makes this first class teak patio furniture ideal for use in contemporary and more traditional surroundings.

coffee-tables.Name: 20TWENTY 36" ROUND BUNCHING TABLE
coffee-tables.Body: 20TWENTY conveys a unique view of creativity, relaxation and balance for a new decade with 20/20 vision. Understated soft angles in the lounge seating surfaces and cylindrical tapered legs come together to create a welcoming and open style.

coffee-tables.Name: 20TWENTY LARGE 36" ROUND BUNCHING TABLE - ECLIPSE
coffee-tables.Body: 20TWENTY conveys a unique view of creativity, relaxation and balance for a new decade with 20/20 vision. Understated soft angles in the lounge seating surfaces and cylindrical tapered legs come together to create a welcoming and open style.

coffee-tables.Name: AHNDA COFFEE TABLE / GRAPHITE WEAVE WITH VULCANO GLASS TOP
coffee-tables.Body: This coffee table complements both lounge chair and wing chair. It can also convert to additional seating by adding a cushion top.

coffee-tables.Name: AHNDA COFFEE TABLE / WHITE QUARTZ WEAVE / LIPARI GLASS TOP
coffee-tables.Body: This coffee table complements both lounge chair and wing chair. It can also convert to additional seating by adding a cushion top.

coffee-tables.Name: AIKO MULTIFIT TABLE WITH WHEELS, TEAK FRAME AND HPL TOP
coffee-tables.Body: With a sophisticated Italian 'high pressure laminate' top, this modern, contemporary design is a practical corner piece for any AIKO configuration. Stainless steel wheels afford the flexibility to also use alternatively as a middle or side table.

coffee-tables.Name: AMALFI 36 SQUARE COFFEE TABLE W/WOVEN TOP, EPOXY COATED STEEL
coffee-tables.Body: This luxurious coffee table is handcrafted from solid steel and features a woven patterned table top. Use our table as is or place a piece of tempered glass or stone slab atop of the woven pattern.

coffee-tables.Name: BOX OCCATIONAL TABLE
coffee-tables.Body: Stacking table in recyclable polypropylene, for indoor and outdoor use. Available in seven colors.

coffee-tables.Name: CABANA CLUB 34" SQUARE PATTERNED ALUM. COFFEE TABLE
coffee-tables.Body: Contemporary in style, this Cabana Club Square Coffee Table features an aluminum base and aluminum top with precision cut details. The exclusive patterned design compliments any hospitality setting. This outdoor table is meant to be paired with modular pieces to create the ultimate space solution.

coffee-tables.Name: CAHABA 47x32 COFFEE TABLE OYSTER BASE WITH SLATE GRAY TOP
coffee-tables.Body: If you are looking for the perfect outdoor coffee table, look no further than the Cahaba Coffee table. This Slate Gray and Oyster finished table adds relaxed charm and refined style to any outdoor patio setting. Available in mahogany and natural finish.

coffee-tables.Name: CALCUTTA 24x42 CAST ALUMINUM COFFEE TABLE
coffee-tables.Body: The Calcutta coffee Table features tapered legs and a lower x-stretcher continuing the exotic bamboo construct. Elegant and detailed aluminum weave top is hand finished to deliver a jewel-like product with heirloom quality and design.

coffee-tables.Name: CALCUTTA 36 INCH CAST ALUMINUM CHAT TABLE
coffee-tables.Body: For smaller spaces this table encourages conversation with family or guests. Elegant and detailed aluminum weave top is hand finished to deliver jewel-like product. Lower x-stretcher continues the decorative bamboo fashion throughout the base.

coffee-tables.Name: CORDIAL OVAL COFFEE TABLE - BEIGE
coffee-tables.Body: Scandinavian and Mediterranean influences combine high quality materials with ergonomics in the Cordial collection. With comfortable cushions and sturdy woven backs, seating pieces invite relaxation.

coffee-tables.Name: CORDIAL OVAL COFFEE TABLE - GRAY
coffee-tables.Body: Scandinavian and Mediterranean influences combine high quality materials with ergonomics in the Cordial collection. With comfortable cushions and sturdy woven backs, seating pieces invite relaxation.

coffee-tables.Name: DALA 38 INCH FOOTSTOOL/COFFEE TABLE
coffee-tables.Body: DALA inspiration is from the artisanship and improvised seating arrangements of the developing world. A powder coated aluminum frame which DEDONâ€šs master weavers thread colorful strands of ecological weather resistant fiber.

coffee-tables.Name: DALA 38 INCH FOOTSTOOL/COFFEE TABLE IN COLOR GRASS
coffee-tables.Body: DALA inspiration is from the artisanship and improvised seating arrangements of the developing world. A powder coated aluminum frame which DEDONâ€šs master weavers thread colorful strands of ecological weather resistant fiber.

coffee-tables.Body: DALA inspiration is from the artisanship and improvised seating arrangements of the developing world. A powder coated aluminum frame which DEDONâ€šs master weavers thread colorful strands of ecological weather resistant fiber.

coffee-tables.Body: DALA inspiration is from the artisanship and improvised seating arrangements of the developing world. A powder coated aluminum frame which DEDONâ€šs master weavers thread colorful strands of ecological weather resistant fiber.

coffee-tables.Name: DEX 40 INCH ROUND ROUND CHAT TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
coffee-tables.Body: The DEX Collection merges signature styling with modular flexibility. The round Chat table offers practically unlimited style and function and is available in six color choices.

coffee-tables.Name: EDEN D90 36 ROUND COFFEE TABLE-WHITE/TOP CERAMIC, Disc'd
coffee-tables.Body: The round D90 coffee table by Eden has a powder-coated aluminum structure and a 6mm porcelain tile top for the white version and 12mm light grey fiber cement in the graphite version.

coffee-tables.Name: FLIGHT 28x45 COFFEE TABLE PYLON ALUMINUM TOP
coffee-tables.Body: None

coffee-tables.Name: FLIGHT COFFEE TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
coffee-tables.Body: Gather around Flight coffee table for morning coffee or to relax and watch the sunset. Powder coated frame is sturdy, smooth, and available in multiple finishes. Available with your choice of glass or aluminum top.

coffee-tables.Name: FREMONT 26 x 43 COFFEE TABLE WITH SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
coffee-tables.Body: Brown Jordan introduces Fremont Tables, a collection that blends modern simplicity with formal elegance. Designed for outdoor use in any climate, Fremont's finely crafted powder coated aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

coffee-tables.Name: FREMONT 44 SQUARE CHAT TABLE WITH SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
coffee-tables.Body: Brown Jordan introduces Fremont Tables, a collection that blends modern simplicity with formal elegance. Designed for outdoor use in any climate, Fremont's finely crafted powder coated aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

coffee-tables.Name: FUSION 28 SQUARE COFFEE TABLE IN BRONZE
coffee-tables.Body: This innovative and contemporary design evokes an attitude of couture furniture while its bold profile generates international appeal. Fusion features a uniform and textural pattern that weaves the entire form into a solid structure.

coffee-tables.Name: GRAND TRAVERSE 43" OVAL COCKTAIL TABLE W/ LAY ON GLASS
coffee-tables.Body: Crafted in our exclusive SunLoom vinyl, the Grand Traverse collection achieves lasting durability, ensuring endless seasons of comfort and conversations. Perfectly suited to the lanai, sun room, or front lawn, the Grand Traverse collection provides versatility to fit your lifestyle and adjust to the changing seasons in your life. Available in caramel or bisque.

coffee-tables.Name: HAMPTONS 43x25 COCKTAIL TABLE WITH LAY ON GLASS
coffee-tables.Body: Versatility and understated elegance means the Hamptons collection is easily adaptable to multiple rooms and decor styles. Self-expression is a defining feature of this collection. Available in 20 custom Lloyd Loom Finishes.

coffee-tables.Name: JAYDU COFFEE TABLE / POWDER COATED ALUMINUM  / HPL TOP
coffee-tables.Body: This larger coffee table goes with JAYDU sofa sets beautifully. Ultra modern, Italian high pressure laminate top compliments the progressive sofa design.

coffee-tables.Name: LARGO OVAL COCKTAIL TABLE WITH LAY-ON GLASS
coffee-tables.Body: Largos welded all-aluminum frames are corrosion-resistant and extremely durable. Made with 100% virgin vinyl and has no added ''filler.'' This assures the vinyl will remain soft and pliable through many years of use and will hold its shape. UV resistant.

coffee-tables.Name: LOU 27x50 COFFEE TABLE W/TEAK TOP (MTO PRICE/QTY, 5 PC MIN)
coffee-tables.Body: This coffee table consists of powder-coated aluminum frame and a tabletop of solid teak slats, helping to create a rich, complete LOU atmosphere.

coffee-tables.Name: LOU FOOTSTOOL/COFFEE TABLE (MTO PRICE/QTY, 5 PC MIN)
coffee-tables.Body: Combining traditional DEDON craftsmanship with fresh innovations in cushion technology, weave and material mix, the LOU lounge system takes outdoor lounging to a whole new level. Designed by Toan Nguyen, a master of modular systems, LOU was conceived from the ground up as a series of overlapping horizontal strata, with armrests defined by a subtle relief in the woven structure of the seat. Thanks to a semi-open weave and hidden gliders, the system gives an impression of extraordinary lightness, as if floating. And with the wide range of modules available, including a curved one for a special twist, it can be configured for any outdoor setting, however large or small.

coffee-tables.Name: LOUNGE 43 INCH SQUARE FOOTSTOOL/COFFEE TABLE IN JAVA
coffee-tables.Body: The LOUNGE collection rectilinear modules come together in an endless variety of seating arrangements, enabling you to create the perfect solution for an any outdoor environment. Thick cushions ensure maximum comfort from this minimalist design.

coffee-tables.Name: MACKINAC 43x24 COCKTAIL TABLE WITH TEAK TOP
coffee-tables.Body: The Mackinac collection is suspended in a more innocent time. Enjoy simple pleasures within its open weave, deep seated comfort. The romantic styling of this collection is complemented by its bold woven framework and luxuriously comfortable seating.

coffee-tables.Name: MONO 59x29 COFFEE TABLE / PC ALUMINUM / ICE BIN/  TEAK TOP
coffee-tables.Body: This amply-sized coffee table, with recycled teak top and a powder coated aluminum ice bin and frame, brings both warmth and convenience to outdoor entertaining areas.

coffee-tables.Name: MOON ALU COFFEE TABLE / GRAPHITE
coffee-tables.Body: The coffee table of the Moon outdoor collection has a rectangular shape with rounded corners that give it an elegant softness. The structure is in aluminium and the top in ceramic.

coffee-tables.Name: NINIX 35x59 LOW TABLE/EP STAINLESS/WHITE GLASS TOP
coffee-tables.Body: NINIX coffee table is perfect for both formal and informal outdoor living. The hairline finish of the stainless steel frame and the durable table top options emphasizes it's ergonomic style. Almost a pity to use outdoors. Five color options available.

coffee-tables.Name: OPAL CHAT TABLE
coffee-tables.Body: The Opal chat table is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

coffee-tables.Name: OSLO COFFEE TABLE
coffee-tables.Body: The Oslo stands for elegance and modernity. This collection perfectly reflects designer Luis Alejandro Blasiniâ€™s meticulous attention to detail and thoughtful approach to design and color.  Its sleek powder coated aluminum frames and the solid laser cut aluminum tabletops, give this collection its unique distinctive character. The exposed aluminum elegantly designed with comfortable cushions covered in Sunbrella fabric make for a luxurious outdoor ambiance.

coffee-tables.Name: PARKWAY 29 INCH CORNER TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
coffee-tables.Body: A more spacious square tabletop that is topped with glass. Table frame is hand welded and personally inspected to ensure a jewel-like appearance. Once constructed and thoroughly cleaned, the piece is powder coated for a timeless finish.

coffee-tables.Name: PARKWAY 45 INCH ROUND CHAT TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
coffee-tables.Body: Broad strokes as if from a paint brush create the legs and frame of this high-end table. Features a gorgeous circular table top crowned with sturdy glass. Brown Jordan pieces have a cross-generation appeal due to their timeless design.

coffee-tables.Name: PARKWAY MODULAR 35 x 35 OCCASIONAL TABLE
coffee-tables.Body: This coffee table is a great addition to the Parkway Modular collection. Exceptional finishing with two layers of smooth aluminum top. Beautiful frame can be implemented amidst seating or on either end.

coffee-tables.Name: POLYGON STOOL/COFFEE TABLE / TEAK TOP / PC ALUMINUM FRAME
coffee-tables.Body: The Industrial Collection Polygon, by Mamagreen,  is chic, colorful and bold. The series showcases hardy laminated teak components, HPL tabletops and rough-welded aluminum parts. The frames are powder-coated for a robust weather resistant finish.

coffee-tables.Name: PORCINI 39D x 10H COFFEE TABLE, MARRONE/BLACK TOP, MTO/30 PC MIN
coffee-tables.Body: PORCINI is a collection of sculptural side tables as practical and versatile as they are delightful to the eye. Named after the beloved Italian mushrooms it casually resembles, PORCINI comes in three heights, two base styles and two elegant colors.

coffee-tables.Name: STILL 28 INCH SQUARE OCCASIONAL TABLE / SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
coffee-tables.Body: Enjoy this chic, square shaped occasional table from our Still collection. Constructed of sturdy, lightweight aluminum, ideal for residential or hospitality use. Finished with sustainable powder coating for ultimate weather protection.

coffee-tables.Name: STILL 34 x 58 COFFEE TABLE
coffee-tables.Body: Enjoy this chic, rectangular shaped occasional table from our Still collection. Constructed of sturdy, lightweight aluminum, ideal for residential or hospitality use. Finished with sustainable powder coating for ultimate weather protection.

coffee-tables.Name: TEAK 40 INCH ROUND COCKTAIL TABLE TAPERED LEG
coffee-tables.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

coffee-tables.Name: TEAK 40 INCH ROUND COCKTAIL TABLE WITH SLED BASE
coffee-tables.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

coffee-tables.Name: TEAK 45x24 COCKTAIL TABLE WITH TAPERED LEG- ANTIQUE GRAY
coffee-tables.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

coffee-tables.Name: TEAK 48 INCH OVAL COCKTAIL TABLE WITH SLED BASE
coffee-tables.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

coffee-tables.Name: TEQUESTA COFFEE TABLE/ PIETRA TOP / STANDARD PC FRAME
coffee-tables.Body: The essential form of a parson’s table interpreted for the outdoors in a wide range of finish and inlay top materials, Tequesta has your dining and occasional table needs covered. With thoughtful scale and proportions in a large array of sizes and applications, from coffee to communal counter-height tables, Tequesta is the quiet counterpart to whatever seating you select for it to accompany.

coffee-tables.Name: TIBBO 41x55 COFFEE TABLE IN TEAK
coffee-tables.Body: DEDON's first collection in teak, TIBBO combines meticulous craftsmanship, superior comfort and remarkable lightness in a design that's distinctive, elegant and pure. The collection conveys an exceptionally rich and luxurious feel.

coffee-tables.Name: TOBAGO 36 INCH ROUND COCKTAIL TABLE
coffee-tables.Body: The Tobago collection sets the standard for excellence in alternative deep-seated design. Full fluid lines ignite the imagination and enhance the look and feel of this boldly woven style. Tobago collection is designed to be memorable.

coffee-tables.Name: TOPAZ ROUND COFFEE TABLE
coffee-tables.Body: The Topaz Collection is created of FSC 100%, solid heartwood, Ipe timber. A clean and contemporary array of Dining, Deepseating and Accent pieces to enhance an expansive outdoor room or a metro, compact balcony.

coffee-tables.Name: VENETIAN 26 x 43 RECTANGULAR COFFEE TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
coffee-tables.Body: Venetian's refined silhouette is highlighted by timeless Neoclassic details. The cross-stretcher is framed by elegantly scaled rectangular lines. Venetian easily accents eclectic living scapes that require a more formal design presence.

coffee-tables.Name: VENETIAN 30 CHAT TABLE BASE FOR 36 TO 42 INCH ROUND TOP
coffee-tables.Body: Venetian's refined silhouette is highlighted by timeless Neoclassic details. Venetian table bases allow you to choose a top that compliments your style and easily accents eclectic living scapes that require a more formal design presence.

coffee-tables.Name: WOODLAWN 48x30 COFFEE TABLE IN NATURAL TEAK
coffee-tables.Body: Our marine-grade teak material, carved with subtle details, comprises this outdoor coffee table from our Woodlawn Collection. Perfect for adding a modern feel to your outdoor room.

deep-seating.Name: AFRICA LOUNGE CHAIR
deep-seating.Body:
The Africa lounge chair brings together all the parts of the history of the collection in a single product. It´s seating is comfortable and lustrous and it’s also discreet and modern at the same time.

The design of this piece has been created to complement and envelop the natural curves of the human body. The timeless aesthetics of the entire collection are retained in this piece, and it can be customized with a variety of colorful and warm fabrics and finishes to suit your preferences.

deep-seating.Name: AHNDA 2-SEATER SOFA IN ELEMENTAL WEAVE
deep-seating.Body: AHNDA is an outdoor lounger collection with all of the iconic style, ergonomic comfort and luxurious attention to detail one expects of the finest indoor pieces. Designed with weatherproof fiber, it signals a fresh approach to classic lounger style.

deep-seating.Name: AHNDA 2-SEATER SOFA IN GRAPHITE WEAVE
deep-seating.Body: AHNDA is an outdoor lounger collection with all of the iconic style, ergonomic comfort and luxurious attention to detail one expects of the finest indoor pieces. Designed with weatherproof fiber, it signals a fresh approach to classic lounger style.

deep-seating.Name: AHNDA FOOTSTOOL/COFFEE TABLE IN ELEMENTAL WEAVE
deep-seating.Body: This footstool complements both lounge chair and wing chair and doubles as a coffee table when a tempered glass top is added in place of the cushion. Cushion and tempered glass sold individually.

deep-seating.Name: AHNDA LOUNGE CHAIR IN ELEMENTAL WEAVE
deep-seating.Body: AHNDA is an outdoor lounger collection with all of the iconic style, ergonomic comfort and luxurious attention to detail one expects of the finest indoor pieces. Designed with weatherproof fiber, it signals a fresh approach to classic lounger style.

deep-seating.Body: This chaise lounge features deep seated cushions for maximum comfort and finials for added elegance. The framework is handcrafted with sleek lines, highlighted by a bold square pattern. Wheels on the rear legs make moving the chaise lounge a breeze.

deep-seating.Body: This lounge chair features an adjustable chain back for maximum comfort and finials for added elegance. Handcrafted with sleek lines, highlighted by a bold square pattern on the seat and back to contrast the cushions. (brass finials are additional cost)

deep-seating.Name: AMALFI SOFA 60 IN EPOXY COATED STEEL
deep-seating.Body: This sofa features an adjustable chain back and deep seated cushions for maximum comfort. The framework is handcrafted with sleek lines, highlighted by a bold square pattern on the seat and back to contrast the cushions.

deep-seating.Body: This outdoor lounge chair features deep seated cushions for maximum comfort and finials for added elegance. The framework is handcrafted with sleek lines, highlighted by a bold pattern on the sides, seat and back to contrast the cushions.

deep-seating.Body: This outdoor sofa features deep seated cushions for maximum comfort and finials for added elegance. The framework is handcrafted with sleek lines, highlighted by a bold square pattern on the seat and back to contrast the cushions.

deep-seating.Name: AMALFI TUXEDO SALON BACKLESS LOUNGER, EPOXY COATED STEEL
deep-seating.Body: The Amalfi Tuxedo Salon Set is a deep seated comfort line which can be placed in a myriad of arrangements. This outdoor lounge grouping features lounges with backs, backless lounges and a salon ottoman.

deep-seating.Name: AMALFI TUXEDO SALON LOUNGER WITH BACK, EPOXY COATED STEEL
deep-seating.Body: The Amalfi Tuxedo Salon is a deep seated comfort line which can be placed in a myriad of arrangements. This outdoor lounge grouping features lounges with backs, backless lounges and a salon ottoman.

deep-seating.Name: AMALFI TUXEDO SALON OTTOMAN IN EPOXY COATED STEEL
deep-seating.Body: Since our founding in 1955, we have been true to our dedication to create heirloom quality furniture. The price includes any standard Sunbrella Canvas, Rib or Dupione. Call us to find out how you can create your own Amalfi Living piece.

deep-seating.Name: AMALFI TUXEDO SOFA 72 IN EPOXY COATED STEEL
deep-seating.Body: This outdoor sofa features deep seated cushions for maximum comfort and finials for added elegance. The framework is handcrafted with sleek lines, highlighted by a bold square pattern on the seat and back to contrast the cushions.

deep-seating.Name: AMALFI TUXEDO SOFA 80 IN, EPOXY COATED STEEL, BOLSTER PILLOWS ARE ADDITIONAL
deep-seating.Body: This outdoor sofa features deep seated cushions for maximum comfort and finials for added elegance. The framework is handcrafted with sleek lines, highlighted by a bold square pattern on the seat and back to contrast the cushions.

deep-seating.Name: ASHLAND TEAK LOUNGE CHAIR - NATURAL
deep-seating.Body: The Ashland Teak Lounge Chair adds luxury to your outdoor living space. The sturdy, teak frame with flat armrests brings indoor comfort to your outdoor space. Ashlandâ„¢s sleek styling makes it a good fit with a variety of outdoor furnishing looks.

deep-seating.Name: ASHLAND TEAK SOFA - NATURAL
deep-seating.Body: The Ashland Teak Sofa features a classic design with sleek lines, gently curved legs, and comfortable flat armrests, making it a perfect choice for any outdoor space. A bench-style seat cushion with a three-cushion back, this sofa brings luxurious seating and stylish good looks. Its long-lasting, weather-resistant materials promise years of enjoyment. Marine-grade teak construction with mortise-and-tenon joinery Weather-resistant upholstered seat and back cushions.

deep-seating.Name: ASTORIA LOUNGE CHAIR - OYSTER WEAVE
deep-seating.Body: Summer Classics is proud to offer the inviting Astoria collection, updating this furniture classic with fresh aluminum details creating luxury, comfort and style.  The wicker is made with the most extensive UV resistant protocol to date, N-duraª resin.  For additional durability, the N-duraª wicker is memory tested and hand woven over heavy gauge aluminum, individually finished with an antiqued application and fine braiding detail to ensure quality and style.  The Oyster grey hue fits comfortably into any color scheme and allows for endless design variations.

deep-seating.Name: ASTORIA SWIVEL GLIDER - OYSTER WEAVE, Disc'd/WSL
deep-seating.Body: Astoria Swivel Glider features optimal comfort with its turning and gliding motion. The parson design combines subtle curves into a transitional form fit for the most enduring tastes. This aluminum and woven resin glider is both beautiful and durable.

deep-seating.Name: ASTORIA WOVEN SOFA
deep-seating.Body: Summer Classics is proud to offer the inviting Astoria sofa. This patio classic has fresh aluminum details and the wicker is made with UV resistant N-dura resin. The Oyster grey hue fits any color scheme and allows for endless design variations.

deep-seating.Name: AVONDALE ALUMINUM SOFA
deep-seating.Body: Distinguished by a simple frame, the Avondale Aluminum Spring Lounge proves thereâ„¢s elegance in understatement. Made of premium wrought aluminum and finished with a durable powder-coating, the motion features and custom cushions provide maximum comfort.

deep-seating.Name: AVONDALE ALUMINUM SPRING LOUNGE CHAIR
deep-seating.Body: Distinguished by a simple frame, the Avondale Aluminum Spring Lounge proves thereâ„¢s elegance in understatement. Made of premium wrought aluminum and finished with a durable powder-coating, the motion features and custom cushions provide maximum comfort.

deep-seating.Name: AVONDALE TEAK LOUNGE CHAIR
deep-seating.Body: Handcrafted from plantation grade teak, this deep seating lounge chair features a smooth texture and minimalistic design that mixes nicely with a variety of collections. Available in both natural and weathered teak.

deep-seating.Name: BABBO CONFIG 4 / CAT H FABRIC / HPL TABLE TOPS
deep-seating.Body: BABBO Lounge Set is as easy as one, two and three! Both left and right hand curved sectional pieces have generous, soft cornered, built in HPL side tables which are available in four colors. Add the sectional curved middle piece in between to create an expansive eight seater lounge set.

deep-seating.Name: BENTLEY WOVEN LOUNGE CHAIR

deep-seating.Body: Powder-coated poetry is just what a patio needs. Meet the Crandon Collection. Architectural and versatile, it boasts a pleasing repetition of parallel lines that artfully frame the environment. Crandon Park in Miami is known for both its wild natural preserves, and planned recreational spaces. Whether your backyard is wild or tame, Crandon will welcome you into the outdoors to lean back on its beautifully angled cushions.

deep-seating.Body: Melt into comfort in our Croquet teak recliner, a luxurious option for teak outdoor dining sets. The back and seat of each chair is comprised of teak planks framed with flat armrests.

deep-seating.Name: CROQUET TEAK SOFA
deep-seating.Body: Crafted from the finest teak, the Croquet sofa is a beautiful work of art transformed into outdoor furniture. It features tapered back legs and mortise and tenon construction.

deep-seating.Name: CTR LOUNGE CHAIR (cushions not included)
deep-seating.Body: Italian designer Piergiorgio Cazzaniga does with the CTR collection what he is good at: making complex designs appear effortless. The frame of the chair is made of profiles in powdercoated stainless steel that are bent in one continuous line. The corners are straight, yet the tubes keep a round form, which requires great mastery. The backrest is attached to the frame at only 2 points and appears to float unsuspended above the seat.   The open weave refers to the ancient tradition of weaving and gives flexible support to the back. The seat is upholstered with a water-repellent cushion which can be easily removed.

deep-seating.Name: DAISY MAE 1-SEATER CAT H
deep-seating.Body: Daisy comes in two distinct versions: Daisy Rae which has a hand-fitted rope backrest developed for outdoor use and Daisy Mae which has a meticulously handwoven wicker shell.

deep-seating.Name: EVO LOUNGER / GRADE B
deep-seating.Body: The Evo Collection is the perfect solution for functional and fashionable public areas ranging from conversation centers in lobbies to relaxing retreats by the pool. Designer Richard Holbrook created an elegant collection with subtly tapered legs and slight arch across the back of each piece. The Evo Collection features TropiKane® Basket or Vineyard Weaves and cushions equipped with Tropitone’s exclusive RELAXplus® technology to ensure durability. Evo is truly an evolution of style, design, and comfort.

deep-seating.Body: Mix seamlessly blends fashion, function and fancy with clean lines and sleek contours crafted from 100% FSCÂ®-certified Ipe timber. This tropical hardwood is preferred for its peerless strength, lifelong beauty, and resistance to weather and wear. Upon arrival, Ipe displays a deep, chocolate brown color that can preserved with basic care, yet can also be allowed to gracefully age into a lustrous silver patina that complements any setting

deep-seating.Name: MOOD TEAK LOUNGE CHAIR
deep-seating.Body: The airy design of the Mood collection and its warm combination of teak and handwoven backs will immediately create an intimate atmosphere on your patio. The rounded design of the durable teak gives the chair a warm and friendly tone. The weave in Tricord has a very soft touch, but can nevertheless defy all weather conditions. Tribu has developed a range of natural colours that fit in with any type of outdoor environment. The back cushions are available in various styles to match every taste.

deep-seating.Name: MOOD TEAK SOFA

deep-seating.Name: MORNINGSIDE MODERNA SWIVEL LOUNGE CHAIR / GRADE A
deep-seating.Body: Every morning is a new chance to make a statement, and the Morningside collection delivers. Curved metals with cutouts are a radical departure from most furniture design, but make perfect sense here. They are edgy without sharp corners. And some pieces include motion and enveloping comfort, while feeling solid and stable. This innovation is inspired by the Morningside neighborhood in Miami, the cityâ€™s first historic district and an architectural wonderland.

deep-seating.Name: NESTREST HANGING LOUNGER
deep-seating.Body: Thanks to its innovative structure the NESTREST hanging lounger has established itself as an icon of contemporary design. Its interior is comfortable and private allowing those inside to see out while preventing those outside from looking in.

deep-seating.Name: NESTREST STANDING LOUNGER WITH ROTATING BASE
deep-seating.Body: The NESTREST standing lounger comes with its own 360 degree rotating base, combining all the comfort and cosiness of the hanging version with the convenience of mounting on the ground.

deep-seating.Name: NEWPORT RECLINER LOUNGE CHAIR
deep-seating.Body: This outdoor recliner was inspired by vintage, natural looks from the 1950s. Made from our N-dura resin wicker, featuring an intricately woven frame, it evokes a natural texture and feel. The reclining back maximizes this piece's comfort.

deep-seating.Name: NEWPORT SOFA
deep-seating.Body: Designed with comfort and vintage looks in mind, this sofa evokes a mid-century design with an ultra-realistic material. Made to resemble natural reed, this sofa is framed with hand woven N-dura resin. Complete with plus cushions for ultimate relaxation.

deep-seating.Name: OHANA LOUNGE CHAIR/STANDARD ALUM/CAT H CUSHION/BATYLINE/ROPE
deep-seating.Body: With a range of neutral and vivid color combinations, Ohana can find itself at home in most exterior and interior settings. Ohanaâ€™s frame is woven by hand with an Olefin rope wrapping around a sturdy powder coated aluminum frame. The semi-soft seat cushion, supported by a mesh seat deck, and a fluffy back pillow ensure a comfortable seating experience.

deep-seating.Name: OLIVER HIGH BACK LOUNGE CHAIR / GRADE E
deep-seating.Body: The taller cousin of Oliver’s Lounge Chair, the High Back Lounge Chair by designer, Ann Marie Vering is distinguished by a gracefully curving back that rises 5 inches higher. A low-profile, angular aluminum frame fabricated from extruded, custom cast, and solid metal elements cradles the High Back Lounge Chair’s bucket seat, suspending it as if in mid-air. In addition to highlighting Brown Jordan’s unrivaled expertise in metal craftsmanship, the design showcases our innovative use of woven rope. This durable, heritage material - “a modern updated look to wicker” - is handwoven onto the actual frames by skilled artisans in Indonesia. Completing the look, impeccably tailored cushions hug the curves of the rope seat and cosset the body in luxury.

deep-seating.Name: OLIVER LOUNGE CHAIR / GRADE E
deep-seating.Body: The art of luxurious outdoor living is beautifully exemplified in architectural designer, Ann Marie Vering’s carefree, glamorous Oliver Lounge Chair. A low-profile, angular aluminum frame that’s fabricated from extruded, custom cast, and solid metal elements cradles the lounge chair’s gracefully curving bucket seat, suspending it as if in mid-air. In addition to highlighting Brown Jordan’s unrivaled expertise in metal craftsmanship, the design showcases our innovative use of woven rope. This durable, heritage material - “a modern updated look to wicker” - is handwoven onto the actual frames by skilled artisans in Indonesia. Completing the look, impeccably tailored cushions hug the curves of the rope seat and cosset the body in luxury.

deep-seating.Name: OLIVER LOVESEAT / GRADE E
deep-seating.Body:
Each carefully considered piece in designer Ann Marie Vering’s Oliver collection is expertly engineered, perfectly proportioned, and stunningly photogenic, including this highly inviting outdoor-indoor Love Seat.

A low-profile, angular aluminum frame that’s fabricated from extruded, custom cast, and solid metal elements cradles the Love Seat’s gracefully curving bucket seat, suspending it as if in mid-air.

In addition to highlighting Brown Jordan’s unrivaled expertise in metal craftsmanship, the design showcases our innovative use of woven rope. This durable, heritage material - “a modern updated look to wicker” - is handwoven onto the actual frames by skilled artisans in Indonesia. Completing the look, impeccably tailored cushions hug the curves of the rope seat and cosset the body in luxury.

deep-seating.Name: OLIVER SOFA / GRADE E
deep-seating.Body:
Designer Ann Marie Vering’s Oliver Sofa is effortlessly good looking from every angle, a study in balance, counterbalance, and perfect proportions. A low-profile, angular aluminum frame that’s fabricated from extruded, custom cast, and solid metal elements cradles the Sofa’s gracefully curving woven rope bucket seat, suspending it as if in mid-air. In addition to highlighting Brown Jordan’s unrivaled expertise in metal craftsmanship, the design showcases our innovative use of woven rope. This durable, heritage material - “a modern updated look to wicker” - is handwoven onto the actual frames by skilled artisans in Indonesia. Completing the look, impeccably tailored cushions hug the curves of the rope seat and cosset the body in luxury.

Oliver comprises 10 cushioned pieces that can be floated confidently and effortlessly in any setting.

deep-seating.Body: The ORBIT love seat is the original icon of modern outdoor furniture design. A sensation from the moment it launched, this multiple-awards-winner continues to delight, surprise and inspire more than a decade later.

It's powder coated frame and multi-dimensional rope forms striking silhouette visible from all angles. It's striking design and plush cushions make it the best-in-class daybed for designer comfort. Available in all Brown Jordan finishes and fabric. Rope colors are Pebble and Coal.

deep-seating.Body: The Oslo stands for elegance and modernity. This collection perfectly reflects designer Luis Alejandro Blasiniâ€™s meticulous attention to detail and thoughtful approach to design and color.  Its sleek powder coated aluminum frames and the solid laser cut aluminum tabletops, give this collection its unique distinctive character. The exposed aluminum elegantly designed with comfortable cushions covered in Sunbrella fabric make for a luxurious outdoor ambiance.

Miami's elegant cushions add a defined, contemporary edge to the sofa and are available in numerous luxury outdoor fabrics. In addition to Miami cushions, the Pure sofa is also available with casual cushions.

deep-seating.Name: TOSCA LOUNGE CHAIR - GRADE D FABRIC
deep-seating.Body: The Tosca outdoor collection is simultaneously warm and inviting, stylish and intriguing. It was the first time Tribù called upon a female designer to draw an outdoor furniture piece with a more feminine touch. Monica Armani succeeded in her challenge: rounded forms, tapered legs and an elegant seating shell in powdercoated stainless steel, upholstered with extra-wide braiding. The material for the braiding is genuinely innovative : foam mousse is encased in a seamless sheath of knitted textilene and polyolefine which makes the material weather-resistant, but also surprisingly soft to the touch. The seating comfort is especially pleasant, also thanks to the comfortable outdoor cushions.

deep-seating.Name: UKIYO LOUNGE CHAIR - GRADE D CUSHION

deep-seating.Name: UKIYO LOUNGER - GRADE D FABRIC CUSHION + HEAD SUPPORT

So does the Ukiyo lounger, which welcomes you to relax on a comfortable cushion while the versatile and timeless design continues to surprise you.

dining.Body: Air dining table modern design with plastic legs and HPL compact laminated tops available in white and black. For indoor and outdoor use. Three sizes available. (*Dark colors not recommended in direct sunlight.)

dining.Body: Air dining table modern design with plastic legs and HPL compact laminated tops available in white and black. For indoor and outdoor use. Three sizes available. (*Dark colors not recommended in direct sunlight.)

dining.Name: AIR SQUARE TABLE 31x31

dining.Name: ALFRESCO 95 X 36 TABLE
dining.Body: Loll's largest outdoor dining table. It is sized to comfortably fit 10 adults but can seat up to 12 with benches on all ends. Constructed with a recycled plastic frame and top, it's easy to clean and requires no maintenance.

dining.Name: ALFRESCO 95 X 36 TABLE LEAF GREEN
dining.Body: Loll's largest outdoor dining table. It is sized to comfortably fit 10 adults but can seat up to 12 with benches on all ends. Constructed with a recycled plastic frame and top, it's easy to clean and requires no maintenance.

dining.Body: Loll's largest outdoor dining table. It is sized to comfortably fit 10 adults but can seat up to 12 with benches on all ends. Constructed with a recycled plastic frame and top, it's easy to clean and requires no maintenance.

dining.Name: ALLUX 40x40 DINING TABLE / ABSTRACT TEAK SLAT / PC ALUMINUM
dining.Body: ALLUX dining tables are highly practical, easily customized outdoor seating solutions. This option uses irregularly shaped, smooth teak slats for an unusual and highly contemporary design dining look. This is the smallest of the three sizes available.

dining.Name: ALLUX CARVER DINING CHAIR / PC ALUMINUM FRAME /  BATYLINE K
dining.Body: This stylish dining chair is a good choice for outside dining areas where seating comfort and efficiency are equally important. Complete with armrests, but with the width of a dining side chair.

dining.Name: ALLUX STACKING DINING CHAIR / PC ALUMINUM /STANDARD BATYLINE K
dining.Body: Complete with armrests and a wide, sling-covered seat, this is the most luxurious, comfortable dining chair in the ALLUX collection.

dining.Name: ALURA ARM CHAIR/SAND COATED ALUMINUM / PEARL GREY BATYLINE
dining.Body: Those who thought that it was impossible to bring out a really innovating aluminum collection are proven wrong by the ALURA. The range of soft edged stackable dining chairs and sturdy barstools are complemented by a lounger with unequalled ergonomics.

dining.Name: AMALFI 20 INCH ROUND SIDE TABLE W/WOVEN TOP, EPOXY COATED STEEL
dining.Body: The Amalfi Side Table is handcrafted from solid steel and features a woven pattern top. Use our side table as is or place a piece of tempered glass or stone slab atop of the pattern. Pair it with our chaise lounge chairs for a luxurious backyard setting.

dining.Name: AMALFI 36 INCH ROUND DINING TABLE BASE, EPOXY COATED STEEL
dining.Body: The Amalfi Round Dining Table is handcrafted from solid steel and provides sturdy support for a glass or stone slab table top. Pair this dining table with our side & host dining chairs for a luxurious backyard setting. (glass top not included)

dining.Name: AMALFI HOST CHAIR, LARGE,  EPOXY COATED STEEL
dining.Body: These outdoor dining chairs feature deep seated cushions for maximum comfort and finials for added elegance. The framework is handcrafted with sleek lines, highlighted by a bold square pattern on the seat and back to contrast the cushions.

dining.Name: AMALFI HOST DINING CHAIR IN EPOXY COATED STEEL
dining.Body: These outdoor dining chairs feature deep seated cushions for maximum comfort and finials for added elegance. The framework is handcrafted with sleek lines, highlighted by a bold square pattern on the seat and back to contrast the cushions.

dining.Name: AMALFI HOURGLASS GRANDE 36 DIA TABLE BASE, EPOXY COATED STEEL
dining.Body: The Amalfi Hourglass Table is truly unique. Handcrafted from solid steel this table features an hourglass base sturdy enough for a glass table top or stone slab. (glass top not included)

dining.Name: AMALFI SIDE CHAIR IN EPOXY COATED STEEL
dining.Body: These outdoor dining chairs feature deep seated cushions for maximum comfort and finials for added elegance. The framework is handcrafted with sleek lines, highlighted by a bold square pattern on the seat and back to contrast the cushions.

dining.Name: AMALFI SIDE CHAIR LARGE IN EPOXY COATED STEEL
dining.Body: The Amalfi Host Chair is perfect for dining. This outdoor dining chair features deep seated cushions for maximum comfort and finials for added elegance. The framework is highlighted by a bold square pattern on the seat and back to contrast the cushions.

dining.Name: ASHLAND TEAK ARM CHAIR
dining.Body: The Ashland Teak Armchair with cushion defines contemporary outdoor dining. This versatile chair is perfect for small spaces and pairs well with a variety of other collections. Handcrafted from farm harvested, marine-grade teak, this chair is ideal as a dining chair or simply for additional stylish seating. Mortise-and-tenon construction ensures that this chair is built to last.

dining.Name: ASHLAND TEAK SIDE CHAIR - NATURAL
dining.Body: The Ashland Teak side chair with cushion defines contemporary outdoor dining. This versatile chair is perfect for small spaces and pairs well with a variety of other collections. Handcrafted from farm harvested, marine-grade teak, this chair is ideal as a dining chair or simply for additional stylish seating. Mortise-and-tenon construction ensures that this chair is built to last.

dining.Name: BAIA 57" BENCH / STAINLESS FRAME / RECYCLED TEAK SEAT
dining.Body: BAIA collection is famous for best-in-class, high-performance outdoor dining extension tables, effortlessly extending to accomodate large groups in a moment. Choose from high-end, recycled teak or newly-available, luxurious Italian Ëœhigh pressure laminateâ„¢ for table tops; matched with stainless steel or powder coated aluminum frames. BAIA also includes similarly premium round and picnic-inspired tables, chairs and benches. Designed by Vincent Cantaert & Barbara Widiningtias.

BAIA also includes similarly premium round and picnic-inspired tables, chairs and benches. Designed by Vincent Cantaert & Barbara Widiningtias.

dining.Name: BEECHWORTH SQUARE 53 X 53 DINING TABLE
dining.Body: The traditional Ipe furniture pieces represent the early designs of our company. The chair and bench designs host comfort in contoured, ergonomic seating, while most of the tables utilize larger Ipe slats for a more traditional, cottage style.

dining.Name: BLOOM DINING CHAIR, SOLD 2 PER BOX
dining.Body: Bloom chair is produced with a single injection of polypropylene reinforced with glass fiber obtained by means of the latest air moulding technology. Available in a variety of colors, maintenance free and suitable for any outdoor or indoor use.

dining.Name: BONO 50 INCH RD DINING TABLE / HPL TOP/ TEAK CENTER AND LEGS
dining.Body: Slim round legs highlight the sleek 'high pressure laminate' top and outstanding recycled teak middle accent. The BONO collection represents high-end design solutions for smaller outdoor areas designated for pure, simple relaxation.

dining.Name: BONO DINING CHAIR WITH SEATPAD / ALUMINUM FRAME
dining.Body: Frames in powder coated aluminum in your choice of color (alternatively available in stainless steel) and combined with outdoor wicker, woven in a barrel shape.  A perfect match for the new BONO table.

dining.Name: BRANCH 31.5 INCH ROUND DINING TABLE / PC ALUMINUM
dining.Body: Inspired by the branches of a tree, the Branch collection has a sleek, organic look. Designer Molina: With Branch, we want to strengthen the emotional connection with nature. The collection includes a stackable side chair and armchair, a lounger, a folding beach chair, a range of dining and bistro tables, and coffee tables in various sizes and heights.

dining.Name: BRANCH DINING SIDE CHAIR / ALUMINUM / POLYPROPYLENE
dining.Body: Inspired by the branches of a tree, the Branch collection has a sleek, organic look. The idea behind the collection was to design a chair that blends in completely with nature and optimally resists all weather conditions. Behind the slender appearance lies a sophisticated design and a well-considered choice for durable, easy-to-maintain, recyclable materials. The technique of high-pressure injection gives the aluminum frame a firm stability and the resilience of the polypropylene backs ensures excellent seating comfort

dining.Name: BRICKELL 44 RD DINING TABLE, ALUM SOLID TOP / STND FININSH
dining.Body: Miamiâ€™s Brickell neighborhood bustles with a growing number of businesses and people, but never loses its historic and iconic feel. The Brickell collection also has a growing fan base for its classic appeal. The mid-century design features a modern low profile that keeps us coming back for more. The chair-back angles and elegant tapering lines are reminiscent of coveted Scandinavian styling. Brickell is a beautiful addition to any outdoor space.

dining.Name: BRICKELL ARM CHAIR / X BACK/STANDARD FINISH/GRADE A
dining.Body: Miamiâ€™s Brickell neighborhood bustles with a growing number of businesses and people, but never loses its historic and iconic feel. The Brickell collection also has a growing fan base for its classic appeal. The mid-century design features a modern low profile that keeps us coming back for more. The chair-back angles and elegant tapering lines are reminiscent of coveted Scandinavian styling. Brickell is a beautiful addition to any outdoor space.

dining.Name: BUNBURY TABLE 90 x 42 DINING TABLE
dining.Body: The traditional Ipe furniture pieces represent the early designs of our company. The chair and bench designs host comfort in contoured, ergonomic seating, while most of the tables utilize larger Ipe slats for a more traditional, cottage style.

dining.Name: CABANA CLUB DINING CHAIR/ALUMINUM FRAME/GRADE B SLING
dining.Body: Designed by Richard Holbrook, the Cabana Club Sling Collection exudes refined sophistication at bistros in the town or by the pool at the resort. The Cabana Club Sling Collection is ideal for any modern architectural environment, even small spaces. Cabana Club features sleek lines which create an open and airy effect. Aluminum frames and durable fabrics are available in a variety of finishes and designs, making the sling group a perfect complement to other pieces in the Cabana Club Collection.

dining.Name: CAHABA 50x19 CONSOLE TABLE / OYSTER BASE / SLATE GRAY TOP
dining.Body: If you are looking for the perfect outdoor console table, look no further than the Cahaba Console table. This Slate Gray and Oyster finished table adds relaxed charm and refined style to any outdoor patio setting. Available in mahogany and natural finish.

dining.Name: CALCUTTA 36 INCH CAST ALUMINUM ROUND DINING TABLE
dining.Body: For smaller, more intimate, spaces this table encourages conversation with family or guests. Elegant and detailed aluminum weave top is hand finished to deliver jewel-like product. Lower x-stretcher continues the decorative fashion throughout the base.,

dining.Name: CALCUTTA 54 INCH CAST ALUMINUM ROUND DINING TABLE
dining.Body: A popular choice for casual entertaining, this table provides ample space for small gatherings. The lower x-stretcher arches across the base, continuing the decorative bamboo design.,

dining.Name: CALCUTTA ARM CHAIR WITH GRADE A FABRIC
dining.Body: Exotic and polished woven bamboo pattern forged in cast aluminum framing. Smooth curves and lines extend the Chippendale-inspired elegance throughout each piece. The level of detail in the Calcutta bamboo pattern is seldom found in outdoor furniture.

dining.Name: CALCUTTA SIDE CHAIR WITH GRADE A FABRIC
dining.Body: Ribbon-back seating and pointed arches illustrate Chinese Chippendale inspired grandeur. Enticing bamboo pattern detail continues through the seat, back, and tapered legs. Luxury furniture suitable for indoor dining parties or entertaining in the garden.

dining.Name: CALCUTTA SIDE CHAIR WITH GRADE B FABRIC
dining.Body: Ribbon-back seating and pointed arches illustrate Chinese Chippendale inspired grandeur. Enticing bamboo pattern detail continues through the seat, back, and tapered legs. Luxury furniture suitable for indoor dining parties or entertaining in the garden.

dining.Name: CARLYLE REG SLING STKNG DNG ARM CHAIR
dining.Body: Sleek and elegant define Carlyle from its seat and back to the graceful pedestal table. Carlyle features a functional stacking frame with a variety of seating options.

dining.Name: CARMEN DINING CHAIR, BLACK FRAME, MIN. of 2
dining.Body: The Carmen stacking armchair produced with the latest generation of air moulding thermoplastic injection. Seat in polypropylene reinforced with glass fiber, backrest in transparent polycarbonate. Available in a variety of color combinations.  Price for each. Sold in sets of four.

dining.Name: CLIFF DINING TABLE 56 in BEIGE ROPE
dining.Body:
The rope braiding that distinguishes Cliff collection supports the steel top.
The round shape is found in the top and pedestal, the hawsers braiding creates shades and nuance that suggest the typical dynamism of the collection.

dining.Name: CLUB ALUMINUM 86x43 DINING TABLE
dining.Body: Outdoor dining meets perfection with this sleek and simple aluminum table. Choose from our classic finishes to personalize the look or match your current set of dining chairs. Great for enjoying drinks or meals in your outdoor space.

dining.Name: CLUB ALUMINUM 86x43 DINING TABLE IN SLATE GRAY
dining.Body: Outdoor dining meets perfection with this sleek and simple aluminum table. Choose from our classic finishes to personalize the look or match your current set of dining chairs. Great for enjoying drinks or meals in your outdoor space.

dining.Name: CLUB/CROQUET ALUMINUM SIDE CHAIR
dining.Body: Mix items from the Club collection with our other collections, such as Croquet Aluminum and Rustic, to create the perfect outdoor space.

dining.Name: COAST ARM CHAIR - NATURAL TEAK WITH CANVAS BATYLINE SLING
dining.Body: This modern outdoor dining arm chair from the Coast Collection is crafted of ivory canvas mesh, stainless steel and sculpted teak with mortise and tennon construction.

dining.Name: CORAL DINING  SIDE CHAIR - NATURAL
dining.Body: The Coral Dining Chair looks beautiful set around any of Jensen Leisure dining tables. The chair is designed in all-weather wicker. The weave is on a powder coated aluminum frame and the base is made of FSC certified Ipe timber.

dining.Name: CORAL DINING SIDE CHAIR - GRAY
dining.Body: The Coral Dining Chair looks beautiful set around any of Jensen Leisure dining tables. The chair is designed in all-weather wicker. The weave is on a powder coated aluminum frame and the base is made of FSC certified Ipe timber.

dining.Name: CORAL HIGH BACK DINING ARM CHAIR, GRAY
dining.Body: The Coral Dining Chair looks beautiful set around any of Jensen Outdoor dining tables. The chair is designed in all-weather wicker. The weave is on a powder coated aluminum frame and the arms and base are made of FSC certified Ipe timber.

dining.Name: CORAL LOW BACK DINING ARM CHAIR - NATURAL
dining.Body: The Coral Dining Chair looks beautiful set around any of Jensen Leisure dining tables. The chair is designed in all-weather wicker. The weave is on a powder coated aluminum frame and the arms and base are made of FSC certified Ipe timber.

dining.Name: CROQUET ALUMINUM ARM CHAIR - SLATE GRAY
dining.Body: This classic piece of outdoor metal furniture is hand-crafted with wrought aluminum. Each chair features comfortable flat armrests and a slatted back and seat.

dining.Name: CROQUET TEAK ARM CHAIR
dining.Body: Complete teak outdoor dining sets with the addition of our Croquet marine grade teak arm chairs. Each chair includes flat armrests and a slatted back for extra comfort.

dining.Name: CROQUET TEAK SIDE CHAIR - NATURAL
dining.Body: Our intricately designed Croquet chairs artfully complete teak outdoor dining sets. Combine with our Croquet teak wood outdoor tables to create an inviting outdoor space.

dining.Name: CRYSTAL DINING CHAIR, SOLD 2 PER BOX
dining.Body: The Crystal stacking armchair for indoor and outdoor use is produced in clear polycarbonate moulded with gas technology of the second generation. Scratch resistant, UV resistant and available in a variety of colors.

dining.Name: DAISY DINING TABLE RECT. ALU LEGS/63 x 39.5/STANDARD
dining.Body: DAISY dining and chat tables have rounded edges, creating a safe and friendly look all at the same time. The tabletop, made of High Pressure Laminate (HPL) and an upcycled teak wood accent, is durable and low maintenance. Upcycled teak is also used for the legs, creating an interesting mix of materials.

dining.Name: DAISY MAE CUSTOM DINING CHAIR W/TEAK LEGS / 2" SEAT CUSHION IN STAMSKIN
dining.Body: None

dining.Name: DAISY MAE DINING CHAIR W/TEAK LEGS
dining.Body: The DAISY chairs and seater chairs are inviting, comfortable, and fun to look at.  The rounded barrel style backrest comes in two distinct versions: DAISY RAE which has a hand-fitted rope backrest developed for outdoor use and DAISY MAE which has a meticulously handwoven wicker back. Each version is available in four distinct colors, allowing you to create unique patterns from soft and natural to bold and vibrant.  Three distinct leg options are offered for the DAISY dining chairs, depending on style and function: tapered aluminum legs, a swivel base or teak round legs. With its sturdy powder coat base, the swivel versions are great for outdoor clubs, rooftops or high wind areas.

dining.Name: DAISY RAE DINING CHAIR W/ALUMINUM LEGS
dining.Body: The DAISY chairs and seater chairs are inviting, comfortable, and fun to look at. dining.Name: EDEN 99x40 RECYCLED TEAK DINING TABLE
dining.Body: EDEN collection offers premium versions of the teak dining set. Using solid reclaimed teak with brushed tops combined with smoothly sanded legs. Pair with matching collection benches or combined with any dining chair from the MAMAGREEN collection.

dining.Name: ELIO DINING ARMCHAIR / TEAK BASE
dining.Body: Elio, referring to the Greek sun god Helios and designed by Canadian design firm Yabu Pushelberg, is inspired by the motion of light as it reflects and refracts on landscapes and objects. Multiple soft shades of yarn are woven into one strand, which mimics the hues of natural light and makes each chair unique.   The handwoven seat in weather-resistant Tricord rope, draws inward to create a warm, intimate cocoon effect. The chair, perfect for relaxed dining, is framed by natural teak, which supports the seating shell primarily through the back legs that cross the shell.

dining.Name: FLIGHT 45x79 DINING TABLE WITH SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
dining.Body: The Flight dining table features clean lines and modern flares combine to create the Flight collection. Wide forked legs join and narrow at their tips. Available with your choice of glass or aluminum top, with or without an umbrella slot.

dining.Name: FLIGHT 54' ROUND DINING TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
dining.Body: Flight Round dining table features a broad table top that is ideal for small dining groups. Great for both indoor and outdoor use for home or hospitality environments. Available with your choice of glass or aluminum top, with or without an umbrella slot.

dining.Name: FLIGHT MOTION ARM CHAIR GRADE A SLING
dining.Body: The Flight Motion Arm Chair is constructed of cast and extruded aluminum with a Versatex seat and backrest. A fresh combination of classic and modern style. Innovative use of materials, advanced engineering, and thoughtful design.

dining.Name: FLIGHT SQUARE BISTRO DINING TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
dining.Body: The Flight dining table features clean lines and modern flares combine to create the Flight collection. Wide forked legs join and narrow at their tips. Available with your choice of glass or aluminum top, with or without an umbrella slot.

dining.Name: FLIGHT STACKING ARM CHAIR WITH GRADE A SLING
dining.Body: The Flight Dining Armchair offers the ability to save space by stacking pieces four high. Clean, gorgeous lines create the cast and extruded aluminum frame. Beautiful, graceful curves veiled with Versatex mesh in the seat and back.

dining.Name: FLIGHT STACKING SIDE CHAIR WITH GRADE A SLING
dining.Body: The Flight Side Chair features exceptional back support with a subtle recline. Stackable up to four high resulting in a versatile dining collection. Optional pads are available in Suncloth fabrics.

dining.Name: FREMONT 44 x 78 DINING TABLE WITH NOVA ALUMINUM TOP
dining.Body: Brown Jordan introduces Fremont Collection that blends modern simplicity with formal elegance. Designed for outdoor use in any climate, Fremont's finely crafted powder coated aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements. Fremont speaks to our customers' desire for luxury, function and ease, and demonstrates Brown Jordan's exceptional fluency with aluminum.

Fremont speaks to our customers' desire for luxury, function and ease, and demonstrates Brown Jordan's exceptional fluency with aluminum.

dining.Body: The Fremont Sling collection speaks to our customers' desire for luxury, function, and ease and instills a sense of warmth and comfort. The finely crafted aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

dining.Body: Fresh air, healthy food and good friends; it all comes together in the Fresh Air Collection. We offer this modern outdoor collection in a number of sizes to perfectly suit any appetite.

dining.Body: This innovative and contemporary design evokes an attitude of couture furniture while it generates international appeal. Fusion features a uniform and textural pattern that weaves the entire form into a solid structure. In Bronze or Parchment color weave.

dining.Name: FUSION 48x48 INCH DINING TABLE IN BRONZE
dining.Body: The modern look of Fusion successfully blends the cultural elements of European materials, American design, and Asian craftsmanship. This contemporary design evokes an attitude of couture furniture while its bold profile generates international appeal.
