dining.Body: The Grand Traverse Collection achieves lasting durability, ensuring endless seasons of comfort and conversations. Perfectly suited to the sunroom or front lawn, it provides versatility to fit your liefstyle and to the changing seasons in your life.

dining.Body: The Grand Traverse Collection achieves lasting durability, ensuring endless seasons of comfort and conversations. Perfectly suited to the sunroom or front lawn, it provides versatility to fit your liefstyle and to the changing seasons in your life.

dining.Name: H DINING ARM CHAIR / GRADE A
dining.Body: The H collection by Toan Nguyen takes a classic mix of materials for a new spin by adding enticing curves and finishes, for a completely fresh look. Its 3-inch diameter rope create a dramatic, sculptural effect against the streamlined aluminum frames.

dining.Name: HALEY ARM CHAIR IN NATURAL TEAK
dining.Body: This outdoor arm chair from our Haley Collection is a classic luxury piece. Made of durable high-end teak, it features a traditional lattice back design and detailed curves in the armrest. A simple, yet elegant choice for your outdoor dining room.

dining.Name: HALEY TEAK SIDE CHAIR
dining.Body: This outdoor arm chair from our Haley Collection is a classic luxury piece. Made of durable high-end teak, it features a traditional lattice back design and detailed curves in the armrest. A simple, yet elegant choice for your outdoor dining room.

dining.Name: HAMPTONS ARMLESS DINING CHAIR / GRADE A FABRIC/SELF WELT
dining.Body: Versatility and understated elegance means the Hamptons collection is easily adaptable to multiple rooms and decor styles. Self-expression is a defining feature of this collection. Available in 20 custom Lloyd Loom Finishes.

dining.Name: HAMPTONS DINING ARM CHAIR WITH GRADE A FABRIC/SELF WELT
dining.Body: The Hamptons collection is easily adaptable to multiple rooms and decor styles. Free-standing sectional units can be configured as a continuous seating arrangement or an intimate conversation nooks. Available in 20 custom Lloyd Loom Finishes.

dining.Name: HERITAGE FRANKLIN DINING ARM CHAIR / CLASSIC IPE
dining.Body: Welcome outdoor entertaining with open arms with the Franklin Dining Arm Chair from Jensen Outdoor. Fill your days with breezy brunches and your nights with backyard barbecues by pairing this stately chair with your favorite guests and any Ipe dining table.

dining.Name: IBIZA COUNTER STOOL
dining.Body: None

dining.Name: ILLUM 83.5x39.5 DINING TABLE / ALUMINUM BASE / CERAMIC TOP
dining.Body: The simplest designs are often the most elegant ones. The Illum table is kept pure and simple with beautifully curved profiles complementing the slim legs. The tabletop is available in teak or ceramics in various colours. The table comes in two widths: the standard 98cm and a more narrow version of 71cm. The latter is not only the ideal solution for more narrow patios and balconies, but also makes the perfect companion for casual dining.

dining.Name: ILLUM DINING ARM CHAIR / ALUMINUM
dining.Body: The Illum collection refers to the classical Scandinavian furniture archetypes, translated with updated materials for outdoors. Aluminium is used like sculpted wood and Batyline for the seating, serving both looks and durability. Batyline has a lasting high tension and is known to be UV resistant, quick drying and dirt repelling.   The soft-curving back of the chair provides an inviting view and seating comfort. Functionality is paramount for Illum, without compromising on comfort and class.

dining.Name: ITALIA END TABLE
dining.Body: The Italia collection evokes memories of timeless outdoor furniture cast in heavy wrought iron and lasting for generations. This array of seating options reflects this classic look and adds refined details crafted from solid hammered iron bars. The slender framework and simple X-back design pair perfectly with Summer Classics cloud-soft flanged cushions for superb comfort.

dining.Name: JIVE DINING CHAIR/BLK PC ALUMINUM/TEAK BACK/OLEFIN FIBER SEAT
dining.Body: You will love the new JIVE dining chair. JIVE combines teak with tapered aluminum profiles and olefin fiber into an inviting and refreshing chair. This chair will fit both with a contemporary looking table as well with a warm teakwooden table!

dining.Name: KANTAN ALUMINUM DINING ARM CHAIR WITH SUNCLOTH STRAP
dining.Body: Kantan Aluminum exemplifies the breezy spirit of Southern California, the birthplace of Brown Jordan and year-round outdoor furniture. This collection's graceful powder coated frame is offered with 1 inch Suncloth straps.

dining.Name: KANTAN ALUMINUM DINING ARM CHAIR WITH VINYL STRAP
dining.Body: In honor of the company's 70th anniversary in 2015, Brown Jordan introduces a new edition of its iconic Kantan collection with mix and match frame finishes and 1 inch vinyl lace offered in twelve vivid colors.

dining.Name: LAGUNA 41" SQ DINING TABLE
dining.Body: FSC 100% Certified Ipe timber in a clean & contemporary, mid-century modern design.  Designed by Fred Doughty

dining.Name: LAKESHORE 96x42 TEAK DINING TABLE IN NATURAL
dining.Body: Designed with premium, marine grade teak, this outdoor dining table combines a strong shape with delicate details. A new take on the traditional English dining table, it features an symmetrical sunburst table top. Perfect for any outdoor dining space.

dining.Name: LINCOLN BACKLESS BENCH
dining.Body: The Lincoln bench is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

dining.Name: LOOM BACK TEAK DINING ARM CHAIR
dining.Body: The Loom Back Teak Dining Chair is ideal for outdoor settings due to the teaks high oil content, inherent strength and tight grain. We only use sustainably sourced FSC-certified teak in all of our teak products. Available in 20 Custom Lloyd Loom Finishes.

dining.Name: LOW COUNTRY DINING ARM CHAIR
dining.Body: The distinctive Low Country collection lives up to its namesake, bursting with a wealth of styling and antebellum good taste.  Elegant detailing blends with the sturdy fundamental craftsmanship native to the Low Country Collection.

dining.Name: LOW COUNTRY DINING SIDE CHAIR
dining.Body: The distinctive Low Country collection lives up to its namesake, bursting with a wealth of styling and antebellum good taste.  Elegant detailing blends with the sturdy fundamental craftsmanship native to the Low Country Collection.

dining.Name: LUCCA DINING CHAIR, SOLD 2 PER BOX
dining.Body: Stacking chair with the latest generation of air moulding thermoplastic injection. For indoor and outdoor use.

dining.Name: LUCCA DINING CHAIR, TROPICAL GREEN, SOLD 2 PER BOX
dining.Body: Stacking chair with the latest generation of air moulding thermoplastic injection. For indoor and outdoor use.

dining.Name: MACKINAC ARMLESS DINING CHAIR/GRADE B FABRIC/CONTRAST WELT
dining.Body: The Mackinac collection is suspended in a more innocent time. Enjoy simple pleasures within its open weave, deep seated comfort. The romantic styling of this collection is complemented by its bold woven framework and luxuriously comfortable seating.

dining.Name: MACKINAC DINING ARMCHAIR / GRADE B FABRIC/CONTRASTING WELT
dining.Body: The Mackinac collection is suspended in a more innocent time. Enjoy simple pleasures within its open weave, deep seated comfort. The romantic styling of this collection is complemented by its bold woven framework and luxuriously comfortable seating.

dining.Name: MAD 40x40 DINING TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: With three sizes, the square design of the MAD dining tables bring versatility, style and comfort to your patio, balcony and garden. Available in 33x33, 40x40 and 40x85, with 13 colors to choose from.

dining.Name: MAD 85x40 DINING TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: With three sizes at three heights, the design of the MAD dining tables bring versatility, style and comfort to your patio, balcony and bar.

dining.Name: MAD DINING ARM CHAIR / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: The MAD dining chair design complements the MAD tables as well as any table from our collection. Now with FUSION mix or match frame and slat colors for an almost endless array of design possibilities. 10 frame color options and 15 slat color options.

dining.Name: MAD DINING SIDE CHAIR / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: The MAD dining chair design complements the MAD tables as well as any table from our collection. Now with FUSION mix or match frame and slat colors for an almost endless array of design possibilities. 10 frame color options and 15 slat color options.

dining.Name: MALÉ DINING CHAIR
dining.Body: The wide seat of the Malè dining chair in plastic material is supported by a rigid and squared steel frame, making it perfect to complete your garden furniture.

dining.Name: MARCO COFFEE TABLE
dining.Body: Contemporary in style, the Marco Coffee table is made of a durable aluminum base and a superstone table top. Its intersecting legs evoke a three-dimensional, yet minimalist look.

dining.Name: MAXXIMUS 84.5x39.5 DINING TABLE / PC STEEL BASE / HPL TOP / STANDARD FINISH
dining.Body: MAMAGREEN's  MAXXIMUS table is designed to be the perfect table for entertaining family and friends. The top is available in either our low maintenance High Pressure Laminate (HPL) or in eco-friendly recycled teak wood. The frame is made of a sturdy powder-coated steel. Completing the collection, matching benches are available to create a picnic style arrangement.

dining.Name: MAXXIMUS BENCH HPL 71" - PC GALVANIZED STEEL, PREMIUM FINISH
dining.Body: Size matters, or does it. Indeed, it does when it comes to extendable dining tables.  MAMAGREENâ„¢s expandable table + bench  collection just got extended with the longest table to date: the MAXXIMUS. Designed to be the perfect table for entertaining family and friends.  Completing the collection, this matching bench is available to create a picnic style arrangement.  Extend your outdoor activities to the maximum.

dining.Name: MAXXIMUS EXTENSION TABLE HPL/FRAME GALVANIZED STEEL, PREM FIN
dining.Body: MAMAGREEN's expandable table collection just got extended with the longest table to date: the MAXXIMUS. Designed to be the perfect table for entertaining family and friends. It comes in two different sizes. Our largest table extends in 3 stages up to an amazing 166 inches (425 cm) while the other table is slightly shorter, extending in 2 stages up to 135 inches (345 cm).  The top is available in either our low maintenance High Pressure Laminate (HPL) or in eco-friendly recycled teak wood. The frame is made of a sturdy powder-coated steel, while the smooth extension mechanism uses German hardware.  Completing the collection, matching benches are available to create a picnic style arrangement.

dining.Name: MAXXIMUS PREMIUM TEAK / POWDER COATED GALVANIZED STEEL
dining.Body: MAMAGREEN's  MAXXIMUS table is designed to be the perfect table for entertaining family and friends. The top is available in either our low maintenance High Pressure Laminate (HPL) or in eco-friendly recycled teak wood. The frame is made of a sturdy powder-coated steel. Completing the collection, matching benches are available to create a picnic style arrangement.

dining.Name: MAYA 31.5 X 31.5 SQUARE TABLE
dining.Body: HPL compact laminated tops 12 mm with the latest generation of air moulding thermoplastic legs. Can be disassembled.

dining.Name: MAYA DINING CHAIR, SOLD 2 PER BOX
dining.Body: In designing Maya, the designers developed a formal shape yet suitable for different ambiances; contemporary, classic, informal or elegant, where it easly settles in. A color range including brights as well as neutral tones. For indoor and outdoor use.

dining.Name: MBRACE 79x36 TEAK DINING TABLE
dining.Body: DEDON takes a joyfully unconventional approach to outdoor dining, adding all teak tables to the MBRACE collection for the very first time. The result is an eye-catching, instantly likable table that captures the spirit of barefoot luxury.

dining.Name: MESA ARMLESS DINING CHAIR - NO CUSHION
dining.Body: Robust urban styling defines the Mesa Collection. Mesa affords exceptional comfort and distinctive style. Versatility is an intended benefit, from individual groupings to sectional transitions, Mesa is the perfect compliment to any outdoor space.

dining.Name: MONNA STACKING SIDE CHAIR, SOLD 2 PER BOX
dining.Body: Monna chair is produced with a single injection of polypropylene reinforced with glass fiber obtained by means of the latest generation of air moulding technology with neutral tones. For indoor and outdoor use. tones. For indoor and outdoor use.

dining.Name: MONO DINING CHAIR / PC ALUMINUM / TWITCHELL  UPHOLSTERY
dining.Body: The MONO collection features one of the most casually comfortable dining chairs with full wrap around Leisuretex all-weather upholstery means full support, comfort and no cushion necessary.

dining.Name: MOOD ARMCHAIR - GRADE D FABRIC CUSHION + LUMBAR
dining.Body: The airy design of the Mood collection and its warm combination of teak and handwoven backs will immediately create an intimate atmosphere on your patio. The rounded design of the durable teak gives the chair a warm and friendly tone. The weave in Tricord has a very soft touch, but can nevertheless defy all weather conditions. Tribù has developed a range of natural colours that fit in with any type of outdoor environment. The back cushions are available in various styles to match every taste.

dining.Name: MOOD DINING ARMCHAIR / TEAK BASE
dining.Body: The airy design of the Mood collection and its warm combination of teak and handwoven backs will immediately create an intimate atmosphere on your patio. The rounded design of the durable teak gives the chair a warm and friendly tone. The weave in Tricord has a very soft touch, but can nevertheless defy all weather conditions. Tribu has developed a range of natural colours that fit in with any type of outdoor environment. The back cushions are available in various styles to match every taste.

dining.Name: NINIX 95-142x39 EXTENSION DINING TABLE/BRUSHED SS/TEAK TOP
dining.Body: NINIX extendable dining table is both minimal and maximal in material selection and refinement. The hairline finish of the stainless steel frame, the woodwork in carefully selected teak optimizes ergonomics. Several frame finish and top options available.

dining.Name: NINIX ARM CHAIR/BRUSHED STAINLESS STEEL/CAPPUCCINO BATYLINE
dining.Body: NINIX dining armchair is perfect for both formal and informal outdoor dining. The hairline finish of the stainless steel frame and the durable batyline sling emphasizes it's optimized ergonomics. Almost a pity to use outdoors.

dining.Name: NOX 53x39 DINING TABLE / CERAMIC TOP
dining.Body: The generous Nox table is nothing short of a masterpiece, featuring a sophisticated table top of glazed lava stone. The glazed slats, made of 400-year old lava stone from the Vesuvius, mirror the sky and are reminiscent of rippling water. The coloured glazing is added by hand. Baking at a high temperature creates a subtle craquelure finish, giving each table a unique look and making the stone heat, water, UV and stain-resistant, not to mention easy to maintain. The Nox tabletop rests on a slender yet strong frame made of powdercoated stainless steel, giving the table a surprisingly light and elegant look.

dining.Name: O-ZON ARM CHAIR - BRUSHED STAINLESS WITH WHITE BATYLINE
dining.Body: Look up at the sun, and you will realize where we got our inspiration for the O-ZON collection. When struck by its blinding appearance, just put on your sunglasses. O-ZON dining armchair available in various color combinations.

dining.Name: O-ZON ARM CHAIR - EP STAINLESS WITH BLACK BATYLINE
dining.Body: Look up at the sun, and you will realize where we got our inspiration for the O-ZON collection. When struck by its blinding appearance, just put on your sunglasses. O-ZON dining armchair available in various color combinations.

dining.Name: O-ZON SIDE CHAIR/BRUSHED STAINLESS WITH WHITE BATYLINE
dining.Body: Look up at the sun, and you will realize where we got our inspiration for the O-ZON collection. When struck by its blinding appearance, just put on your sunglasses. O-ZON dining side chair available in various color combinations.

dining.Name: O-ZON SIDE CHAIR/ELECTRO POLISHED STAINLESS / BLACK BATYLINE
dining.Body: Look up at the sun, and you will realize where we got our inspiration for the O-ZON collection. When struck by its blinding appearance, just put on your sunglasses. O-ZON dining side chair available in various color combinations.

dining.Name: OLIVER DINING ARM CHAIR / GRADE E
dining.Body: Like every piece in the Oliver collection, the Dining Armchair is a study in juxtapositions. The bold angles and lines of the armchair’s low-profile frame contrast with the soft curves of the bucket seat while the angular round back legs contrast with flat twisted arms, creating the perfect proportion and a striking silhouette with long lasting appeal. In addition to highlighting Brown Jordan’s unrivaled expertise in metal craftsmanship, the design of the Dining Armchair showcases our innovative use of woven rope. This durable, heritage material - “a modern updated look to wicker” - is handwoven onto the actual frames by skilled artisans in Indonesia. Completing the look, impeccably tailored cushions hug the curves of the rope seat and cosset the body in luxury.

dining.Name: OPAL 2.5FT BENCH WITH ARMRESTS (WSL)
dining.Body: The Opal bench is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

dining.Body: The Opal bistro table is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

dining.Name: OPAL 72 INCH BENCH WITHOUT ARMS
dining.Body: This elegant and minimalistic bar table is made from laser cut aluminium. Simple, yet refined to blend in with any exterior or interior setting. It comes with a powder coated surface and requires a minimum of cleaning and maintenance.

dining.Body: The Opal table is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

dining.Body: The Opal Square Dining Table is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

dining.Name: OSCAR 18 X 51 BENCH GRADE A
dining.Body: Design in collaboration with Ann Marie Vering, the Oscar Bench is perfect for indoors our out. It's powder coated frame and multi-dimensional rope forms striking silhouette visible from all angles. It's striking design and plush cushions make it the best-in-class daybed for designer comfort. Available in all Brown Jordan finishes and fabric. Rope colors are Pebble and Coal.

dining.Name: OSCAR 18 X 51 BENCH GRADE B

Available in all Brown Jordan finishes and fabric. Rope colors are Pebble and Coal.

It's powder coated  frame and multi-dimensional rope forms striking silhouette visible from all angles. It's striking design and plush cushions make it the best-in-class daybed for designer comfort. Available in all Brown Jordan finishes and fabric. Rope colors are Pebble and Coal.

dining.Name: OSCAR BENCH 18 X 75 GRADE A

It's curved frame and multi-dimensional rope forms striking silhouette visible from all angles. It's striking design and plush cushions make it the best-in-class daybed for designer comfort. Available in all Brown Jordan finishes and fabric. Rope colors are Pebble and Coal.

dining.Name: OSTREA DINING CHAIR - ANTHRACITE
dining.Body: You donâ€™t have to be a Latinist to understand that â€˜Ostreaâ€™ translates as â€˜oysterâ€™. Designer Matthias De Ferm was probably enjoying a savoury seafood platter when he envisioned the lines of this highly original chair. Moreover, he managed to translate these organic shapes into a chair with exceptional ergonomics. It takes an artist to roll, bend and weld stainless-steel tubes into this extraordinary masterpiece

dining.Name: PACIFIC SLING ARM CHAIR / 2 PER BOX
dining.Body: Pacific armchair with Batyline fabric from Serge Ferrari is made from a weather-proof, UV-protected resin reinforced by glass fiber that stands up to summer showers and strong sun, making it the ideal, worry-free addition to your outdoor seating area. This versatile armchair pairs perfectly with a wide range of other outdoor tables. For domestic or commercial use.

dining.Name: PAIGE 60" ROUND TEAK DINING TABLE
dining.Body: Built from plantation-grown high quality teak, the Paige Teak collection embraces simplicity at its finest. The Paige Teak Console makes entertaining easy with a generous surface that seamlessly converts to a bar or buffet.

dining.Name: PAIGE 60" ROUND TEAK DINING TABLE OYSTER
dining.Body: Built from plantation-grown high quality teak, the Paige Teak collection embraces simplicity at its finest. The Paige Teak Console makes entertaining easy with a generous surface that seamlessly converts to a bar or buffet.

dining.Body: Its special charm is created through the contrasts in its design: the linear form is made even more striking because of the gently curving lines. With its no frills form the furniture of the PANAMA Collection attractively represents the New Edge Design.

dining.Name: PANAMA ARM CHAIR IN BRONZE (MTO PRICE/QTY, 5 PC MIN)

dining.Body: Available with or without an umbrella hole to cater to various needs. Lengthy and spacious, this table is the ideal piece for larger group functions. Sturdy construction with a frame that is powder coated for a long-life finish.

dining.Name: PARKWAY 54 ROUND UMBRELLA DINING TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
dining.Body: Available with or without an umbrella hole to cater to various needs. Coordinate with any sling or cushion Parkway seating pieces. Perfect for outdoor gatherings during any season.

dining.Name: PARKWAY CUSHION ARM CHAIR WITH GRADE A FABRIC
dining.Body: Inspired by the golden era of Modernism, Parkway conjures images of a stately past. A broad, flat extrusion creates a smooth, pleasing touch and complements the frame's lengthy, slender profile. Plush cushions complete this lounging dining chair.

dining.Name: PARKWAY FLEX SLING ARM CHAIR
dining.Body: The Parkway dining armchair is beautifully crafted for professional, hospitality, and homeowner use. The parabolic mesh conforms to the curves and movements of the body for maximum comfort.

dining.Name: PARKWAY SERVING CART WITH GLASS TOP AND SHELF
dining.Body: Large wheels are added for convenient mobility. Three classy, spacious layers of glass tabletop. Smooth, sleek lines are hand forged from extruded aluminum.

dining.Name: PARKWAY SLING STACKING ARM CHAIR/GRADE A
dining.Body: With its pure lines and precise geometry, Parkway Sling offers an inspired take on modernist design. The collection echoes rigorous simplicity, adding superior ergonomics with a supple Parabolic sling that flexes and offers support.

dining.Name: PASADENA 45x79 DINING TABLE / SOLID TOP
dining.Body: Pasadena defines understated sophistication with its sleek profile. The collection frame features a smooth, flat aluminum extrusion that is gently curvilinear. Sweeping lines seen on the arms and back legs highlight the beauty of the chair's construction.

dining.Name: PASADENA PADDED SLING ARM CHAIR WITH GRADE A SLING
dining.Body: Pasadena defines understated sophistication with its sleek profile. The collection frame features a smooth, flat aluminum extrusion that is gently curvilinear. Sweeping lines seen on the arms and back legs highlight the beauty of the chair's construction.

dining.Name: PASADENA PADDED SLING SIDE CHAIR WITH GRADE A SLING
dining.Body: Pasadena defines understated sophistication with its sleek profile. The collection frame features a smooth, flat aluminum extrusion that is gently curvilinear. Sweeping lines seen on the arms and back legs highlight the beauty of the chair's construction.

dining.Name: PASADENA SLING ARM CHAIR/GRADE A

dining.Body: Pasadena defines understated sophistication with its sleek profile. The collection frame features a smooth, flat aluminum extrusion that is gently curvilinear. Sweeping lines seen on the arms and back legs highlight the beauty of the chair's construction.

dining.Name: PENINSULA ARM CHAIR IN RAFFIA AND SANDALWOOD FINISH
dining.Body: This outdoor arm chair from the Peninsula Collection embodies the same light and airy spirit as the name that inspires it. Made of our ultra-realistic Raffia wicker, it features an intricate woven design over a brown sandalwood base.

dining.Name: PIA DINING CHAIR - SOLD 2 PER BOX
dining.Body: Pia chair is produced with a single injection of polypropylene reinforced with glass fiber obtained by means of the latest generation of air moulding technology with neutral tones. For indoor and outdoor use.

dining.Name: PLAY ARM CHAIR / STONE AND CHALK
dining.Body: PLAY puts unprecedented freedom of choice in the hands of consumers. This stackable chair has an injection-moulded polypropylene frame with a die-cast plastic seat and an optional die-cast plastic backrest. It combines design with everyday practicality.

dining.Name: PLAY SIDE CHAIR, CHALK AND CARBON, (MTO)
dining.Body: PLAY puts unprecedented freedom of choice in the hands of consumers. This stackable chair has an injection-moulded polypropylene frame with a die-cast plastic seat and an optional die-cast plastic backrest. It combines design with everyday practicality.

dining.Name: PORTSMOUTH 56x56 SQUARE DINING TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: Designed for living and made for life, The Portsmouth 56 inch Square Dining Table is THE family table. So flexible and accommodating that nobody is ever left out. Other sizes available are 30x30, 42x42, 42x56, 42x72, 42x110 and 44x130.

dining.Name: PROVANCE ALUMINUM SWIVEL ROCKER
dining.Body: The best of both worlds: comfort and class. The Provance swivel rocker dining chair blends seamlessly with metal patio furniture sets and features a gorgeous double latticework design.

dining.Name: QT ARM CHAIR/BRUSHED STAINLESS STEEL/CAPPUCCINO BATYLINE
dining.Body: It is very difficult not to appreciate the unique refined shape of the QT. With slim stainless steel profiles, the concept has been carefully studied to not only offer maximal stability, looks and comfort but also to ensure the chair is easily stackable.

dining.Name: QUANTUM 32 INCH SQUARE TABLE / GLASS TOP NO UMBRELLA HOLE
dining.Body: Quantum raised the bar and set a new standard for the casual furniture industry. Quantum has garnered international acclaim, including trade and industry award honors. Fluid lines are the distinguishing characteristics of this design.

dining.Name: QUANTUM 36 INCH RD DINING TABLE / NOVA TOP / UMBRELLA HOLE
dining.Body: Quantum raised the bar and set a new standard for the casual furniture industry. Quantum has garnered international acclaim, including trade and industry award honors. Fluid lines are the distinguishing characteristics of this design.

dining.Body: The Richmond Balcony Table is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

dining.Name: RICHMOND DINING SIDE CHAIR
dining.Body: The Richmond side chair is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina. Seat cushion sold separately.

dining.Body: Inspired by the city known for its great art, spectacular architecture and vivid sense of style, our Roma Collection has an easy elegance and just enough detail to create visual interest and give outdoor spaces a sophisticated lift.

dining.Body: Complete wicker patio furniture sets with this versatile side chair. The finest hand-woven wicker resin adorns the seat and back of the Rustic chair, providing long term comfort.

dining.Name: SALEM 48 INCH ROUND DINING TABLE / STANDARD COLORS
dining.Body: Smaller in scale but big in personality, the 48 inch Salem Round Dining table is available in a wide variety of colors. Daring you to add a splash of fun! Also available in 60 inch.

dining.Name: SATELLITE 28 INCH ROUND DINING TABLE IN WHITE
dining.Body: The SATELLITE collection is elegantly simple, streamlined and modern. And with tabletops of scratch and moisture-resistant HPL and bases made from an innovative frost-proof ceramic, the collection is as practical and durable as it is pleasing to the eye.

dining.Name: SEASHELL ARM CHAIR IN CHALK
dining.Body: Open shapes and breezy outlines are merged with comfort. The wide backrests are ergonomically designed, hugging the body comfortably in a timeless design.

dining.Name: SEASHELL SIDE CHAIR IN CHALK
dining.Body: Open, light shapes and breezy outlines are merged with comfort, the ability to stack, and sturdiness in the new SEASHELL collection from DEDON.

dining.Name: SEAX 39x39 DINING TABLE W/WHITE BASE AND TEAK TOP
dining.Body: SeaX stands for elegance and modernity. From the streamline of the folding chairs to the understated innovation of the dining tables, SeaX perfectly reflects meticulous attention to detail and thoughtful approach to materials, textures and colors.

dining.Name: SEAX 55" ROUND DINING TABLE, BLACK/EBONY TOP (MTO/10 PC MIN)
dining.Body: SeaX is elegant with a thoughtful approach to materials and textures. This dining table has a powder-coated aluminum base and a mineral-composite tabletop twice as strong as glass, resistant to frost, scuffs and UV-rays. Also available with teak tabletop.

dining.Name: SEAX ARMCHAIR/BLACK FRAME/SAIL TAUPE TEXTILE (MTO/50 PC MIN)
dining.Body: SeaX stands for elegance with attention to detail and a thoughtful approach to materials, textures and colors. Engineered for easy folding, this generously proportioned dining chair features water resistant textile and powder coated die cast aluminum.

dining.Name: SKYE WOVEN ARM CHAIR
dining.Body: This stackable arm chair beautifully accessorizes wicker patio furniture sets. The entire surface of each chair features artistically woven wicker.

dining.Name: SKYE WOVEN SIDE CHAIR
dining.Body: The stackable Skye side chair is a versatile addition to wicker patio furniture sets. Covered in woven wicker, each chair is a classic addition to an outdoor dining set.

dining.Name: SOFTSCAPE STRAP DINING ARM CHAIR
dining.Body: Characterized transitional styling, Softscape represents the innovation and refined aesthetics for which Brown Jordan is known. Softscape reflects the needs and preferences of design enthusiasts who are creating stylish interior and exterior spaces.

dining.Name: SONOMA 40x80 GATHERING TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: Rustic in strength, modern in design, the Sonoma Gathering Table marries simplicity with sophistication. Gather at the garden or on the patio. Versatile, unique and crafted only by Seaside Casual Furniture.

dining.Name: SONOMA 76 INCH BENCH / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: Rustic in strength, modern in design, the Sonoma 76 inch bench features the unique X and modern trestle styling of the Sonoma Gathering Table. Designed for dining but can also stand alone in parks, pathways and lobbies or anywhere people need a place to rest.

dining.Name: SPRITZ DINING SIDE CHAIR (sold in sets of 4)
dining.Body: Spritz modern outdoor furniture collection, designed by Archirivolto Design for Vondom. The inspiration for this collection comes from a picture of white wooden fences that run along the beach, forming perfectly aligned strips. The collection captures the stolen details of this image.

dining.Name: STILL 45x99 DINING TABLE WITH SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
dining.Body: Enjoy this unique, rectangular shaped, aluminum table from the Still collection. Featuring a sleek profile ideal for easy clean-up. Crafted of a durable, powder coated finish for harsh weather conditions.

dining.Name: STILL 60 ROUND DINING TABLE
dining.Body: Elevate the ambiance with this round top dining table. Featuring a sleek, aluminum surface ideal for outdoor dining and easy clean-up. Crafted of powder coated materials for a long lasting finish.

dining.Name: STILL ARM CHAIR WITH FLEX SLING
dining.Body: Conveniently used as extra seating or as part of an entire set. Ideal when combined with Still Collections loose cushion ottoman. Sturdy powder coated frame work, sustainable against weather elements.

dining.Name: STILL SIDE CHAIR WITH FLEX FABRIC
dining.Body: Conveniently used as extra seating or as part of an entire set. Ideal when combined with Still Collections loose cushion ottoman. Sturdy powder coated frame work, sustainable against weather elements.

dining.Name: STRETCH 47x47 DINING TABLE WITH SOLID TOP
dining.Body: Stretch by Richard Frinier reveals a modern take on vintage Brown Jordan strap designs evolving and elevating previous perceptions about classical strap furniture by incorporating elastomeric strap material in two different widths hand-woven together to achieve a refined and comfortable seating surface conforming to a soft-modern frame design evoking a clear sense of balance and design integrity.

dining.Name: STRIPE DINING ARM CHAIR/PC ALUMINUM/ TWITCHELL UPHOLSTERY
dining.Body: MAMAGREEN Stripe sling brings fun, vibrancy and design flair to any outdoor area. Comfortable and absolutely all-weather, choose from four of these nautically inspired, barcode spaced, color combinations, available across a complete range of styles.

dining.Name: STUDIE ARMCHAIR
dining.Body: Made from 100% aluminium, Studie boasts a lightweight, hard-wearing frame that can withstand any conditions, even by the sea. The curved seats are exceptionally comfortable, hugging the curves of the body. Theyâ€™re equipped with silencing pads (patented by Fermob) that absorb noise when they move, making them easy to live with. And the stacking design means storing them away is childâ€™s play.

dining.Name: SWIM 45 X 45 DINING TABLE WITH SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
dining.Body: The Swim collection represents a fresh, light and sporty perspective for outdoor and casual living spaces with its linear profile made of powder-coated aluminum frames and Versatex mesh taut sling upholstery.

dining.Name: SWIM 45 X 79 DINING TABLE WITH SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
dining.Body: The Swim collection represents a fresh, light and sporty perspective for outdoor and casual living spaces with its linear profile made of powder-coated aluminum frames and Versatex mesh taut sling upholstery.

dining.Name: SWIM 45 x 99 DINING TABLE WITH SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
dining.Body: The Swim collection represents a fresh, light and sporty perspective for outdoor and casual living spaces with its linear profile made of powder-coated aluminum frames and Versatex mesh taut sling upholstery.

dining.Name: SWIM 45 x 99 DINING UMBRELLA TABLE WITH SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
dining.Body: The Swim collection represents a fresh, light and sporty perspective for outdoor and casual living spaces with its linear profile made of powder-coated aluminum frames and VersatexÃ‚ mesh taut sling upholstery.

dining.Name: SWIM SLING ARM CHAIR GRADE A
dining.Body: The Swim collection represents a fresh, light and sporty perspective for outdoor and casual living spaces with its linear profile made of powder-coated aluminum frames and Versatex mesh taut sling upholstery.

dining.Name: SYM 28 INCH DINING BENCH / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: The SYM Dining Benches are perfect for maximizing seating options around longer dining tables. SYM color combinations provide virtually endless design options with a youthful modern appeal. Use for occasional seating as well.

dining.Name: SYM 36 x 80 DINING TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: The SYM 80 Dining Table offers stylish elegance with a modern flair. An inviting table base that leaves room for guests at any side of the table. Seats eight comfortably and exudes elegance and style with the SYM Arm and Side Chairs.

dining.Name: SYM 72 INCH DINING BENCH / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: The SYM Dining Benches are perfect for maximizing seating options around longer dining tables. SYM color combinations provide virtually endless design options with a youthful modern appeal. Use for occasional seating as well.

dining.Name: SYM ARM CHAIR / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: Graceful curves combined with a unique seat and back configuration on the SYM Chair tips the scale toward modern design. Frames are offered in five standard colors, with the option to add a bright or contrasting seat and back color from a palette of nine.

dining.Name: SYM SIDE CHAIR / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: Graceful curves combined with a unique seat and back configuration on the SYM Chair tips the scale toward modern design. Frames are offered in five standard colors, with the option to add a bright or contrasting seat and back color from a palette of nine.

dining.Name: TEAK 30 INCH ROUND BISTRO TABLE
dining.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

dining.Name: TEAK 48 INCH ROUND DINING TABLE WITH TRESTLE BASE
dining.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

dining.Name: TEAK 58x20 CONSOLE TABLE WITH TAPERED LEG - ANTIQUED FINISH
dining.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

dining.Name: TEAK 79x14 BENCH WITH TRESTLE BASE
dining.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

dining.Name: TEAK 84 INCH OVAL DINING TABLE WITH SLED BASE
dining.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

dining.Name: TEAK 87x39 DINING TABLE WITH TRESTLE BASE
dining.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

dining.Name: TEAK 99x40 DINING TABLE WITH TRESTLE BASE
dining.Body: This 100 inch rectangular teak dining table is ideal for outdoor settings due to its inherent strength and tight grain. We only use sustainably sourced FSC-certified teak in all of our teak products.

dining.Name: TOBAGO DINING CHAIR WITH GRADE B FABRIC/NO WELT
dining.Body: The Tobago collection sets the standard for excellence in alternative deep-seated design. Full fluid lines ignite the imagination and enhance the look and feel of this boldly woven style. Tobago collection is designed to be memorable.

dining.Name: TOPAZ ARM CHAIR - NATURAL SLING
dining.Body: The Topaz Collection is created of FSC 100%, solid heartwood, Ipe timber. A clean and contemporary array of Dining, Deepseating and Accent pieces to enhance an expansive outdoor room or a metro, compact balcony.

dining.Name: TOPAZ ARM CHAIR WITH PONDEROSA SLING
dining.Body: The Topaz Collection is created of FSC 100%, solid heartwood, Ipe timber. A clean and contemporary array of dining, deep seating and accent pieces to enhance an expansive outdoor room or a metro, compact balcony.

dining.Name: TOPAZ FOLDING  SLING ARM CHAIR - NATURAL
dining.Body: The Topaz Collection is created of FSC 100%, solid heartwood, Ipe timber. A clean and contemporary array of Dining, Deepseating and Accent pieces to enhance an expansive outdoor room or a metro, compact balcony.

dining.Name: TOPAZ FOLDING  SLING ARM CHAIR - PONDEROSA
dining.Body: The Topaz Collection is created of FSC 100%, solid heartwood, Ipe timber. A clean and contemporary array of Dining, Deepseating and Accent pieces to enhance an expansive outdoor room or a metro, compact balcony.

dining.Name: TOPAZ FOLDING CHAIR
dining.Body: The Topaz Collection is created of FSC 100%, solid heartwood, Ipe timber. A clean and contemporary array of Dining, Deepseating and Accent pieces to enhance an expansive outdoor room or a metro, compact balcony.

dining.Name: TOPAZ FOLDING SLING SIDE CHAIR - NATURAL SLING
dining.Body: The Topaz Collection is created of FSC 100%, solid heartwood, Ipe timber. A clean and contemporary array of Dining, Deepseating and Accent pieces to enhance an expansive outdoor room or a metro, compact balcony.

dining.Name: TOPAZ OVAL EXTENDING DINING TABLE
dining.Body: The Topaz Collection is created of FSC 100%, solid heartwood, Ipe timber. A clean and contemporary array of Dining, Deepseating and Accent pieces to enhance an expansive outdoor room or a metro, compact balcony.

dining.Name: TOPAZ SIDE CHAIR WITH WIDER SEAT
dining.Body: The Topaz Side Chair is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

dining.Name: TOPAZ STACKING ARM CHAIR - NATURAL (sold in sets of 2)
dining.Body: The Topaz Collection is created of FSC 100%, solid heartwood, Ipe timber. A clean and contemporary array of Dining, Deepseating and Accent pieces to enhance an expansive outdoor room or a metro, compact balcony.

dining.Name: TOSCA DINING ARMCHAIR - GRADE D FABRIC
dining.Body: The Tosca outdoor collection is simultaneously warm and inviting, stylish and intriguing. It was the first time Tribù called upon a female designer to draw an outdoor furniture piece with a more feminine touch. Monica Armani succeeded in her challenge: rounded forms, tapered legs and an elegant seating shell in powdercoated stainless steel, upholstered with extra-wide braiding. The material for the braiding is genuinely innovative : foam mousse is encased in a seamless sheath of knitted textilene and polyolefine which makes the material weather-resistant, but also surprisingly soft to the touch.

dining.Name: TRADITIONAL PICNIC TABLE / STANDARD COLORS
dining.Body: The traditional picnic table offers the same look and convenience of other picnic tables, but withstands the elements. No painting, no sanding, no splinters.

dining.Name: TRAVERSE 59x33 FOLDING DINING TABLE/WHITE PC ALUMINUM/TEAK TOP
dining.Body: This striking new interpretation is inspired by the traditional English gateleg folding table. It's a cool and convenient piece of furniture. Half open, it works perfectly as a table for two. At full size it caters for six very impressed guests.

dining.Name: UKIYO ARMCHAIR
dining.Body: When visiting Japan designer Monica Armani was inspired by the signs and the sophisticated Japanese culture, especially the eye for detail which also describes her design aesthetic. For the Ukiyo armchairs, she worked on the balance between curved and taut lines and the visual weight of each element that concludes an armchair thatâ€™s comfortable, elegant and exudes pure design.

dining.Name: VENETIAN 44 x 98 DINING TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
dining.Body: Venetian's refined silhouette is highlighted by timeless Neoclassic details and easily accents eclectic living scapes that require a more formal design presence.

dining.Name: VENETIAN 48 INCH ROUND DINING TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
dining.Body: Venetian's refined silhouette is highlighted by timeless Neoclassic details. Venetian tables easily accents eclectic living scapes that require a more formal design presence.

dining.Name: VENETIAN ARM CHAIR WITH SEAT CUSHION IN GRADE A FABRIC
dining.Body: The x-back and cross-stretcher on the Venetian chair are elegantly scaled by rectangular lines, including a subtly contoured back. Spiral details on the arms and architectural details on the legs are proportionately placed to enhance the overall balance.

dining.Name: VENETIAN SIDE CHAIR WITH CUSHION IN GRADE A FABRIC
dining.Body: The x-back and cross-stretcher on the Venetian chair are elegantly scaled by rectangular lines, including a subtly contoured back. Spiral details on the arms and architectural details on the legs are proportionately placed to enhance the overall balance.

dining.Name: VERONA DINING CHAIR, SOLD IN SETS OF 2
dining.Body: Verona chair is stackable and made of durable weather-resistant resin reinforced with glass fiber. Non-metallic frame will never unravel, rust or decay. It is UV protected which insures the colors will not fade. For indoor and outdoor use.

dining.Name: VIGOR 126x18 DINING BENCH/WHITE PC ALUMINUM/MAHOGANY SEAT
dining.Body: Available in teak or mahogany, the beams of the Vigor collection are jointed to the aluminum frame by obvious dovetail shaped strips. An old technical solution, that proves today to work aesthetically as well! The picnic-set taken to an unseen level!

dining.Name: VIGOR 126x43 DINING TABLE/WHITE PC ALUMINUM/MAHOGANY TOP
dining.Body: Available in teak or mahogany, the beams of the Vigor collection are jointed to the aluminum frame by obvious dovetail shaped strips. An old technical solution, that proves today to work aesthetically as well! The picnic-set taken to an unseen level!

dining.Name: VIGOR DINING STOOL/WHITE COATED ALUMINUM/MAHOGANY SEAT
dining.Body: Available in teak or mahogany, the beams of the Vigor collection are jointed to the aluminum frame by obvious dovetail shaped strips. An old technical solution, that proves today to work aesthetically as well! The picnic-set taken to an unseen level!

dining.Name: WAVE DINING ARM CHAIR WITH FLEX SLING
dining.Body: Constructed in extruded aluminum, its contoured seating surfaces twist in a ribbon-like profile, giving it a sense of motion and enhancing its shape. With its ergonomic seating it conforms to the range of human shapes, weights and also to movement.

dining.Name: WINDSOR 50x24 BUFFET TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
dining.Body: This multi-functional table is great for preparing, serving and storing. The Large Windsor Buffet table complements any of our collections and provides that extra space you are always searching for. Simple, elegant and practical.

dining.Name: WOODLAWN 84x40 DINING TABLE
dining.Body: Our marine-grade teak material, carved with subtle details, comprises this outdoor coffee table from our Woodlawn Collection. Perfect for adding a modern feel to your outdoor room.

dining.Name: XQI 31 INCH SQUARE TEAK DINING TABLE
dining.Body: Royal Botania XQI dining furniture includes a range of rectangular and square solid teak outdoor tables. The XQI understated contemporary design makes this first class teak patio furniture ideal for use in contemporary and more traditional surroundings.

dining.Name: XQI 71 x 35 TEAK DINING TABLE
dining.Body: Royal Botania XQI dining furniture includes a range of rectangular and square solid teak outdoor tables. The XQI understated contemporary design makes this first class teak patio furniture ideal for use in contemporary and more traditional surroundings.

dining.Name: XQI FOLDING DINING CHAIR - TEAK WITH BRONZE BATYLINE
dining.Body: What makes the XQI folding dining chair exquisite. It's the perfectly balanced appearance in the warm teak wood and the superb comfort offered from the batyline seat. Batyline available in bronze, black or white.

dining.Name: XQI STACKING ARM CHAIR/TEAK FRAME/BLACK BATYLINE
dining.Body: What makes the XQI dining chair exquisite. It's the perfectly balanced appearance in the warm teak wood and the superb comfort offered from the batyline seat. Batyline available in bronze, black or white.

dining.Name: XQI STACKING ARM CHAIR/TEAK FRAME/BRONZE BATYLINE
dining.Body: What makes the XQI dining chair exquisite. It's the perfectly balanced appearance in the warm teak wood and the superb comfort offered from the batyline seat. Batyline available in bronze, black or white.

fabric.Name: SUNBRELLA UPHOLSTERY  ACCORD II CRIMSON
fabric.Body: Sunbrella upholstery fabrics make any space look stunning, with the strength to stand up to the elements and everyday use. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor applications, Sunbrella upholstery is water repellent, bleach cleanable and fade resistant, yet incredibly soft to the touch.  With a large selection of solids, patterns, textures and jacquards, the possibilities are endless. Coordinate upholstery fabric with awnings, umbrellas, drapery, and more.

fabric.Name: SUNBRELLA RENAISSANCE HERITAGE MOSS
fabric.Body: Building on our reputation for sustainable, high performance fabric solutions, we introduce Heritage _ a Sunbrella upholstery fabric featuring 50% recycled content. With a homespun look and extensive color palette, the fabric is an expansion of our existing Sunbrella Renaissance Collection of recycled products. Heritage is a blend of post-industrial recycled Sunbrella and Sunbrella virgin fiber that helps ensure that the product meets stringent Sunbrella performance standards. Because Heritage is made with 50% recycled content, there can be variations in color from lot to lot and even within a master roll. Slub yarns and fiber variations are part of the design of this product. There is a greater degree of variation in this product line than in others with blended fibers and slub yarns.

fabric.Name: SUNBRELLA SHADE SHADOW SAND
fabric.Body: Discover fabrics that filter light while adding style and privacy to indoor and outdoor areas. Designed for use in awnings, market umbrellas, privacy screens and architectural embellishments on gazebos and other outdoor structures, Sunbrella Shade Shadow filters and diffuses light and adds privacy or decorative embellishments without completely blocking the sun.  Sunbrella Shadow features a mock-leno weave in which space is locked into the fabric, limiting the amount of sun blocked. It also allows water to pass through for fast drying and prevents weight gain from water retention that can damage architectural structures.  Offered in a variety of colors, Sunbrella Shade Shadow coordinates with many popular Sunbrella solid awning and furniture fabric colors.

Designed for use in awnings, market umbrellas, privacy screens and architectural embellishments on gazebos and other outdoor structures, Sunbrella Shade Shadow filters and diffuses light and adds privacy or decorative embellishments without completely blocking the sun.  Sunbrella Shadow features a mock-leno weave in which space is locked into the fabric, limiting the amount of sun blocked. It also allows water to pass through for fast drying and prevents weight gain from water retention that can damage architectural structures.  Offered in a variety of colors, Sunbrella Shade Shadow coordinates with many popular Sunbrella solid awning and furniture fabric colors.

fabric.Name: SUNBRELLA RENAISSANCE HERITAGE ASHE
fabric.Body: Building on our reputation for sustainable, high performance fabric solutions, we introduce Heritage _ a Sunbrella upholstery fabric featuring 50% recycled content. With a homespun look and extensive color palette, the fabric is an expansion of our existing Sunbrella Renaissance Collection of recycled products. Heritage is a blend of post-industrial recycled Sunbrella and Sunbrella virgin fiber that helps ensure that the product meets stringent Sunbrella performance standards. Because Heritage is made with 50% recycled content, there can be variations in color from lot to lot and even within a master roll. Slub yarns and fiber variations are part of the design of this product. There is a greater degree of variation in this product line than in others with blended fibers and slub yarns.
