fire.Name: 44" SQ FIRE TABLE W/ECLIPSE TOP
fire.Body: Elevated materials set the tone for the 44 Square Fire Table. Its broad velvet-smooth ceramic top is heat resistant and features built-in slip resistance properties making it perfect for year-round use as a table top and focal point during warmer weather. Smooth transitional lines and luxurious matte river rock fire media add to the Fire Tables sophisticated exterior. Built with design and function in mind, the 44 Square Fire Table features over 60,000 BTU output and a spring loaded side panel with an easily retractable tank for ease of use.

fire.Name: ARIANA RUG, CHARCOAL, MEDIUM GRAY, TAUPE, WHITE 6'7"x9'
fire.Body: 100% Polypropylene Machine Woven Outdoor Safe Medium Pile Thickness: 0.47 High/Low Colors: Black, Gray, White Available in 2 colors Made in Turkey

fire.Name: ARK 40 FIRE ELEMENT / BONE
fire.Body: Natural hues, weatherproof materials and industrial design features combine to create an eco-friendly fire solution that is as striking as it is sustainable. With a wide lip to perch a drink on, and an unobtrusive shape that suits all types of decors and settings, EcoSmartÃ•s Ark 40 fire furniture creates an instant talking point even when it is not in use.  The round fire pit table is available in Ethanol, Natural Gas or Liquid Propane and comes with a toughened glass screen, decorative glass media and the Winter Bag/Summer Cover as standard features.

fire.Name: ARK 40 FIRE ELEMENT / GRAPHITE
fire.Body: Natural hues, weatherproof materials and industrial design features combine to create an eco-friendly fire solution that is as striking as it is sustainable. With a wide lip to perch a drink on, and an unobtrusive shape that suits all types of decors and settings, EcoSmartâ€™s Ark 40 fire furniture creates an instant talking point even when it is not in use.The round fire pit table is available in Ethanol, Natural Gas or Liquid Propane and comes with a toughened glass screen, decorative glass media and the Winter Bag/Summer Cover as standard features.

fire.Name: MESA 48" ROUND FIRE TABLE / GRAY TRAVERTINE
fire.Body: Robust urban styling defines the Mesa Collection. Mesa affords exceptional comfort and distinctive style. Versatility is an intended benefit, from individual groupings to sectional transitions, Mesa is the perfect compliment to any outdoor space.

fire.Name: POD40 FIRE BOWL IN NATURAL/BIOETHANOL BURNER
fire.Body: Inspired by the shapes and forms of traditional pottery, the Pod Fire Bowl Series brings a modern update to the classic fire pit. Its smokeless fire provides a warm and inviting outdoor centerpiece to gather around and relax in front of no matter the season. Colours: Natural, Graphite or Bone Fuel: Gas or Bioethanol

fire.Name: STIX BLACK POWDER COATED STEEL FIRE ELEMENT WITH AB3 BURNER
fire.Body: A fireplace with a contemporary twist on the traditional camp fire. Stix consists of varying sized tubular stainless steel 'sticks', creating a visually striking fire for outdoor or indoor. Available in Stainless Steel or Black Coated Steel.

fire.Name: STIX STAINLESS STEEL FIRE ELEMENT WITH AB3 BURNER
fire.Body: A fireplace with a contemporary twist on the traditional camp fire. Stix consists of varying sized tubular stainless steel 'sticks', creating a visually striking fire for outdoor or indoor. Available in Stainless Steel or Black Coated Steel.

fire.Name: WHARF 65 BIOETHANOL - NATURAL WITH BLACK BURNER
fire.Body: Ideal for courtyards, patios, pool decks and terraces, the all-weather, earthy design evokes the atmosphere of an open flame minus the by-products associated with a wood-burning fireplace. Its natural colour palette and the perfect blend of fire and stone make it an easy choice for landscape architects and design professionals.The low fire pit table is available in Ethanol, Natural Gas or Liquid Propane and comes with a toughened glass screen, decorative glass media and the Winter Bag/Summer Cover as standard features.

lounging.Name: ADIRONDACK CHAIR
lounging.Body: The Adirondack Chair by Jensen Leisure, provides the look and feel of outdoor relaxation with the piece of mind of sustainable Ipe wood outdoor patio furniture.  Sit back and gather your friends around to enjoy what the outdoors has to offer.

lounging.Name: ADIRONDACK CLASSIC CHAIR / NAVY BLUE
lounging.Body: The Adirondack Classic Chair is just that, traditional and comfortable and made for long sunny days and warm fireside nights. The recline and sit of this chair is relaxation perfected. Enduring comfort and classic design. Available in 15 colors.

lounging.Name: ADIRONDACK CLASSIC CHAIR / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: The Adirondack Classic Chair is just that, traditional and comfortable and made for long sunny days and warm fireside nights. The recline and sit of this chair is relaxation perfected. Enduring comfort and classic design. Available in 15 colors.

lounging.Name: ADIRONDACK CLASSIC LOVE SEAT / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: The Adirondack Classic Love Seat is relaxation made for two. It even looks like it's having a nice time on its own. The recline pulls you in and invites you not to leave. Available in 15 colors.

lounging.Name: ADIRONDACK CLASSIC ROCKER / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: Designed with a gentle swing and a soothing sit, the Classic Adirondack Rocker cradles you, relaxes you and it will rock you. Available in 15 colors.

lounging.Name: ADIRONDACK FOOTSTOOL
lounging.Body: The Adirondack Foot stool is the perfect addition to the Adirondack chair and provides the look and feel of outdoor relaxation with the piece of mind of sustainable Ipe wood outdoor patio furniture.

lounging.Name: ADIRONDACK SHELLBACK CHAIR - CHERRY
lounging.Body: The Adirondack Shellback Chair provides a fresh take on the classic Adirondack with a hint of inspiration from the sea and sand. Just the right curve and angle for taking it all in or tuning it all out. Take it easy. Available in 16 beautiful colors.

lounging.Name: ADIRONDACK SHELLBACK CHAIR - POOL BLUE
lounging.Body: The Adirondack Shellback Chair provides a fresh take on the classic Adirondack with a hint of inspiration from the sea and sand. Just the right curve and angle for taking it all in or tuning it all out. Take it easy. Available in 16 beautiful colors.

lounging.Name: ADIRONDACK SHELLBACK CHAIR - WHITE
lounging.Body: The Adirondack Shellback Chair provides a fresh take on the classic Adirondack with a hint of inspiration from the sea and sand. Just the right curve and angle for taking it all in or tuning it all out. Take it easy. Available in 16 beautiful colors.

lounging.Name: ADIRONDACK SHELLBACK CHAIR / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: The Adirondack Shellback Chair provides a fresh take on the classic Adirondack with a hint of inspiration from the sea and sand. Just the right curve and angle for taking it all in or tuning it all out.

lounging.Name: ADIRONDACK SHELLBACK ROCKER / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: Designed with a smooth rock and a soothing sit, the Adirondack Shellback Rocker cradles you, relaxes you and it will rock you.

lounging.Name: ALLUX LOUNGER/PC ALUMINUM/LARGE WHEELS/STANDARD BATYLINE
lounging.Body: One of the most popular MAMAGREEN loungers, with larger 'high-mobility' wheels highlighted. Features easy-handling aluminum frame and super comfortable Batyline sling, with optional cushion set.

lounging.Name: ALURA RELAX CHAIR/ANTHRACITE PC ALUMINUM/BLACK BATYLINE
lounging.Body: Those who thought that it had become quite impossible to bring out a really innovating aluminum range, are proven wrong by the ALURA. Royal Botania masterpiece is setting new standards in outdoor ergonomics! Available in three colors.

lounging.Name: ARTEMIS XL CLUB CHAIR, SOLD 2 PER BOX
lounging.Body: Artemis XL Lounge Chair is stackable and produced with a single injection of polypropylene reinforced with glass fiber, for indoor and outdoor use with or without cushion and non-slip feet. (Seat and back cushions sold separately)

lounging.Name: BALI CHAISE LOUNGE IN NATURAL TEAK
lounging.Body: Comprised of an upscale combination of sling material and teak wood, this outdoor chaise is perfect for luxury poolside seating. Features a sling shelf for holding towels and sunglasses.

lounging.Name: BEACHER FOLDABLE CHAIR - WHITE BATYLINE
lounging.Body: We cherish our roots! For years the Royal Botania name has been associated with fine teak furniture. That is why the refinement that they are known for is obviously found in the Beacher collection. Available in several colors of Batyline or Textile sling.

lounging.Name: BEACHER FOLDABLE FOOTREST - TURQUOISE BATYLINE
lounging.Body: We cherish our roots! For years the Royal Botania name has been associated with fine teak furniture. That is why the refinement that they are known for is obviously found in the Beacher collection. Available in several colors of Batyline or Textile sling.

lounging.Name: BLEAU STACKING CHAISE, REGULAR SLING, PC ALUMINUM FRAME
lounging.Body: - None -

lounging.Name: CABANA CLUB CHAISE LOUNGE/ALUMINUM FRAME/GRADE A SLING
lounging.Body: The Cabana Club Sling Chaise Lounge is offered in a aluminum frame that can be powder-coated in a range of colors and a plethora of fabrics, the Cabana Club Padded Sling Chaise Lounge is perfect for beside any pool.

lounging.Name: CABANA CLUB PADDED CHAISE LOUNGE/GRADE A SLING
lounging.Body: The Cabana Club Padded Sling Chaise Lounge is offered in a aluminum frame that can be powder-coated in a range of colors and a plethora of fabrics, the Cabana Club Padded Sling Chaise Lounge is perfect for beside any pool.

lounging.Name: CLIFF LIVING ARMCHAIR BEIGE ROPE/BEIGE CUSHION
lounging.Body:
The detailed armchair is supported from a steel structure with braided hawsers, emblematic sign of the elements of this collection.
The thin cushion is the breaking element that contrasts with other broad cushions of the collection that embrace the idea of cheerfulness and variety that the designers wanted to express with Cliff.

lounging.Name: COAST TEAK CHAISE LOUNGE
lounging.Body: Comfort abounds in this light and airy outdoor chaise sunbed from the Coast Collection. The lay flat mesh chaise is crafted of ivory canvas mesh, stainless steel and sculpted teak with mortise and tennon construction.

lounging.Name: COAST TEAK EASY CHAIR
lounging.Body: This modern outdoor easy chair from the Coast Collection is crafted of ivory canvas mesh, stainless steel and sculpted teak with mortise and tennon construction. A perfect occasional chair in the mid-century style.

lounging.Name: COAST TEAK LOUNGE CHAIR
lounging.Body: This modern style outdoor lounge chair with headrest from the Coast Collection is crafted of ivory canvas mesh, stainless steel and sculpted teak with mortise and tennon construction. Use with Coast Ottoman

lounging.Name: COTTAGE LOUNGE ARMCHAIR - WHITE - LIGHT GREY
lounging.Body:
The outdoor armchair of the Cottage collection is inspired by the farm’s porch and ranches, with high backrests and wide seats.

Powder-coated aluminum frame. The seat and backrest are supported by synthetic elastic belts coordinated with the color of the armrest rope. The cushions, padded with quick dry foam, are removable, easy to wash and weather resistant.

lounging.Name: CURVE CHAISE LOUNGE IN BRIGHT BLUE
lounging.Body: Suitable for in or out of the pool, Curve is sure to make a bold statement in any outdoor space. The Curve Collection is made from Rotoform, a waterproof, marine-grade polymer product. Curve chaise lounge is available in 14 bright colors.

lounging.Name: CURVE CHAISE LOUNGE IN BRIGHT FOREST GREEN
lounging.Body: Suitable for in or out of the pool, Curve is sure to make a bold statement in any outdoor space. The Curve Collection is made from Rotoform, a waterproof, marine-grade polymer product. Curve chaise lounge is available in 14 bright colors.

lounging.Name: CURVE CHAISE LOUNGE IN BRIGHT GREEN
lounging.Body: Suitable for in or out of the pool, Curve is sure to make a bold statement in any outdoor space. The Curve Collection is made from Rotoform, a waterproof, marine-grade polymer product. Curve chaise lounge is available in 14 bright colors.

lounging.Name: CURVE CHAISE LOUNGE IN BRIGHT RED
lounging.Body: Suitable for in or out of the pool, Curve is sure to make a bold statement in any outdoor space. The Curve Collection is made from Rotoform, a waterproof, marine-grade polymer product. Curve chaise lounge is available in 14 bright colors.

lounging.Name: DAISY MAE CHAT CHAIR (TEAK LEGS) CAT H
lounging.Body: Just like how being in a field of daisies brings back good memories  the DAISY collection is designed to create a summertime mood and enhance positive vibes.  The DAISY chairs and seater chairs are inviting, comfortable, and fun to look at.  The rounded barrel style backrest comes in two distinct versions: DAISY RAE which has a hand-fitted rope backrest developed for outdoor use and DAISY MAE which has a meticulously handwoven wicker back. Each version is available in four distinct colors, allowing you to create unique patterns from soft and natural to bold and vibrant.  Three distinct leg options are offered for the DAISY dining chairs, depending on style and function: tapered aluminum legs, a swivel base or teak round legs. With its sturdy powder coat base, the swivel versions are great for outdoor clubs, rooftops or high wind areas.

lounging.Name: DEWEY STOOL
lounging.Body: None

lounging.Name: EKKA LOUNGER / PC ALUMINUM FRAME AND STANDARD BATYLINE
lounging.Body: With a teak and powder coated aluminum frame, and signature EKKA lounger oversized wheels, this is a stunningly practical design lounger. Combined with body-supporting, comfy Batyline or Twitchell Textilene sling ; no cushion is necessary.

lounging.Name: ELIO HIGH BACK LOUNGE CHAIR - LINEN WEAVE
lounging.Body: Elio, referring to the Greek sun god Helios and designed by Canadian design firm Yabu Pushelberg, is inspired by the motion of light as it reflects and refracts on landscapes and objects. Multiple soft shades of yarn are woven into one strand, which mimics the hues of natural light and makes each chair unique. The handwoven seat in weather-resistant Tricord rope, draws inward to create a warm, intimate cocoon effect. The high back, deep seat and generous cushion make it perfect for daydreaming. The chair is framed by natural teak, which supports the seating shell primarily through the back legs that cross the shell.  Cushion is additional.

lounging.Name: FLIGHT LOVESEAT WITH GRADE A SLING
lounging.Body: Gentle curves in the seat and back exemplify the modern style of the Flight Loveseat. Sleek powder-coated aluminum frame is composed of smooth lines. Optional pads available in Suncloth fabrics.

lounging.Name: FLIGHT STACKING LOUNGE CHAIR WITH GRADE A SLING
lounging.Body: The Flight Lounge Chair is constructed of cast and extruded aluminum with a Versatex seat and backrest. A fresh combination of classic and modern style. Innovative use of materials, advanced engineering, and thoughtful design.

lounging.Name: FLORENTINE ADJUSTABLE CHAISE W/ WHEELS / GRADE A FABRIC
lounging.Body: Features a gorgeous and delicate design of a full round circle linking with two crescents. Lavish cushions wrapped in durable, color-lasting, and soft Suncloth fabric. Reclining back and wheels ensure this beautiful piece is also practical.

lounging.Name: FORUM LOUNGER CHAISE  WITH WHEELS / ALUMINUM / BATYLINE
lounging.Body: The Forum lounger has an excellent price/quality balance. The loungers are light, yet made of a very solid aluminium construction. The frame is powdercoated for optimal corrosion resistance and is available in different colours. The seat is made of Batyline which is reputed for its UV resistance, lasting high tension and excellent comfort.

lounging.Name: FREMONT SLING ADJUSTABLE CHAISE WITH ARMS / GRADE A SLING
lounging.Body: The Fremont Sling collection speaks to our customers' desire for luxury, function, and ease and instills a sense of warmth and comfort. The finely crafted aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

lounging.Name: FREMONT SLING LOUNGE CHAIR WITH GRADE A SLING
lounging.Body: The Fremont Sling collection speaks to our customers' desire for luxury, function, and ease and instills a sense of warmth and comfort. The finely crafted aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

lounging.Name: FREMONT SWIVEL ROCKER WITH GRADE A SLING
lounging.Body: The Fremont Sling collection speaks to our customers desire for luxury, function, and ease and instills a sense of warmth and comfort. The finely crafted aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

lounging.Name: GAYLE 59 INCH BENCH / RAFFIA WEAVE
lounging.Body: Designed for outdoors, the GAYLE BENCH is a versatile extra seat or footrest and blends easily with other patio or poolside furniture. Crafted from raffia with classic natural coloring, the bench is a sturdy, durable addition to any outdoor setting and is available in two lengths. Custom-crafted cushions add plush comfort and carefree enjoyment with water-resistant covers that can easily withstand the elements for years of use.

lounging.Name: HALEY 60 INCH TEAK BENCH, NATURAL TEAK
lounging.Body: With its beautifully classic latticework design, the Haley Bench evokes traditional French Country style. Made from plantation-grown teak, this bench is built to last and will be a statement piece in any outdoor space for years and years. Durable teak construction Sturdy mortise-and-tenon joinery.

lounging.Name: ILLUM LOUNGER CHAISE / ALUMINUM / BATYLINE
lounging.Body: The Illum sun lounger has not only an adjustable backrest, also the seat lowers itself to offer unmatched comfort. The adjustment system, a newly developed pump system, is cleverly hidden. Enjoying the outdoor life has never been this simple and comfortable! The powdercoated aluminium frame is easy to maintain. The Batyline seat guarantees a lasting high tension, quick drying and an excellent resistance to UV rays and fungi.

lounging.Name: KANTAN ALUMINUM LOUNGE CHAIR WITH SUN CLOTH STRAP
lounging.Body: Kantan Aluminum exemplifies the breezy spirit of Southern California, the birthplace of Brown Jordan and year-round outdoor furniture. This collection's graceful powder coated frame is offered with 1 inch Suncloth straps.

lounging.Name: KANTAN ALUMINUM LOUNGE CHAIR WITH VINYL STAP
lounging.Body: In honor of the company's 70th anniversary in 2015, Brown Jordan introduces a new edition of its iconic Kantan collection with mix and match frame finishes and 1 inch vinyl lace offered in twelve vivid colors.

lounging.Name: KOS TEAK LOUNGER, ADJUSTABLE
lounging.Body: Basic chic with an excellent, well-studied seating comfort is the best way to describe the Kos collection. The combination of the broad slats and the pure but powerful design, reinvents teak in a modern, robust way. TribÃ¹ uses only the very best Javanese plantation wood for its teak outdoor furniture. Its quality is locally controlled by subsidiary TribÃ¹ Asia.

lounging.Name: LINCOLN BACKLESS BENCH
lounging.Body: The Lincoln bench is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

lounging.Name: LINCOLN GLIDER
lounging.Body: The Lincoln Glider is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

lounging.Name: LOLLYGAGGER CHAISE
lounging.Body: The Lollygagger Chaise is intended for extended relaxing; even napping. The lighter weight of the piece makes it easy to move around with the direct rays of the sun. The back adjusts to six different angles to accommodate your level of relaxation.

lounging.Name: LOLLYGAGGER CHAISE - CLOUD WHITE
lounging.Body: The Lollygagger Chaise is intended for extended relaxing; even napping. The lighter weight of the piece makes it easy to move around with the direct rays of the sun. The back adjusts to six different angles to accommodate your level of relaxation.

lounging.Name: LOLLYGAGGER CHAISE - NAVY BLUE
lounging.Body: The Lollygagger Chaise is intended for extended relaxing; even napping. The lighter weight of the piece makes it easy to move around with the direct rays of the sun. The back adjusts to six different angles to accommodate your level of relaxation.

lounging.Name: LOW COUNTRY CUSHIONLESS LOUNGE CHAIR
lounging.Body: The distinctive Low Country collection lives up to its namesake, bursting with a wealth of styling and antebellum good taste.  Elegant detailing blends with the sturdy fundamental craftsmanship native to the Low Country Collection.

lounging.Name: LOW COUNTRY PORCH ROCKER
lounging.Body: The distinctive Low Country collection lives up to its namesake, bursting with a wealth of styling and antebellum good taste.  Elegant detailing blends with the sturdy fundamental craftsmanship native to the Low Country Collection.

lounging.Name: LOW COUNTRY SETTEE
lounging.Body: The distinctive Low Country collection lives up to its namesake, bursting with a wealth of styling and antebellum good taste.  Elegant detailing blends with the sturdy fundamental craftsmanship native to the Low Country Collection.

lounging.Name: MACKINAC LOUNGE ROCKER WITH GRADE B FABRIC/SELF WELT
lounging.Body: The Mackinac collection is suspended in a more innocent time. Enjoy simple pleasures within its open weave, deep seated comfort. The romantic styling of this collection is complemented by its bold woven framework and luxuriously comfortable seating.

lounging.Name: MAD CHAT CHAIR / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: Winner of the 2016 ICFA Design Excellence Award, the Mad Fusion Chat Chair offers Adirondack comfort in lounge seating, and expands personalization with several color combination options. 7 frame color options and 10 seat and back color options.

lounging.Name: MAD FOOTSTOOL / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: The MAD Foot Stool maintains the modern look and MAD comfort of our newest collection. It sets nicely up against the MAD chair while it supports your tired dogs.

lounging.Name: MADIRONDACK CHAIR / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: The MADIRONDACK is sleek and stylish. Cool and comfortable. The Adirondack, relaxified. A lower to the ground seat height reclining comfortably back to pull you in to a relaxing position. 10 color options available.

lounging.Name: MBRACE FOOTSTOOL
lounging.Body: MBRACE collection features a mesh-like triaxial weave with optional cushion sets. The footstool goes perfectly with all chairs in the collection and features an open-weave top and a solid-teak base. Available in colors Pepper, Spice, Atlantic and Arabica.

lounging.Name: MBRACE FOOTSTOOL IN PEPPER
lounging.Body: MBRACE collection features a mesh-like triaxial weave with optional cushion sets. The footstool goes perfectly with all chairs in the collection and features an open-weave top and a solid-teak base. Available in colors Pepper, Spice, Atlantic and Arabica.

lounging.Name: MBRACE ROCKING CHAIR IN ARABICA
lounging.Body: MBRACE merges DEDON Fiber seating and a solid teak base to create a unique range of cosy, cocooning lounge chairs. The rocking chair features a triaxial open-weave seat with optional comfortable seat cushions. Available in four color combinations.

lounging.Name: MBRACE ROCKING CHAIR IN BALTIC
lounging.Body: MBRACE merges DEDON Fiber seating and a solid teak base to create a unique range of cosy, cocooning lounge chairs. The rocking chair features a triaxial open-weave seat with optional comfortable seat cushions. Available in four color combinations.

lounging.Name: MBRACE ROCKING CHAIR IN PEPPER
lounging.Body: MBRACE merges DEDON Fiber seating and a solid teak base to create a unique range of cosy, cocooning lounge chairs. The rocking chair features a triaxial open-weave seat with optional comfortable seat cushions. Available in four color combinations.

lounging.Name: MONO CASUAL CHAIR / PC ALUMINUM / TWITCHELL UPHOLSTERY
lounging.Body: The MONO collection features one of the most casually comfortable lounge chairs with full wrap around Leisuretex all-weather upholstery means full support, comfort and no cushion necessary.

lounging.Name: NEW ENGLAND STEAMER CHAIR - TEAK
lounging.Body: The origin of the teak New England Steamer is based on the Adirondack chair. When updating this American classic, our focus was enhancing the functionality and level of refinement without disavowing its roots. Also available in red or white coated wood.

lounging.Name: NINIX 195 CHAISE/EP STAINLESS STEEL/CAPPUCINO BATYLINE
lounging.Body: The NINIX chaise is a combination of comfort and refinement. Offered in stainless steel and powder coated stainless frames with multiple color choices of batyline mesh fabric for the seat. Almost a pity to use outdoors.

lounging.Name: NINIX CHAISE/EP STAINLESS STEEL/WHITE BATYLINE
lounging.Body: The NINIX chaise is a combination of comfort and refinement. Offered in stainless steel and powder coated stainless frames with multiple color choices of batyline mesh fabric for the seat. Almost a pity to use outdoors.

lounging.Name: NINIX LOW BENCH/BRUSHED STAINLESS STEEL/WHITE BATYLINE
lounging.Body: The NINIX TWO SEATER is a combination of comfort and refinement. Offered in stainless steel and powder coated stainless frames with multiple color choices of batyline mesh fabric for the seat. Almost a pity to use outdoors.

lounging.Name: NINIX RELAX LOUNGE CHAIR/EP STAINLESS/CAPPUCCINO BATYLINE
lounging.Body: NINIX lounge chair is perfect for both formal and informal outdoor living. The hairline finish of the stainless steel frame and the durable batyline sling emphasizes it's ergonomic style. Almost a pity to use outdoors. Five color options available.

lounging.Name: NODI ARM CHAIR
lounging.Body: Light and airy, Nodi's silhouette is characterised by twisted-interlaced rope in weather-resistant Canax®, stretched across a precise geometric wireframe. Refined proportions and a minimalist approach to materiality lend a casual lightness to the collection. The slim profile of the arm is angled slightly inward in a welcoming gesture. The open weave in Canax, a combination of PVC and natural hemp, crosses in vertical and horizontal lines, providing shape and structure to the seat and back. Strong and durable, the rope work is also gently forgiving, adding to the ease and comfort of each chair.

lounging.Name: NODI LOUNGE CHAIR
lounging.Body: Light and airy, Nodi's silhouette is characterized by twisted-interlaced rope in weather-resistant Canax®, stretched across a precise geometric wire frame. A minimalist approach to lend a casual lightness to the collection. The slim profile of the arm is angled slightly inward in a welcoming gesture.

lounging.Name: NODI LOUNGER CHAISE w/ WHEELS / PC STAINLESS STEEL / CANAX
lounging.Body: The Nodi lounger combines minimalism with a casual touch. Light and airy, its silhouette is defined by twisted, interlaced rope in weather-resistant Canax, stretched across a slender, sculptural frame in powdercoated inox. The open weave in Canax, a combination of PVC and natural hemp, crosses in vertical and horizontal lines, providing shape and structure to the seat and back.

lounging.Name: PACIFIC SLING CHAISE, DK GREY FRAME/BLACK SLING, 2 PER BOX
lounging.Body: Pacific sun lounger without arms features a tubular frame in resin reinforced with glass fiber which is light weight and small hidden wheels make it easy to move around your pool, garden or terrace. Breathable synthetic fabric sling and stackable.

lounging.Name: PACIFIC SLING CHAISE, TAUPE FRAME/SLING, SOLD 2 PER BOX
lounging.Body: Pacific sun lounger without arms features a tubular frame in resin reinforced with glass fiber which is light weight and small hidden wheels make it easy to move around your pool, garden or terrace. Breathable synthetic fabric sling and stackable.

lounging.Name: PACIFIC SLING CHAISE, WHITE FRAME/BLUE SLING, SOLD 2 PER BOX
lounging.Body: Pacific sun lounger without arms features a tubular frame in resin reinforced with glass fiber which is light weight and small hidden wheels make it easy to move around your pool, garden or terrace. Breathable synthetic fabric sling and stackable.

lounging.Name: PACIFIC SLING CHAISE, WHITE FRAME/TAUPE SLING, SOLD 2/BOX
lounging.Body: Pacific sun lounger without arms features a tubular frame in resin reinforced with glass fiber which is light weight and small hidden wheels make it easy to move around your pool, garden or terrace. Breathable synthetic fabric sling and stackable.

lounging.Name: PARKWAY FLEX SLING ADJUSTABLE CHAISE WITH WHEELS
lounging.Body: Generously sized wheels add a surprising design contrast to the Parkway parabolic chaise. Advanced engineering allows the backrest to lay almost flush into the frame. Easy and convenient mobility fitted with comfortable, conforming sling.

lounging.Name: PARKWAY FLEX SLING MOTION LOUNGE CHAIR
lounging.Body: Extruded aluminum frame is UV resistant and undergoes a rigorous finishing treatment. Parabolic fabric conforms to different shapes, weights, and movements. Customize pieces to fit your space with many sling and frame color options.

lounging.Name: PARKWAY FLEX SLING OTTOMAN
lounging.Body: Pair with the Parkway parabolic motion lounge chair. Broad, sleek lines paired with a curved arch among the leg rest. Parabolic fabric is body conforming, making this piece useful as an extra seat or a footrest.

lounging.Name: PARKWAY FLEX SLING STACKING CHAISE
lounging.Body: Can be stacked four high for convenient space saving storage. Fitted with comfortable parabolic sling, available in various colors. Adjustable back for cozy lounging and luxury relaxation.

lounging.Name: PARKWAY FLEX SLING SWIVEL ROCKER
lounging.Body: Broad, sleek lines create the timeless extruded aluminum Parkway frame. Intricate construction and five step powder coating process ensure a long-life piece of furniture. Expertly forged to gracefully rock and spin in the comfort of conforming parabolic.

lounging.Name: PARKWAY STACKING ADJUSTABLE CHAISE / WHEELS / GRADE A
lounging.Body: Can be stacked four high for convenient space saving storage. Fitted with comfortable parabolic sling, available in various colors. Adjustable back for cozy lounging and luxury relaxation.

lounging.Name: PARKWAY STACKING ADJUSTABLE SLING CHAISE / GRADE A SLING
lounging.Body: Can be stacked four high for convenient space saving storage. Fitted with comfortable parabolic sling, available in various colors. Adjustable back for cozy lounging and luxury relaxation.

lounging.Name: PASADENA PADDED SLING LOUNGE CHAIR WITH GRADE A SLING
lounging.Body: Pasadena defines understated sophistication with its sleek profile. The collection frame features a smooth, flat aluminum extrusion that is gently curvilinear. Sweeping lines seen on the arms and back legs highlight the beauty of the chair's construction.

lounging.Name: PASADENA PADDED SLING SWIVEL MOTION LNGE CHAIR / GRADE A
lounging.Body: The Pasadena Collection defines understated sophistication with its sleek profile. The collection frame features a smooth, flat aluminum extrusion that is gently curvilinear. Sweeping lines seen on the arms and back legs highlight the beauty of the chair's construction.

lounging.Name: PASADENA SLING ADJUSTABLE CHAISE LOUNGE / GRADE A
lounging.Body: Pasadena defines understated sophistication with its sleek profile. The collection frame features a smooth, flat aluminum extrusion that is gently curvilinear. Sweeping lines seen on the arms and back legs highlight the beauty of the chair's construction..

lounging.Name: PORTSMOUTH 4FT BENCH / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: Benches are the ideal family seat. The Portsmouth 40 Dining Bench works well with the 56 inch Square and the 42 by 56 inch Portsmouth Dining Tables, or double it up alongside the 100 inch dining table for maximum seating options.

lounging.Name: RUBY ROCKER
lounging.Body: The Ruby Rocker is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

lounging.Name: SEASHELL BEACH CHAIR IN CHALK
lounging.Body: Open, light shapes and breezy outlines are merged with comfort and sturdiness in the SEASHELL collection from DEDON. (cushion is additional)

lounging.Name: SEAX FOOTSTOOL/BLACK FRAME/SAIL TAUPE TEXTILE (MTO/50 PC MIN)
lounging.Body: SeaX stands for elegance with attention to detail and a thoughtful approach to materials, textures and colors. Engineered for easy folding, this generously proportioned footstool features water resistant textile and powder coated die cast aluminum.

lounging.Name: SEAX LNG CHAIR, BLK/SAIL TAUPE/TEAK ARM ACCENTS (MTO/50 PC MIN)
lounging.Body: SeaX stands for elegance with attention to detail and a thoughtful approach to materials, textures and colors. Engineered for easy folding, this generously proportioned lounge chair features water resistant textile and powder coated die cast aluminum.

lounging.Name: SEAX LOUNGE CHAIR, BLACK/SAIL TAUPE SLING (MTO/50 PC MIN)
lounging.Body: SeaX stands for elegance with attention to detail and a thoughtful approach to materials, textures and colors. Engineered for easy folding, this generously proportioned lounge chair features water resistant textile and powder coated die cast aluminum.

lounging.Name: SOFTSCAPE STRAP MOTION LOUNGE CHAIR
lounging.Body: Characterized transitional styling, Softscape represents the innovation and refined aesthetics for which Brown Jordan is known. Softscape reflects the needs and preferences of design enthusiasts who are creating stylish interior and exterior spaces.

lounging.Name: SOFTSCAPE STRAP STACKING ADJUSTABLE CHAISE WITH WHEELS
lounging.Body: The Softscape Stacking Adjustable Chaise with wheels delivers quality with vast design customization. The Softscape collection offers casual sophistication, with clean lines that combine innovation, function and color. 22 frame and 12 woven color options.

lounging.Name: SONOMA 36 INCH BENCH / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: Rustic in strength, modern in design, the Sonoma 36 inch bench was designed to sit at the head of the Sonoma Gathering Table. When not used as a seat, it can also serve as a handy side table when your meal calls for a little extra space.

lounging.Name: SONOMA 76 INCH BENCH / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: Rustic in strength, modern in design, the Sonoma 76 inch bench features the unique X and modern trestle styling of the Sonoma Gathering Table. Designed for dining but can also stand alone in parks, pathways and lobbies or anywhere people need a place to rest.

lounging.Name: SPRITZ LOUNGE CHAIR (SOLD IN SETS OF 4)
lounging.Body: Spritz outdoor furniture collection, designed by Archirivolto Design for Vondom. The white wooden fences lining the beach, the small strips that follow each other, in their perfect geometry. Itâ€™s this picture that inspired the collection, which is composed of the stolen details to this inspiration.  Made of injected polypropylene with fiber glass. Stackable. Available in several colors. Item suitable for indoor and outdoor use.

lounging.Name: STILL ADJUSTABLE CHAISE WITH FLEX SLING
lounging.Body: Unwind on a chic adjustable lounge from the Still collection. Crafted of sturdy, lightweight aluminum and softened edges. Made with powder coated protection, sustainable through all-weather elements.

lounging.Name: STILL OTTOMAN WITH GRADE A FABRIC
lounging.Body: Versatile ottoman, ideal for resting legs or additional seating. Removable cushions for easy clean-up or replacement. Long lasting, durable, powder coated protection.

lounging.Name: STRIPE STOOL / ALUMINUM FRAME/ TEXTILINE SIDES / STAMSKIN TOP
lounging.Body: Stripe Stool is versatile additional seating that doubles as a side table, adding distinctive design glamor and interest. A comprehensive choice of textiles means MAMAGREEN stools coordinate beautifully with any outdoor setting.

lounging.Name: SUAVE SECTIONAL SOFA LEFT
lounging.Body: None

lounging.Name: SWIM ADJUSTABLE CHAISE WITH GRADE A SLING
lounging.Body: The Swim collection represents a fresh, light and sporty perspective for outdoor and casual living spaces with its linear profile made of powder-coated aluminum frames and Versatex mesh taut sling upholstery.

lounging.Name: SWIM LOUNGE CHAIR WITH GRADE A SLING
lounging.Body: The Swim collection represents a fresh, light and sporty perspective for outdoor and casual living spaces with its linear profile made of powder-coated aluminum frames and Versatex mesh taut sling upholstery.

lounging.Name: SWIM OTTOMAN WITH GRADE A SLING
lounging.Body: The Swim collection represents a fresh, light and sporty perspective for outdoor and casual living spaces with its linear profile made of powder-coated aluminum frames and Versatex mesh taut sling upholstery.

lounging.Name: SYM 72 INCH DINING BENCH / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: The SYM Dining Benches are perfect for maximizing seating options around longer dining tables. SYM color combinations provide virtually endless design options with a youthful modern appeal. Use for occasional seating as well.

lounging.Name: TIBBO 51x16 BENCH IN TEAK
lounging.Body: Featuring rounded sides and flat edges that mirror the dining tables, this premium teak bench offers great comfort even without a cushion.

lounging.Name: TIBBO 79x16 BENCH IN TEAK
lounging.Body: Featuring rounded sides and flat edges that mirror the dining tables, this premium teak bench offers great comfort even without a cushion.

lounging.Name: TIBBO BEACH CHAIR IN TEAK WITH WHEELS
lounging.Body: DEDON's first collection in teak, TIBBO combines meticulous craftsmanship, superior comfort and remarkable lightness in a design that's distinctive, elegant and pure. The collection conveys an exceptionally rich and luxurious feel.

lounging.Name: TIDES ALL ALUMINUM LOUNGE CHAIR
lounging.Body: The Tides Collection is form and function brought to the outdoors. Inspired by the beauty of the oceanâ„¢s movement, the curvilinear lines and shapes of the chair convey the fluidity of the tides. The curved elements of the chair are spaced evenly and repeatedly throughout the piece evoking motion. Narrow extrusions closely aligned and gently bending to support the human form exude ergonomic comfort. The collection is constructed with an inner and outer frame that allows the chair, ottoman and tables to be specified with contrasting colors. Sunlight passes through the slats, creating intriguing shadows as the sun moves across the sky. The Tides Collection evokes natures movements and our effort to bend it to our will with unique design.

lounging.Name: TIDES ALL ALUMINUM OTTOMAN
lounging.Body: The Tides Collection is form and function brought to the outdoors. Inspired by the beauty of the oceanâ„¢s movement, the curvilinear lines and shapes of the chair convey the fluidity of the tides. The curved elements of the chair are spaced evenly and repeatedly throughout the piece evoking motion. Narrow extrusions closely aligned and gently bending to support the human form exude ergonomic comfort. The collection is constructed with an inner and outer frame that allows the chair, ottoman and tables to be specified with contrasting colors. Sunlight passes through the slats, creating intriguing shadows as the sun moves across the sky. The Tides Collection evokes natures movements and our effort to bend it to our will with unique design.

lounging.Name: TOPAZ SLING CHAISE LOUNGE - NATURAL SLING
lounging.Body: The Topaz Chaise is created of 100% FSC Ipe solid heartwood timber by award winning Italian designers Edi and Paolo Ciani. A clean and contemporary piece to enhance an expansive outdoor patio, garden or poolside.

lounging.Name: TRADITIONAL ROCKER / STANDARD COLOR
lounging.Body: You don't need a porch to enjoy this Seaside take on an American classic. Graceful movement and solid construction combine to create a soothing experience. The Traditional Porch Rocker's high back and smooth recline are all you need to relax the day away.

lounging.Name: UNIVERSAL LOOM KEEPSAKE HIGH BACK PORCH ROCKER / GRADE A
lounging.Body: These popular Lloyd Loom products are designed to complement any collection. From bistro chairs and bar stools to porch rockers and pool chaises, customize your outdoor space with these handcrafted loom accessories.

lounging.Name: WAVE ADJUSTABLE CHAISE WITH FLEX SLING
lounging.Body: Constructed in extruded aluminum, its contoured seating surfaces twist in a ribbon-like profile, giving it a sense of motion and enhancing its shape. With its ergonomic seating it conforms to the range of human shapes, weights and also to movement.

lounging.Name: WAVE LOUNGE CHAIR WITH FLEX SLING
lounging.Body: Constructed in extruded aluminum, its contoured seating surfaces twist in a ribbon-like profile, giving it a sense of motion and enhancing its shape. With its ergonomic seating, Wave conforms to the range of human shapes and weights, but also to movement.

lounging.Name: WAVE OTTOMAN WITH FLEX SLING
lounging.Body: Constructed in extruded aluminum, its contoured seating surfaces twist in a ribbon-like profile, giving it a sense of motion and enhancing its shape. With its ergonomic seating it conforms to the range of human shapes, weights and also to movement.

lounging.Name: XQI 77 LOUNGE CHAIR/TEAK/BLACK BATYLINE
lounging.Body: What makes the XQI lounge chair exquisite. It's the perfectly balanced appearance in the warm teak wood and the superb comfort offered from the batyline seat. Batyline available in white, bronze or black.

lounging.Name: XQI CHAISE LOUNGER/TEAK/WHITE BATYLINE
lounging.Body: What makes the XQI chair exquisite. It's the perfectly balanced appearance in the way the stainless steel is nicely integrated into the warm teak wood and the superb comfort of the batyline seat. Batyline available in colors white, black or bronze.

occasional-table.Name: 20TWENTY 16 INCH ROUND BUNCHING TABLE
occasional-table.Body: 20TWENTY conveys a unique view of creativity, relaxation and balance for a new decade with 20/20 vision. Understated soft angles in the lounge seating surfaces and cylindrical tapered legs come together to create a welcoming and open style.

occasional-table.Name: 20TWENTY 16" ROUND BUNCHING TABLE / LUNA CERAMIC TOP
occasional-table.Body: 20TWENTY conveys a unique view of creativity, relaxation and balance for a new decade with 20/20 vision.   Understated soft angles in the lounge seating surfaces and cylindrical tapered legs come together to create a welcoming and open style.

occasional-table.Name: 20TWENTY 24" ROUND BUNCHING TABLE / LUNA CERAMIC TOP
occasional-table.Body: 20TWENTY conveys a unique view of creativity, relaxation and balance for a new decade with 20/20 vision. Understated soft angles in the lounge seating surfaces and cylindrical tapered legs come together to create a welcoming and open style.

occasional-table.Name: 20TWENTY 36" ROUND BUNCHING TABLE
occasional-table.Body: 20TWENTY conveys a unique view of creativity, relaxation and balance for a new decade with 20/20 vision. Understated soft angles in the lounge seating surfaces and cylindrical tapered legs come together to create a welcoming and open style.

occasional-table.Name: 20TWENTY LARGE 36" ROUND BUNCHING TABLE - ECLIPSE
occasional-table.Body: 20TWENTY conveys a unique view of creativity, relaxation and balance for a new decade with 20/20 vision. Understated soft angles in the lounge seating surfaces and cylindrical tapered legs come together to create a welcoming and open style.

occasional-table.Name: AHNDA COFFEE TABLE / GRAPHITE WEAVE WITH VULCANO GLASS TOP
occasional-table.Body: This coffee table complements both lounge chair and wing chair. It can also convert to additional seating by adding a cushion top.

occasional-table.Name: AHNDA COFFEE TABLE / WHITE QUARTZ WEAVE / LIPARI GLASS TOP
occasional-table.Body: This coffee table complements both lounge chair and wing chair. It can also convert to additional seating by adding a cushion top.

occasional-table.Name: AIKO MULTIFIT TABLE WITH WHEELS, TEAK FRAME AND HPL TOP
occasional-table.Body: With a sophisticated Italian 'high pressure laminate' top, this modern, contemporary design is a practical corner piece for any AIKO configuration. Stainless steel wheels afford the flexibility to also use alternatively as a middle or side table.

occasional-table.Name: ALLUX 17x17 SIDE TABLE / PC ALUMINUM FRAME AND TOP
occasional-table.Body: 100% powder coated aluminum combined with an elegant design and perfect proportions makes this the ultimate practical choice of lounging companion. The compact size suits commercial pool areas.

occasional-table.Name: AMALFI 20 INCH ROUND SIDE TABLE IN EPOXY COATED STEEL
occasional-table.Body: The Amalfi Side Table is handcrafted from solid steel. Pair the Amalfi Woven Side Table with our chaise lounge chairs for a luxurious backyard setting. (glass top not included)

occasional-table.Name: AMALFI 36 SQUARE COFFEE TABLE W/WOVEN TOP, EPOXY COATED STEEL
occasional-table.Body: This luxurious coffee table is handcrafted from solid steel and features a woven patterned table top. Use our table as is or place a piece of tempered glass or stone slab atop of the woven pattern.

occasional-table.Name: AMALFI HOURGLASS SIDE TABLE BASE - EPOXY COATED STEEL
occasional-table.Body: The Amalfi Hourglass Table is truly unique. Handcrafted from solid steel this side table features an hourglass base sturdy enough for a glass table top or stone slab.  (glass top not included)

occasional-table.Name: BOX OCCATIONAL TABLE
occasional-table.Body: Stacking table in recyclable polypropylene, for indoor and outdoor use. Available in seven colors.

occasional-table.Name: C TABLE WITH SLATTED TOP
occasional-table.Body: This simple yet sophisticated woven C table pairs well with any of our outdoor sofas. Made of our N-dura resin wicker over a durable, wrought aluminum frame, this versatile item is made to last. Also available in colors Slate Gray and Black Walnut.

occasional-table.Name: CABANA CLUB 34" SQUARE PATTERNED ALUM. COFFEE TABLE
occasional-table.Body: Contemporary in style, this Cabana Club Square Coffee Table features an aluminum base and aluminum top with precision cut details. The exclusive patterned design compliments any hospitality setting. This outdoor table is meant to be paired with modular pieces to create the ultimate space solution.

occasional-table.Name: CAHABA 24x24 END TABLE W/OYSTER BASE AND SLATE GRAY TOP
occasional-table.Body: The Cahaba End Table in Oyster and Slate Gray finish is truly a versatile outdoor accent table for any patio furniture set. The two-tone coloration allows this end table to blend beautifully with any outdoor furniture. Mahogany/natural finish available.

occasional-table.Name: CAHABA 47x32 COFFEE TABLE OYSTER BASE WITH SLATE GRAY TOP
occasional-table.Body: If you are looking for the perfect outdoor coffee table, look no further than the Cahaba Coffee table. This Slate Gray and Oyster finished table adds relaxed charm and refined style to any outdoor patio setting. Available in mahogany and natural finish.

occasional-table.Name: CALCUTTA 20 INCH CAST ALUMINUM SIDE TABLE
occasional-table.Body: Timeless and sturdy cast aluminum occasional table with woven bamboo aesthetic. Detailed hand finishing that is unparalleled in the industry. Smooth curves and lines extend the Chippendale-inspired elegance throughout each piece.

occasional-table.Name: CALCUTTA 24x42 CAST ALUMINUM COFFEE TABLE
occasional-table.Body: The Calcutta coffee Table features tapered legs and a lower x-stretcher continuing the exotic bamboo construct. Elegant and detailed aluminum weave top is hand finished to deliver a jewel-like product with heirloom quality and design.

occasional-table.Name: CALCUTTA 26x26 CAST ALUMINUM CORNER TABLE
occasional-table.Body: Timeless and sturdy cast aluminum corner table with woven bamboo aesthetic featuring a lower x-stretcher that continues the decorative bamboo fashion throughout the table base.

occasional-table.Name: CALCUTTA 36 INCH CAST ALUMINUM CHAT TABLE
occasional-table.Body: For smaller spaces this table encourages conversation with family or guests. Elegant and detailed aluminum weave top is hand finished to deliver jewel-like product. Lower x-stretcher continues the decorative bamboo fashion throughout the base.

occasional-table.Name: CARLYLE SIDE TABLE 21.5" RND / STACKING / ECOWOOD TOP
occasional-table.Body: Sleek and elegant define Carlyle from its seat and back to the graceful pedestal table. Carlyle features a functional stacking frame with a variety of seating options.  This stacking side table is made of powder coated aluminum with an Ecowood top insert.

occasional-table.Name: CORDIAL OVAL COFFEE TABLE - BEIGE
occasional-table.Body: Scandinavian and Mediterranean influences combine high quality materials with ergonomics in the Cordial collection. With comfortable cushions and sturdy woven backs, seating pieces invite relaxation.

occasional-table.Name: CORDIAL OVAL COFFEE TABLE - GRAY
occasional-table.Body: Scandinavian and Mediterranean influences combine high quality materials with ergonomics in the Cordial collection. With comfortable cushions and sturdy woven backs, seating pieces invite relaxation.

occasional-table.Name: CROQUET TEAK 24 INCH ROUND END TABLE
occasional-table.Body: The Club Teak End Table is an excellent outdoor end table that makes the perfect addition to your patio.

occasional-table.Name: DALA 38 INCH FOOTSTOOL/COFFEE TABLE
occasional-table.Body: DALA inspiration is from the artisanship and improvised seating arrangements of the developing world. A powder coated aluminum frame which DEDONâ€šs master weavers thread colorful strands of ecological weather resistant fiber.

occasional-table.Name: DALA 38 INCH FOOTSTOOL/COFFEE TABLE IN COLOR GRASS
occasional-table.Body: DALA inspiration is from the artisanship and improvised seating arrangements of the developing world. A powder coated aluminum frame which DEDONâ€šs master weavers thread colorful strands of ecological weather resistant fiber.
