occasional-table.Name: DALA 38 INCH STOOL/COFFEE TABLE / STONE / GLASS TOP INCLUDED
occasional-table.Body: DALA inspiration is from the artisanship and improvised seating arrangements of the developing world. A powder coated aluminum frame which DEDONâ€šs master weavers thread colorful strands of ecological weather resistant fiber.

occasional-table.Name: DALA STOOL/SIDE TABLE
occasional-table.Body: Lightweight and easy to move around. This comfortable, high DALA stool is great for casual seating or with its color-coordinated glass top, it can also be used as a side table.

occasional-table.Name: DEX 17.5 RD SIDE TABLE / STANDARD COLOR (sold in sets of two)
occasional-table.Body: The DEX Collection merges signature styling with modular flexibility. The round side table offers practically unlimited style and function and is available in six color choices.

occasional-table.Name: DEX 36 INCH SQUARE CHAT TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
occasional-table.Body: The DEX Collection merges signature styling with modular flexibility. The square Chat table offers practically unlimited style and function and is available in six color choices.

occasional-table.Name: DEX 40 INCH ROUND ROUND CHAT TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
occasional-table.Body: The DEX Collection merges signature styling with modular flexibility. The round Chat table offers practically unlimited style and function and is available in six color choices.

occasional-table.Name: EDEN D90 36 ROUND COFFEE TABLE-WHITE/TOP CERAMIC, Disc'd
occasional-table.Body: The round D90 coffee table by Eden has a powder-coated aluminum structure and a 6mm porcelain tile top for the white version and 12mm light grey fiber cement in the graphite version.

occasional-table.Name: FLIGHT 21 INCH ROUND OCCASIONAL TABLE WITH PYLON ALUMINUM TOP
occasional-table.Body: Flights clean lines and modern flares are constructed in cast and extruded aluminum. The innovative use of materials, advanced engineering, and thoughtful design is the perfect synthesis of classic and style with a modern twist.

occasional-table.Name: FLIGHT 28x45 COFFEE TABLE PYLON ALUMINUM TOP
occasional-table.Body: None

occasional-table.Name: FLIGHT COFFEE TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
occasional-table.Body: Gather around Flight coffee table for morning coffee or to relax and watch the sunset. Powder coated frame is sturdy, smooth, and available in multiple finishes. Available with your choice of glass or aluminum top.

occasional-table.Name: FLIGHT ROUND STACKING OCCASIONAL TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
occasional-table.Body: Flights clean lines and modern flares are constructed in cast and extruded aluminum. The innovative use of materials, advanced engineering, and thoughtful design is the perfect synthesis of classic and style with a modern twist.

occasional-table.Name: FREMONT 26 SQUARE OCCASIONAL TABLE / SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
occasional-table.Body: Brown Jordan introduces Fremont Tables, a collection that blends modern simplicity with formal elegance. Designed for outdoor use in any climate, Fremont's finely crafted powder coated aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

occasional-table.Name: FREMONT 26 x 43 COFFEE TABLE WITH SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
occasional-table.Body: Brown Jordan introduces Fremont Tables, a collection that blends modern simplicity with formal elegance. Designed for outdoor use in any climate, Fremont's finely crafted powder coated aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

occasional-table.Name: FREMONT 44 SQUARE CHAT TABLE WITH SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
occasional-table.Body: Brown Jordan introduces Fremont Tables, a collection that blends modern simplicity with formal elegance. Designed for outdoor use in any climate, Fremont's finely crafted powder coated aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

occasional-table.Name: FUSION 19 INCH SQUARE WOVEN OCCASIONAL TABLE IN BRONZE
occasional-table.Body: This innovative and contemporary design evokes an attitude of couture furniture while its bold profile generates international appeal. Fusion features a uniform and textural pattern that weaves the entire form into a solid structure.

occasional-table.Name: FUSION 28 SQUARE COFFEE TABLE IN BRONZE
occasional-table.Body: This innovative and contemporary design evokes an attitude of couture furniture while its bold profile generates international appeal. Fusion features a uniform and textural pattern that weaves the entire form into a solid structure.

occasional-table.Name: GLYPH 23.5 RD TEA TABLE PC BASE W/ PC TOP
occasional-table.Body: Introducing a new series of low, side and bistro tables: Glyph. For the sturdy base, we upcycle teak cut-offs,the top is made of a durable powder-coated aluminum sheet. These handy tables can be combined with a majority of our collections.

occasional-table.Name: GRAND TRAVERSE 43" OVAL COCKTAIL TABLE W/ LAY ON GLASS
occasional-table.Body: Crafted in our exclusive SunLoom vinyl, the Grand Traverse collection achieves lasting durability, ensuring endless seasons of comfort and conversations. Perfectly suited to the lanai, sun room, or front lawn, the Grand Traverse collection provides versatility to fit your lifestyle and adjust to the changing seasons in your life. Available in caramel or bisque.

occasional-table.Name: H 26" ROUND OCCASIONAL TABLE SLATE TOP
occasional-table.Body: The H collection by Toan Nguyen takes a classic mix of materials for a new spin by adding enticing curves and finishes, for a completely fresh look. Its 3-inch diameter rope create a dramatic, sculptural effect against the streamlined aluminum frames.

occasional-table.Name: HAMPTONS 43x25 COCKTAIL TABLE WITH LAY ON GLASS
occasional-table.Body: Versatility and understated elegance means the Hamptons collection is easily adaptable to multiple rooms and decor styles. Self-expression is a defining feature of this collection. Available in 20 custom Lloyd Loom Finishes.

occasional-table.Name: HIDEOUT STOOL, SIDE TABLE OR TANK COVER, BONE
occasional-table.Body: Hideout is a clean-lined accessory designed to house a propane tank or be a durable side table or stool. Available in a smooth, natural, graphite, bone or rust finish, hideout effortlessly matches the entire Brown Jordan Fires collection.

occasional-table.Name: JAYDU COFFEE TABLE / POWDER COATED ALUMINUM  / HPL TOP
occasional-table.Body: This larger coffee table goes with JAYDU sofa sets beautifully. Ultra modern, Italian high pressure laminate top compliments the progressive sofa design.

occasional-table.Name: JAYDU END TABLE / POWDER COATED ALUMINUM FRAME / HPL TOP
occasional-table.Body: This end table goes with JAYDU sofa sets beautifully. Ultra modern, Italian high pressure laminate top compliments the progressive sofa design.

occasional-table.Name: JUNO POUF / STOOL
occasional-table.Body: The Juno Pouf is a fun and functional piece that can be used with any collection as extra seating or ottoman. Juno Poufs are crafted with an aluminum fame covered with high density padding protected by a waterproof cover and finished with woven rope. The top is supported underneath by webbing to add extra comfort when used for seating. The Juno Collection of poufs are offered in two sizes and five lovely color options.

occasional-table.Name: LARGO OVAL COCKTAIL TABLE WITH LAY-ON GLASS
occasional-table.Body: Largos welded all-aluminum frames are corrosion-resistant and extremely durable. Made with 100% virgin vinyl and has no added ''filler.'' This assures the vinyl will remain soft and pliable through many years of use and will hold its shape. UV resistant.

occasional-table.Name: LOU 27x50 COFFEE TABLE W/TEAK TOP (MTO PRICE/QTY, 5 PC MIN)
occasional-table.Body: This coffee table consists of powder-coated aluminum frame and a tabletop of solid teak slats, helping to create a rich, complete LOU atmosphere.

occasional-table.Name: LOU FOOTSTOOL/COFFEE TABLE (MTO PRICE/QTY, 5 PC MIN)
occasional-table.Body: Combining traditional DEDON craftsmanship with fresh innovations in cushion technology, weave and material mix, the LOU lounge system takes outdoor lounging to a whole new level. Designed by Toan Nguyen, a master of modular systems, LOU was conceived from the ground up as a series of overlapping horizontal strata, with armrests defined by a subtle relief in the woven structure of the seat. Thanks to a semi-open weave and hidden gliders, the system gives an impression of extraordinary lightness, as if floating. And with the wide range of modules available, including a curved one for a special twist, it can be configured for any outdoor setting, however large or small.

occasional-table.Name: LOUNGE 43 INCH SQUARE FOOTSTOOL/COFFEE TABLE IN JAVA
occasional-table.Body: The LOUNGE collection rectilinear modules come together in an endless variety of seating arrangements, enabling you to create the perfect solution for an any outdoor environment. Thick cushions ensure maximum comfort from this minimalist design.

occasional-table.Name: MACKINAC 24x24 END TABLE WITH TEAK TOP
occasional-table.Body: The Mackinac collection is suspended in a more innocent time. Enjoy simple pleasures within its open weave, deep seated comfort. The romantic styling of this collection is complemented by its bold woven framework and luxuriously comfortable seating.

occasional-table.Name: MACKINAC 43x24 COCKTAIL TABLE WITH TEAK TOP
occasional-table.Body: The Mackinac collection is suspended in a more innocent time. Enjoy simple pleasures within its open weave, deep seated comfort. The romantic styling of this collection is complemented by its bold woven framework and luxuriously comfortable seating.

occasional-table.Name: MAD 18 INCH ROUND SIDE TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
occasional-table.Body: The MAD 18 inch round side table is solidly made to fit with any Adirondack from our collection. The slightly lower round top of this side table is the perfect height for effortless reaching from any seated position.

occasional-table.Name: MESA WEDGE TABLE
occasional-table.Body: Robust urban styling defines the Mesa Collection. Mesa affords exceptional comfort and distinctive style. Versatility is an intended benefit, from individual groupings to sectional transitions, Mesa is the perfect compliment to any outdoor space.

occasional-table.Name: MONO 59x29 COFFEE TABLE / PC ALUMINUM / ICE BIN/  TEAK TOP
occasional-table.Body: This amply-sized coffee table, with recycled teak top and a powder coated aluminum ice bin and frame, brings both warmth and convenience to outdoor entertaining areas.

occasional-table.Name: MOON ALU COFFEE TABLE / GRAPHITE
occasional-table.Body: The coffee table of the Moon outdoor collection has a rectangular shape with rounded corners that give it an elegant softness. The structure is in aluminium and the top in ceramic.

occasional-table.Name: NINIX 20 INCH SQUARE SIDE TABLE/BRUSHED SS / TEAK TOP
occasional-table.Body: NINIX side table is both minimal and maximal in material selection and refinement. The hairline finish of the stainless steel frame, the woodwork in carefully selected teak optimizes ergonomics. Several frame finish and top options available.

occasional-table.Name: NINIX 35 SQUARE LOW TABLE/BRUSHED STAINLESS STEEL / TEAK TOP
occasional-table.Body: NINIX low table is both minimal and maximal in material selection and refinement. The hairline finish of the stainless steel frame, the woodwork in carefully selected teak optimizes ergonomics. Several frame finish and top options available.

occasional-table.Name: NINIX 35x59 LOW TABLE/EP STAINLESS/WHITE GLASS TOP
occasional-table.Body: NINIX coffee table is perfect for both formal and informal outdoor living. The hairline finish of the stainless steel frame and the durable table top options emphasizes it's ergonomic style. Almost a pity to use outdoors. Five color options available.

occasional-table.Name: OCCASIONAL SQUARE TABLE
occasional-table.Body: Created of FSC 100%, solid heartwood, Ipe timber. A clean and contemporary array of Dining, Deepseating and Accent pieces to enhance an expansive outdoor room or a metro, compact balcony.

occasional-table.Name: OCEAN SQUARE SIDE TABLE/WHITE
occasional-table.Body: Ocean Side Table is made of durable weather-resistant resin. Non-metallic frame will never unravel, rust or decay. It is UV protected which insures the colors will not fade. Can be disassembled. For indoor and outdoor use.

occasional-table.Name: OPAL CHAT TABLE
occasional-table.Body: The Opal chat table is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

occasional-table.Name: OSLO COFFEE TABLE
occasional-table.Body: The Oslo stands for elegance and modernity. This collection perfectly reflects designer Luis Alejandro Blasiniâ€™s meticulous attention to detail and thoughtful approach to design and color.  Its sleek powder coated aluminum frames and the solid laser cut aluminum tabletops, give this collection its unique distinctive character. The exposed aluminum elegantly designed with comfortable cushions covered in Sunbrella fabric make for a luxurious outdoor ambiance.

occasional-table.Name: OSLO SIDE TABLE
occasional-table.Body: The Oslo stands for elegance and modernity. This collection perfectly reflects designer Luis Alejandro Blasiniâ€™s meticulous attention to detail and thoughtful approach to design and color.  Its sleek powder coated aluminum frames and the solid laser cut aluminum tabletops, give this collection its unique distinctive character. The exposed aluminum elegantly designed with comfortable cushions covered in Sunbrella fabric make for a luxurious outdoor ambiance.

occasional-table.Name: PANAMA SIDE TABLE IN BRONZE (MTO PRICE/QTY, 5 PC MIN)
occasional-table.Body: Its special charm is created through the contrasts in its design: the linear form is made even more striking because of the gently curving lines. With its no frills form the furniture of the PANAMA Collection attractively represents the New Edge Design.

occasional-table.Name: PARKWAY 21 INCH SQUARE OCCASIONAL TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
occasional-table.Body: Glass topped table with sleek, clean lines constructed of powder coated aluminum. Each table corner is highlighted with a pristine point. Four broad legs fall from the table top resulting in a modern but timeless design.

occasional-table.Name: PARKWAY 29 INCH CORNER TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
occasional-table.Body: A more spacious square tabletop that is topped with glass. Table frame is hand welded and personally inspected to ensure a jewel-like appearance. Once constructed and thoroughly cleaned, the piece is powder coated for a timeless finish.

occasional-table.Name: PARKWAY 45 INCH ROUND CHAT TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
occasional-table.Body: Broad strokes as if from a paint brush create the legs and frame of this high-end table. Features a gorgeous circular table top crowned with sturdy glass. Brown Jordan pieces have a cross-generation appeal due to their timeless design.

occasional-table.Name: PARKWAY MODULAR 35 x 35 OCCASIONAL TABLE
occasional-table.Body: This coffee table is a great addition to the Parkway Modular collection. Exceptional finishing with two layers of smooth aluminum top. Beautiful frame can be implemented amidst seating or on either end.

occasional-table.Name: POLYGON STOOL/COFFEE TABLE / TEAK TOP / PC ALUMINUM FRAME
occasional-table.Body: The Industrial Collection Polygon, by Mamagreen,  is chic, colorful and bold. The series showcases hardy laminated teak components, HPL tabletops and rough-welded aluminum parts. The frames are powder-coated for a robust weather resistant finish.

occasional-table.Name: POLYGON STOOL/SIDE TABLE/ TEAK TOP AND PC ALUMINUM BASE
occasional-table.Body: The Industrial Collection Polygon, by Mamagreen,  is chic, colorful and bold. The series showcases hardy laminated teak components, HPL tabletops and rough-welded aluminum parts. The frames are powder-coated for a robust weather resistant finish.

occasional-table.Name: PORCINI 16D x 20H SIDE TABLE IN CARRARA/TAUPE
occasional-table.Body: PORCINI is a collection of sculptural side tables as practical and versatile as they are delightful to the eye. Named after the beloved Italian mushrooms it casually resembles, PORCINI comes in three heights, two base styles and two elegant colors.

occasional-table.Name: PORCINI 20D x 16H WOVEN SIDE TABLE IN CARRARA/TAUPE TOP
occasional-table.Body: PORCINI is a collection of sculptural side tables as practical and versatile as they are delightful to the eye. Named after the beloved Italian mushrooms it casually resembles, PORCINI comes in three heights, two base styles and two elegant colors.

occasional-table.Name: PORCINI 24D x 11.5H SIDE TABLE IN MARRONE/BLACK TOP
occasional-table.Body: PORCINI is a collection of sculptural side tables as practical and versatile as they are delightful to the eye. Named after the beloved Italian mushrooms it casually resembles, PORCINI comes in three heights, two base styles and two elegant colors.

occasional-table.Name: PORCINI 39D x 10H COFFEE TABLE, MARRONE/BLACK TOP, MTO/30 PC MIN
occasional-table.Body: PORCINI is a collection of sculptural side tables as practical and versatile as they are delightful to the eye. Named after the beloved Italian mushrooms it casually resembles, PORCINI comes in three heights, two base styles and two elegant colors.

occasional-table.Name: PROVANCE SQUARE END TABLE
occasional-table.Body: As a complement to metal patio furniture sets, the Provance end tables feature a stunning double latticework surface and artfully contoured legs.

occasional-table.Name: QUANTUM 22 INCH SQUARE SIDE TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
occasional-table.Body: Quantum raised the bar and set a new standard for the casual furniture industry. Quantum has garnered international acclaim, including trade and industry award honors. Fluid lines are the distinguishing characteristics of this design.

occasional-table.Name: ROMA 18 INCH OCCASIONAL TABLE WITH CLEAR GLASS TOP
occasional-table.Body: Inspired by the city known for its great art, spectacular architecture and vivid sense of style, our Roma Collection has an easy elegance and just enough detail to create visual interest and give outdoor spaces a sophisticated lift.

occasional-table.Name: SATELLITE 16 INCH ROUND SIDE TABLE IN VULCANO
occasional-table.Body: The SATELLITE collection is elegantly simple, streamlined and modern. And with tabletops of scratch and moisture-resistant HPL and bases made from an innovative frost-proof ceramic, the collection is as practical and durable as it is pleasing to the eye.

occasional-table.Name: SATELLITE 16 INCH ROUND SIDE TABLE IN WHITE
occasional-table.Body: The SATELLITE collection is elegantly simple, streamlined and modern. And with tabletops of scratch and moisture-resistant HPL and bases made from an innovative frost-proof ceramic, the collection is as practical and durable as it is pleasing to the eye.

occasional-table.Name: STILL 28 INCH SQUARE OCCASIONAL TABLE / SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
occasional-table.Body: Enjoy this chic, square shaped occasional table from our Still collection. Constructed of sturdy, lightweight aluminum, ideal for residential or hospitality use. Finished with sustainable powder coating for ultimate weather protection.

occasional-table.Name: STILL 34 x 58 COFFEE TABLE
occasional-table.Body: Enjoy this chic, rectangular shaped occasional table from our Still collection. Constructed of sturdy, lightweight aluminum, ideal for residential or hospitality use. Finished with sustainable powder coating for ultimate weather protection.

occasional-table.Name: SWIM 27 X 27 OCCASIONAL TABLE WITH SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
occasional-table.Body: The Swim collection represents a fresh, light and sporty perspective for outdoor and casual living spaces with its linear profile made of powder-coated aluminum frames and Versatex mesh taut sling upholstery.

occasional-table.Name: TEA TIME 23 RD SIDE TABLE/ANTHRACITE ALUM/BLACK CERAMIC TOP
occasional-table.Body: The TEA TIME Collection by Frank Boschman. Low tables with a high degree of class. Low table available in 22 color combinations.

occasional-table.Name: TEA TIME 23 RD SIDE TABLE/TEAK/BIANCO STATUARIO CERAMIC TOP
occasional-table.Body: Low nesting side tables with a high degree of class.

occasional-table.Name: TEA TIME 23 RD SIDE TABLE/WHITE PC ALUM/WHITE CERAMIC TOP
occasional-table.Body: Low nesting side tables with a high degree of class.

occasional-table.Name: TEAK 24  ROUND CONTEMPORARY END TABLE
occasional-table.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

occasional-table.Name: TEAK 24 INCH ROUND END TABLE WITH TAPERED LEG
occasional-table.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

occasional-table.Name: TEAK 24x24 END TABLE WITH TAPERED LEG
occasional-table.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

occasional-table.Name: TEAK 40 INCH ROUND COCKTAIL TABLE TAPERED LEG
occasional-table.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

occasional-table.Name: TEAK 40 INCH ROUND COCKTAIL TABLE WITH SLED BASE
occasional-table.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

occasional-table.Name: TEAK 45x24 COCKTAIL TABLE WITH TAPERED LEG- ANTIQUE GRAY
occasional-table.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

occasional-table.Name: TEAK 48 INCH OVAL COCKTAIL TABLE WITH SLED BASE
occasional-table.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

occasional-table.Name: TEQUESTA COFFEE TABLE/ PIETRA TOP / STANDARD PC FRAME
occasional-table.Body: The essential form of a parson’s table interpreted for the outdoors in a wide range of finish and inlay top materials, Tequesta has your dining and occasional table needs covered. With thoughtful scale and proportions in a large array of sizes and applications, from coffee to communal counter-height tables, Tequesta is the quiet counterpart to whatever seating you select for it to accompany.

occasional-table.Name: TIBBO 41x55 COFFEE TABLE IN TEAK
occasional-table.Body: DEDON's first collection in teak, TIBBO combines meticulous craftsmanship, superior comfort and remarkable lightness in a design that's distinctive, elegant and pure. The collection conveys an exceptionally rich and luxurious feel.

occasional-table.Name: TOBAGO 36 INCH ROUND COCKTAIL TABLE
occasional-table.Body: The Tobago collection sets the standard for excellence in alternative deep-seated design. Full fluid lines ignite the imagination and enhance the look and feel of this boldly woven style. Tobago collection is designed to be memorable.

occasional-table.Name: TOPAZ ROUND COFFEE TABLE
occasional-table.Body: The Topaz Collection is created of FSC 100%, solid heartwood, Ipe timber. A clean and contemporary array of Dining, Deepseating and Accent pieces to enhance an expansive outdoor room or a metro, compact balcony.

occasional-table.Name: VENETIAN 18 x 18  OCCASIONAL TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
occasional-table.Body: Venetian's refined silhouette is highlighted by timeless Neoclassic details. The cross-stretcher is framed by elegantly scaled rectangular lines. Venetian easily accents eclectic living scapes that require a more formal design presence.

occasional-table.Name: VENETIAN 26 x 43 RECTANGULAR COFFEE TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
occasional-table.Body: Venetian's refined silhouette is highlighted by timeless Neoclassic details. The cross-stretcher is framed by elegantly scaled rectangular lines. Venetian easily accents eclectic living scapes that require a more formal design presence.

occasional-table.Name: VENETIAN 30 CHAT TABLE BASE FOR 36 TO 42 INCH ROUND TOP
occasional-table.Body: Venetian's refined silhouette is highlighted by timeless Neoclassic details. Venetian table bases allow you to choose a top that compliments your style and easily accents eclectic living scapes that require a more formal design presence.

occasional-table.Name: WESTERLY 24x17  END TABLE / STANDARD COLORS
occasional-table.Body: The Westerly End Table fits any style or situation. The ideal height for relaxing, no need to reach too far for what you are looking for.

occasional-table.Name: WESTERLY 24x17 BALCONY END TABLE / STANDARD COLORS
occasional-table.Body: The Westerly Balcony End Table fits any style or situation. The ideal height for relaxing, no need to reach too far for what you are looking for.

occasional-table.Name: WOODLAWN 17x17 END TABLE IN NATURAL TEAK
occasional-table.Body: Made from our high-end teak wood, this is the perfect simple, yet sophisticated outdoor end table to pair with one of our outdoor sofas our lounge chairs.

occasional-table.Name: WOODLAWN 48x30 COFFEE TABLE IN NATURAL TEAK
occasional-table.Body: Our marine-grade teak material, carved with subtle details, comprises this outdoor coffee table from our Woodlawn Collection. Perfect for adding a modern feel to your outdoor room.

ottoman.Name: ADIRONDACK FOOTSTOOL
ottoman.Body: The Adirondack Foot stool is the perfect addition to the Adirondack chair and provides the look and feel of outdoor relaxation with the piece of mind of sustainable Ipe wood outdoor patio furniture.

ottoman.Name: AHNDA FOOTSTOOL/COFFEE TABLE IN ELEMENTAL WEAVE
ottoman.Body: This footstool complements both lounge chair and wing chair and doubles as a coffee table when a tempered glass top is added in place of the cushion. Cushion and tempered glass sold individually.

ottoman.Name: AMALFI TUXEDO SALON OTTOMAN IN EPOXY COATED STEEL
ottoman.Body: Since our founding in 1955, we have been true to our dedication to create heirloom quality furniture. The price includes any standard Sunbrella Canvas, Rib or Dupione. Call us to find out how you can create your own Amalfi Living piece.

ottoman.Name: BEACHER FOLDABLE FOOTREST - TURQUOISE BATYLINE
ottoman.Body: We cherish our roots! For years the Royal Botania name has been associated with fine teak furniture. That is why the refinement that they are known for is obviously found in the Beacher collection. Available in several colors of Batyline or Textile sling.

ottoman.Name: CALCUTTA OTTOMAN WITH GRADE A FABRIC
ottoman.Body: Plush upholstered deep cushion constructed for elegant style, comfort, and durability. Exotic bamboo design forged in sturdy cast aluminum framing. Many Suncloth fabric color and pattern choices available to tailor the look for any atmosphere.

ottoman.Name: CORAL OTTOMAN - GRAY
ottoman.Body: The Coral ottoman is the perfect addition to the lounge chair for feet up relaxing. The ottoman is designed in all-weather wicker. The weave is on a commercial grade powder coated aluminum frame and the base is made of FSC certified Ipe timber.

ottoman.Name: CORAL OTTOMAN - NATURAL
ottoman.Body: The Coral ottoman is the perfect addition to the lounge chair for feet up relaxing. The ottoman is designed in all-weather wicker. The weave is on a commercial grade powder coated aluminum frame and the base is made of FSC certified Ipe timber.

ottoman.Name: EVO LOUNGER OTTOMAN / GRADE B
ottoman.Body: The Evo Collection is the perfect solution for functional and fashionable public areas ranging from conversation centers in lobbies to relaxing retreats by the pool. Designer Richard Holbrook created an elegant collection with subtly tapered legs and slight arch across the back of each piece. The Evo Collection features TropiKane® Basket or Vineyard Weaves and cushions equipped with Tropitone’s exclusive RELAXplus® technology to ensure durability. Evo is truly an evolution of style, design, and comfort.

ottoman.Name: FREMONT OTTOMAN WITH GRADE A FABRIC
ottoman.Body: This versatile ottoman from the Femont collection is ideal for resting legs or as additional seating. Removable cushions for easy cleanup or replacement. Crafted of weather resistant powder coated materials.

ottoman.Name: FUSION LOUNGE OTTOMAN IN BRONZE WITH GRADE A FABRIC
ottoman.Body: This innovative and contemporary design evokes an attitude of couture furniture while it generates international appeal. Fusion features a uniform and textural pattern that weaves the entire form into a solid structure. In Bronze or Parchment color weave.

ottoman.Name: FUSION OTTOMAN IN BRONZE WITH GRADE A FABRIC
ottoman.Body: This innovative and contemporary design evokes an attitude of couture furniture while it generates international appeal. Fusion features a uniform and textural pattern that weaves the entire form into a solid structure. In Bronze or Parchment color weave.

ottoman.Name: HAMPTONS LARGE OTTOMAN WITH GRADE B FABRIC/SELF WELT
ottoman.Body: The Hamptons collection is adaptable to multiple rooms and decor styles. Self-expression is a defining feature of this collection; the swivel rocker can stand alone or combined with any Hamptons collection piece to create intimate conversation nooks

ottoman.Name: HAMPTONS OTTOMAN WITH GRADE A FABRIC/CONTRAST WELTING
ottoman.Body: The Hamptons collection is easily adaptable to multiple rooms and decor styles. Free-standing sectional units can be configured as a continuous seating arrangement or an intimate conversation nooks. Available in 20 custom Lloyd Loom Finishes.

ottoman.Name: LARGO OTTOMAN WITH GRADE C FABRIC/NO WELT
ottoman.Body: Largos welded all-aluminum frames are corrosion-resistant and extremely durable. Made with 100% virgin vinyl and has no added ''filler.'' This assures the vinyl will remain soft and pliable through many years of use and will hold its shape. UV resistant.

ottoman.Name: LARGO OVAL OTTOMAN WITH GRADE B FABRIC/NO WELT
ottoman.Body: The Largo oval ottoman is ideal for propping up your feet or additional seating for entertaining friends and family. Made with 100% virgin vinyl and has no added fillers ensures that our vinyl will remain soft and pliable through many years of use.

ottoman.Name: LOUNGE 26X43 FOOTSTOOL/COFFEE TABLE (MTO PRICE/QTY, 5 PC MIN)
ottoman.Body: The LOUNGE collection rectilinear modules come together in an endless variety of seating arrangements, enabling you to create the perfect solution for an any outdoor environment. Thick cushions ensure maximum comfort from this minimalist design.

ottoman.Name: LOW COUNTRY OTTOMAN WITH GRADE A FABRIC/SELF WELT
ottoman.Body: The distinctive Low Country collection lives up to its namesake, bursting with a wealth of styling and antebellum good taste.  Elegant detailing blends with the sturdy fundamental craftsmanship native to the Low Country Collection.

ottoman.Name: LOW COUNTRY OTTOMAN WITH GRADE C FABRIC/SELF WELT
ottoman.Body: The distinctive Low Country collection lives up to its namesake, bursting with a wealth of styling and antebellum good taste.  Elegant detailing blends with the sturdy fundamental craftsmanship native to the Low Country Collection.

ottoman.Name: MACKINAC OTTOMAN WITH GRADE A FABRIC AND SELF WELT
ottoman.Body: The Mackinac collection is suspended in a more innocent time. Enjoy simple pleasures within its open weave, deep seated comfort. The romantic styling of this collection is complemented by its bold woven framework and luxuriously comfortable seating.

ottoman.Name: MAD FOOTSTOOL / STANDARD COLOR
ottoman.Body: The MAD Foot Stool maintains the modern look and MAD comfort of our newest collection. It sets nicely up against the MAD chair while it supports your tired dogs.

ottoman.Name: MAJORCA ALUMINUM OTTOMAN (cushion not included)
ottoman.Body: None

ottoman.Name: MBRACE FOOTSTOOL
ottoman.Body: MBRACE collection features a mesh-like triaxial weave with optional cushion sets. The footstool goes perfectly with all chairs in the collection and features an open-weave top and a solid-teak base. Available in colors Pepper, Spice, Atlantic and Arabica.

ottoman.Name: MBRACE FOOTSTOOL IN PEPPER
ottoman.Body: MBRACE collection features a mesh-like triaxial weave with optional cushion sets. The footstool goes perfectly with all chairs in the collection and features an open-weave top and a solid-teak base. Available in colors Pepper, Spice, Atlantic and Arabica.

ottoman.Name: OPAL OTTOMAN
ottoman.Body: The Opal Ottoman is designed in Ipe timber which is incredibly strong and dense, with very high wear durability. A handsome chocolate brown when new, the sun gracefully transforms Ipe to a mature, elegant silver patina.

ottoman.Name: PARKWAY CUSHION OTTOMAN WITH GRADE A FABRIC
ottoman.Body: Inspired by the golden era of Modernism, Parkway conjures images of a stately past. A broad, flat extrusion creates a smooth, pleasing touch and complements the frame's lengthy, slender profile.

ottoman.Name: PARKWAY FLEX SLING OTTOMAN
ottoman.Body: Pair with the Parkway parabolic motion lounge chair. Broad, sleek lines paired with a curved arch among the leg rest. Parabolic fabric is body conforming, making this piece useful as an extra seat or a footrest.

ottoman.Name: PARKWAY MODULAR SECTIONAL OTTOMAN WITH GRADE A FABRIC
ottoman.Body: Multipurpose as an extra seat, an ottoman, or can be used to create a chaise. Popular modern design built to create an almost infinite amount of shapes.

ottoman.Name: PHOENICIAN OTTOMAN IN POWDER COATED STEEL
ottoman.Body: The Phoenician Ottoman offers comfort and support in a handcrafted steel frame. Our cushion is covered in a Sunbrella fabric rounding out the beauty and quality of this piece. Pair it with our lounge chair or love seat to complete your patioÃªs retro vibe.

ottoman.Name: REFLECTIONS OTTOMAN WITH GRADE A FABRIC
ottoman.Body: Form and function of the Reflections Collection is perfectly balanced and the result is beautiful. The subtly woven details, built-in comfort and easy elegance are designed to melt stress away. Available in 20 Custom Lloyd Loom Finishes.

ottoman.Name: RUSTIC OTTOMAN
ottoman.Body: Our classic Rustic ottoman is draped in hand-woven wicker and adds comfort to wicker patio furniture sets. Pair with a Rustic lounge chair for ultimate relaxation.

ottoman.Name: SEASHELL FOOTSTOOL IN CHALK
ottoman.Body: Open shapes and breezy outlines are merged with comfort and sturdiness in the new SEASHELL collection from DEDON.

ottoman.Name: SEAX FOOTSTOOL/BLACK FRAME/SAIL TAUPE TEXTILE (MTO/50 PC MIN)
ottoman.Body: SeaX stands for elegance with attention to detail and a thoughtful approach to materials, textures and colors. Engineered for easy folding, this generously proportioned footstool features water resistant textile and powder coated die cast aluminum.

ottoman.Name: STILL OTTOMAN WITH GRADE A FABRIC
ottoman.Body: Versatile ottoman, ideal for resting legs or additional seating. Removable cushions for easy clean-up or replacement. Long lasting, durable, powder coated protection.

ottoman.Name: STRIPE STOOL / ALUMINUM FRAME/ TEXTILINE SIDES / STAMSKIN TOP
ottoman.Body: Stripe Stool is versatile additional seating that doubles as a side table, adding distinctive design glamor and interest. A comprehensive choice of textiles means MAMAGREEN stools coordinate beautifully with any outdoor setting.

ottoman.Name: SWIM OTTOMAN WITH GRADE A SLING
ottoman.Body: The Swim collection represents a fresh, light and sporty perspective for outdoor and casual living spaces with its linear profile made of powder-coated aluminum frames and Versatex mesh taut sling upholstery.

ottoman.Name: TIDES ALL ALUMINUM OTTOMAN
ottoman.Body: The Tides Collection is form and function brought to the outdoors. Inspired by the beauty of the oceanâ„¢s movement, the curvilinear lines and shapes of the chair convey the fluidity of the tides. The curved elements of the chair are spaced evenly and repeatedly throughout the piece evoking motion. Narrow extrusions closely aligned and gently bending to support the human form exude ergonomic comfort. The collection is constructed with an inner and outer frame that allows the chair, ottoman and tables to be specified with contrasting colors. Sunlight passes through the slats, creating intriguing shadows as the sun moves across the sky. The Tides Collection evokes natures movements and our effort to bend it to our will with unique design.

ottoman.Name: TOBAGO OTTOMAN
ottoman.Body: The Tobago collection sets the standard for excellence in alternative deep-seated design. Full fluid lines ignite the imagination and enhance the look and feel of this boldly woven style. Tobago collection is designed to be memorable.

ottoman.Name: VENETIAN OTTOMAN WITH CUSHION IN GRADE A FABRIC
ottoman.Body: Designed with neoclassic elegance in mind, the Venetian collection offers refined details with the comfort of deep seating.

ottoman.Name: WAVE OTTOMAN WITH FLEX SLING
ottoman.Body: Constructed in extruded aluminum, its contoured seating surfaces twist in a ribbon-like profile, giving it a sense of motion and enhancing its shape. With its ergonomic seating it conforms to the range of human shapes, weights and also to movement.

side-tables.Name: 20TWENTY 16 INCH ROUND BUNCHING TABLE
side-tables.Body: 20TWENTY conveys a unique view of creativity, relaxation and balance for a new decade with 20/20 vision. Understated soft angles in the lounge seating surfaces and cylindrical tapered legs come together to create a welcoming and open style.

side-tables.Name: 20TWENTY 16" ROUND BUNCHING TABLE / LUNA CERAMIC TOP
side-tables.Body: 20TWENTY conveys a unique view of creativity, relaxation and balance for a new decade with 20/20 vision.   Understated soft angles in the lounge seating surfaces and cylindrical tapered legs come together to create a welcoming and open style.

side-tables.Name: 20TWENTY 24" ROUND BUNCHING TABLE / LUNA CERAMIC TOP
side-tables.Body: 20TWENTY conveys a unique view of creativity, relaxation and balance for a new decade with 20/20 vision. Understated soft angles in the lounge seating surfaces and cylindrical tapered legs come together to create a welcoming and open style.

side-tables.Name: ALLUX 17x17 SIDE TABLE / PC ALUMINUM FRAME AND TOP
side-tables.Body: 100% powder coated aluminum combined with an elegant design and perfect proportions makes this the ultimate practical choice of lounging companion. The compact size suits commercial pool areas.

side-tables.Name: AMALFI 20 INCH ROUND SIDE TABLE IN EPOXY COATED STEEL
side-tables.Body: The Amalfi Side Table is handcrafted from solid steel. Pair the Amalfi Woven Side Table with our chaise lounge chairs for a luxurious backyard setting. (glass top not included)

side-tables.Name: AMALFI HOURGLASS SIDE TABLE BASE - EPOXY COATED STEEL
side-tables.Body: The Amalfi Hourglass Table is truly unique. Handcrafted from solid steel this side table features an hourglass base sturdy enough for a glass table top or stone slab.  (glass top not included)

side-tables.Name: C TABLE WITH SLATTED TOP
side-tables.Body: This simple yet sophisticated woven C table pairs well with any of our outdoor sofas. Made of our N-dura resin wicker over a durable, wrought aluminum frame, this versatile item is made to last. Also available in colors Slate Gray and Black Walnut.

side-tables.Name: CAHABA 24x24 END TABLE W/OYSTER BASE AND SLATE GRAY TOP
side-tables.Body: The Cahaba End Table in Oyster and Slate Gray finish is truly a versatile outdoor accent table for any patio furniture set. The two-tone coloration allows this end table to blend beautifully with any outdoor furniture. Mahogany/natural finish available.

side-tables.Name: CALCUTTA 20 INCH CAST ALUMINUM SIDE TABLE
side-tables.Body: Timeless and sturdy cast aluminum occasional table with woven bamboo aesthetic. Detailed hand finishing that is unparalleled in the industry. Smooth curves and lines extend the Chippendale-inspired elegance throughout each piece.

side-tables.Name: CALCUTTA 26x26 CAST ALUMINUM CORNER TABLE
side-tables.Body: Timeless and sturdy cast aluminum corner table with woven bamboo aesthetic featuring a lower x-stretcher that continues the decorative bamboo fashion throughout the table base.

side-tables.Name: CARLYLE SIDE TABLE 21.5" RND / STACKING / ECOWOOD TOP
side-tables.Body: Sleek and elegant define Carlyle from its seat and back to the graceful pedestal table. Carlyle features a functional stacking frame with a variety of seating options.  This stacking side table is made of powder coated aluminum with an Ecowood top insert.

side-tables.Name: CROQUET TEAK 24 INCH ROUND END TABLE
side-tables.Body: The Club Teak End Table is an excellent outdoor end table that makes the perfect addition to your patio.

side-tables.Name: DALA STOOL/SIDE TABLE
side-tables.Body: Lightweight and easy to move around. This comfortable, high DALA stool is great for casual seating or with its color-coordinated glass top, it can also be used as a side table.

side-tables.Name: DEX 17.5 RD SIDE TABLE / STANDARD COLOR (sold in sets of two)
side-tables.Body: The DEX Collection merges signature styling with modular flexibility. The round side table offers practically unlimited style and function and is available in six color choices.

side-tables.Name: DEX 36 INCH SQUARE CHAT TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
side-tables.Body: The DEX Collection merges signature styling with modular flexibility. The square Chat table offers practically unlimited style and function and is available in six color choices.

side-tables.Name: FLIGHT 21 INCH ROUND OCCASIONAL TABLE WITH PYLON ALUMINUM TOP
side-tables.Body: Flights clean lines and modern flares are constructed in cast and extruded aluminum. The innovative use of materials, advanced engineering, and thoughtful design is the perfect synthesis of classic and style with a modern twist.

side-tables.Name: FLIGHT ROUND STACKING OCCASIONAL TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
side-tables.Body: Flights clean lines and modern flares are constructed in cast and extruded aluminum. The innovative use of materials, advanced engineering, and thoughtful design is the perfect synthesis of classic and style with a modern twist.

side-tables.Name: FREMONT 26 SQUARE OCCASIONAL TABLE / SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
side-tables.Body: Brown Jordan introduces Fremont Tables, a collection that blends modern simplicity with formal elegance. Designed for outdoor use in any climate, Fremont's finely crafted powder coated aluminum frame is virtually impervious to the elements.

side-tables.Name: FUSION 19 INCH SQUARE WOVEN OCCASIONAL TABLE IN BRONZE
side-tables.Body: This innovative and contemporary design evokes an attitude of couture furniture while its bold profile generates international appeal. Fusion features a uniform and textural pattern that weaves the entire form into a solid structure.

side-tables.Name: GLYPH 23.5 RD TEA TABLE PC BASE W/ PC TOP
side-tables.Body: Introducing a new series of low, side and bistro tables: Glyph. For the sturdy base, we upcycle teak cut-offs,the top is made of a durable powder-coated aluminum sheet. These handy tables can be combined with a majority of our collections.

side-tables.Name: H 26" ROUND OCCASIONAL TABLE SLATE TOP
side-tables.Body: The H collection by Toan Nguyen takes a classic mix of materials for a new spin by adding enticing curves and finishes, for a completely fresh look. Its 3-inch diameter rope create a dramatic, sculptural effect against the streamlined aluminum frames.

side-tables.Name: HIDEOUT STOOL, SIDE TABLE OR TANK COVER, BONE
side-tables.Body: Hideout is a clean-lined accessory designed to house a propane tank or be a durable side table or stool. Available in a smooth, natural, graphite, bone or rust finish, hideout effortlessly matches the entire Brown Jordan Fires collection.

side-tables.Name: JAYDU END TABLE / POWDER COATED ALUMINUM FRAME / HPL TOP
side-tables.Body: This end table goes with JAYDU sofa sets beautifully. Ultra modern, Italian high pressure laminate top compliments the progressive sofa design.

side-tables.Name: JUNO POUF / STOOL
side-tables.Body: The Juno Pouf is a fun and functional piece that can be used with any collection as extra seating or ottoman. Juno Poufs are crafted with an aluminum fame covered with high density padding protected by a waterproof cover and finished with woven rope. The top is supported underneath by webbing to add extra comfort when used for seating. The Juno Collection of poufs are offered in two sizes and five lovely color options.

side-tables.Name: MACKINAC 24x24 END TABLE WITH TEAK TOP
side-tables.Body: The Mackinac collection is suspended in a more innocent time. Enjoy simple pleasures within its open weave, deep seated comfort. The romantic styling of this collection is complemented by its bold woven framework and luxuriously comfortable seating.

side-tables.Name: MAD 18 INCH ROUND SIDE TABLE / STANDARD COLOR
side-tables.Body: The MAD 18 inch round side table is solidly made to fit with any Adirondack from our collection. The slightly lower round top of this side table is the perfect height for effortless reaching from any seated position.

side-tables.Name: MESA WEDGE TABLE
side-tables.Body: Robust urban styling defines the Mesa Collection. Mesa affords exceptional comfort and distinctive style. Versatility is an intended benefit, from individual groupings to sectional transitions, Mesa is the perfect compliment to any outdoor space.

side-tables.Name: NINIX 20 INCH SQUARE SIDE TABLE/BRUSHED SS / TEAK TOP
side-tables.Body: NINIX side table is both minimal and maximal in material selection and refinement. The hairline finish of the stainless steel frame, the woodwork in carefully selected teak optimizes ergonomics. Several frame finish and top options available.

side-tables.Name: NINIX 35 SQUARE LOW TABLE/BRUSHED STAINLESS STEEL / TEAK TOP
side-tables.Body: NINIX low table is both minimal and maximal in material selection and refinement. The hairline finish of the stainless steel frame, the woodwork in carefully selected teak optimizes ergonomics. Several frame finish and top options available.

side-tables.Name: OCCASIONAL SQUARE TABLE
side-tables.Body: Created of FSC 100%, solid heartwood, Ipe timber. A clean and contemporary array of Dining, Deepseating and Accent pieces to enhance an expansive outdoor room or a metro, compact balcony.

side-tables.Name: OCEAN SQUARE SIDE TABLE/WHITE
side-tables.Body: Ocean Side Table is made of durable weather-resistant resin. Non-metallic frame will never unravel, rust or decay. It is UV protected which insures the colors will not fade. Can be disassembled. For indoor and outdoor use.

side-tables.Name: OSLO SIDE TABLE
side-tables.Body: The Oslo stands for elegance and modernity. This collection perfectly reflects designer Luis Alejandro Blasiniâ€™s meticulous attention to detail and thoughtful approach to design and color.  Its sleek powder coated aluminum frames and the solid laser cut aluminum tabletops, give this collection its unique distinctive character. The exposed aluminum elegantly designed with comfortable cushions covered in Sunbrella fabric make for a luxurious outdoor ambiance.

side-tables.Name: PANAMA SIDE TABLE IN BRONZE (MTO PRICE/QTY, 5 PC MIN)
side-tables.Body: Its special charm is created through the contrasts in its design: the linear form is made even more striking because of the gently curving lines. With its no frills form the furniture of the PANAMA Collection attractively represents the New Edge Design.

side-tables.Name: PARKWAY 21 INCH SQUARE OCCASIONAL TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
side-tables.Body: Glass topped table with sleek, clean lines constructed of powder coated aluminum. Each table corner is highlighted with a pristine point. Four broad legs fall from the table top resulting in a modern but timeless design.

side-tables.Name: POLYGON STOOL/SIDE TABLE/ TEAK TOP AND PC ALUMINUM BASE
side-tables.Body: The Industrial Collection Polygon, by Mamagreen,  is chic, colorful and bold. The series showcases hardy laminated teak components, HPL tabletops and rough-welded aluminum parts. The frames are powder-coated for a robust weather resistant finish.

side-tables.Name: PORCINI 16D x 20H SIDE TABLE IN CARRARA/TAUPE
side-tables.Body: PORCINI is a collection of sculptural side tables as practical and versatile as they are delightful to the eye. Named after the beloved Italian mushrooms it casually resembles, PORCINI comes in three heights, two base styles and two elegant colors.

side-tables.Name: PORCINI 20D x 16H WOVEN SIDE TABLE IN CARRARA/TAUPE TOP
side-tables.Body: PORCINI is a collection of sculptural side tables as practical and versatile as they are delightful to the eye. Named after the beloved Italian mushrooms it casually resembles, PORCINI comes in three heights, two base styles and two elegant colors.

side-tables.Name: PORCINI 24D x 11.5H SIDE TABLE IN MARRONE/BLACK TOP
side-tables.Body: PORCINI is a collection of sculptural side tables as practical and versatile as they are delightful to the eye. Named after the beloved Italian mushrooms it casually resembles, PORCINI comes in three heights, two base styles and two elegant colors.

side-tables.Name: PROVANCE SQUARE END TABLE
side-tables.Body: As a complement to metal patio furniture sets, the Provance end tables feature a stunning double latticework surface and artfully contoured legs.

side-tables.Name: QUANTUM 22 INCH SQUARE SIDE TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
side-tables.Body: Quantum raised the bar and set a new standard for the casual furniture industry. Quantum has garnered international acclaim, including trade and industry award honors. Fluid lines are the distinguishing characteristics of this design.

side-tables.Name: ROMA 18 INCH OCCASIONAL TABLE WITH CLEAR GLASS TOP
side-tables.Body: Inspired by the city known for its great art, spectacular architecture and vivid sense of style, our Roma Collection has an easy elegance and just enough detail to create visual interest and give outdoor spaces a sophisticated lift.

side-tables.Name: SATELLITE 16 INCH ROUND SIDE TABLE IN VULCANO
side-tables.Body: The SATELLITE collection is elegantly simple, streamlined and modern. And with tabletops of scratch and moisture-resistant HPL and bases made from an innovative frost-proof ceramic, the collection is as practical and durable as it is pleasing to the eye.

side-tables.Name: SATELLITE 16 INCH ROUND SIDE TABLE IN WHITE
side-tables.Body: The SATELLITE collection is elegantly simple, streamlined and modern. And with tabletops of scratch and moisture-resistant HPL and bases made from an innovative frost-proof ceramic, the collection is as practical and durable as it is pleasing to the eye.

side-tables.Name: SWIM 27 X 27 OCCASIONAL TABLE WITH SOLID ALUMINUM TOP
side-tables.Body: The Swim collection represents a fresh, light and sporty perspective for outdoor and casual living spaces with its linear profile made of powder-coated aluminum frames and Versatex mesh taut sling upholstery.

side-tables.Name: TEA TIME 23 RD SIDE TABLE/ANTHRACITE ALUM/BLACK CERAMIC TOP
side-tables.Body: The TEA TIME Collection by Frank Boschman. Low tables with a high degree of class. Low table available in 22 color combinations.

side-tables.Name: TEA TIME 23 RD SIDE TABLE/TEAK/BIANCO STATUARIO CERAMIC TOP
side-tables.Body: Low nesting side tables with a high degree of class.

side-tables.Name: TEA TIME 23 RD SIDE TABLE/WHITE PC ALUM/WHITE CERAMIC TOP
side-tables.Body: Low nesting side tables with a high degree of class.

side-tables.Name: TEAK 24  ROUND CONTEMPORARY END TABLE
side-tables.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

side-tables.Name: TEAK 24 INCH ROUND END TABLE WITH TAPERED LEG
side-tables.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

side-tables.Name: TEAK 24x24 END TABLE WITH TAPERED LEG
side-tables.Body: We only use sustainably sourced, FSC-certified teak in our teak furniture. Ideal for outdoor settings due to its high oil content and inherent strength. Our teak has an antique finish that will achieve a rich, silvery finish over time when left outside.

side-tables.Name: VENETIAN 18 x 18  OCCASIONAL TABLE WITH GLASS TOP
side-tables.Body: Venetian's refined silhouette is highlighted by timeless Neoclassic details. The cross-stretcher is framed by elegantly scaled rectangular lines. Venetian easily accents eclectic living scapes that require a more formal design presence.

side-tables.Name: WESTERLY 24x17  END TABLE / STANDARD COLORS
side-tables.Body: The Westerly End Table fits any style or situation. The ideal height for relaxing, no need to reach too far for what you are looking for.

side-tables.Name: WESTERLY 24x17 BALCONY END TABLE / STANDARD COLORS
side-tables.Body: The Westerly Balcony End Table fits any style or situation. The ideal height for relaxing, no need to reach too far for what you are looking for.

side-tables.Name: WOODLAWN 17x17 END TABLE IN NATURAL TEAK
side-tables.Body: Made from our high-end teak wood, this is the perfect simple, yet sophisticated outdoor end table to pair with one of our outdoor sofas our lounge chairs.

swings.Name: FAULKNER 78'' BED SWING EUCALYPTUS FRAME W/CUSHIONS
swings.Body: From the modern lines of the Percy to the traditional craftsmanship of the Faulkner. At Southern Komfort each piece of furniture is handcrafted from the highest grade plantation eucalyptus with a commitment to preserving the forests for future generations to come.  All Southern Komfort designs use modern day mortise and tenon joinery while also fastened with stainless steel hardware. Finished to suit any setting, Southern Komfort swings are perfect for a sunny lake house retreat, seaside estate with a view, rustic winery in the valley or a conversation piece in the lounge at a chic hotel. Southern Komfort swings are built for comfort and built to last.

swings.Name: GO PORCH SWING
swings.Body: Like so many full collections the GO started as a chair and grew from there. The GO collection was originally designed in 2006, but over the years we have continued to refine the appearance.  The rope included in this swing gives you 22" of length.  Please note that hardware for hanging the swing is not included.

swings.Name: HURSTON 93 IN PORCH SWING EUCALYPTUS FRAME W/CUSHIONS
swings.Body: The Hurston Daybed swing by Southern Komfort. The frame is made from FSC certified eucalyptus wood with a five inch foam mattress and two back cushions all covered in Sunbrella fabric. Custom sizing and frame finishes available. Rope sold separately.

swings.Name: KIDA HANGING LOUNGE CHAIR INCLUDING BASE
swings.Body: Stephen Burksâ€™ award-winning collection is as delightful to look at as to use. The hanging longue chair is the first collection to be wrapped rather than woven in 834 meters of DEDON Fiber Touch, and features a cradle-like organic form that's open, airy, light and inviting. Once inside, users can luxuriate in KIDA's comfy cushion, which covers the entire seating area, and feel, in Burks' own words, as free as the breeze when swinging.

swings.Name: LOLLYGAGGER PORCH SWING
swings.Body: Lollygagging just became more fun. Modern designs and zero maintenance with all of your porch swinging nostalgia.  Swing with a companion or solo in the Lollygagger Swing. As a piece of the Lollygagger Collection, 1% of the gross sales from this chair are donated annually to charitable groups.

swings.Name: LOW COUNTRY PORCH SWING NATURAL
swings.Body: The distinctive Low Country collection lives up to its namesake, bursting with a wealth of styling and antebellum good taste.  Elegant detailing blends with the sturdy fundamental craftsmanship native to the Low Country Collection.

swings.Name: PERCY 75 INCH BED SWING WITH CUSHIONS/EUCALYPTUS FRAME
swings.Body: From the modern lines of the Percy to the traditional craftsmanship of the Faulkner. At Southern Komfort each piece of furniture is handcrafted from the highest grade plantation eucalyptus with a commitment to preserving the forests for future generations to come.  All Southern Komfort designs use modern day mortise and tenon joinery while also fastened with stainless steel hardware. Finished to suit any setting, Southern Komfort swings are perfect for a sunny lake house retreat, seaside estate with a view, rustic winery in the valley or a conversation piece in the lounge at a chic hotel. Southern Komfort swings are built for comfort and built to last.

swings.Name: ROPE SWING
swings.Body: We went back and forth on this one, but ultimately decided this rope swing is truly the lollygaggerâ€™s dream. It includes a 5-foot black nylon rope that comes attached to a durable seat made from recycled plastic. The swingâ€™s ropes are fashioned with a pair of rings to attach the swing to a tree or beam of your choice. (Because every installation is different, we recommend using threaded chain links and chain as needed to set your swing at the desired height and also to help level the seat. Instructions included.)

swings.Name: SWINGREST HANGING LOUNGER IN NATURAL
swings.Body: SWINGREST is the ultimate hanging daybed perfect for suspending on a terrace, veranda or even indoors. Inspired by the high-ceilings of the villas at DEDON ISLAND, this hanging lounger, with its convenient suspension system, is as at home indoors as out.

umbrella.Name: ICARUS UX SAND 9'10" CANTILEVER W/ SAND CANOPY
umbrella.Body:
Nature as a source of inspiration
The leaf-shaped Icarus UX umbrella is unique in all its aspects. The parasol stands out because of its shape, elegance and extreme wind resistance. Thanks to the built-in rotating mechanism, the parasol rotates 360° around its axis, allowing you to create shadow wherever you want. If you position the canopy vertically, you are completely sheltered from the wind. The design team has focused on sustainability and ultimate ease of use, with all parts being sourced locally. The height of the leaf can be easily adjusted and installation is extremely simple.

umbrella.Name: PARAFLEX 8'10" HEX / NEO ARM / COLORUM CANOPY
umbrella.Body:
Nothing beats the versatility of the human body. As a result, for the Paraflex, we let ourselves be inspired by the manoeuvrability and strength of the human arm. A space-saving umbrella, without a base and without a pole, which offers you the possibility to create shade wherever you want it, by means of one, two or more umbrellas, according to your needs. The light and compact Paraflex offers maximum shade and is highly wind-resistant.

The Paraflex collection consists of 4 models – 2 round models: 105" and 118" and 2 square models: 6' and 7.5'. The umbrellas can be wall mounted aswell as pole mounted, up to 5 umbrellas on 1 pole.

umbrella.Name: INFINA UX SAND 8'2" SQUARE CENTER POLE
umbrella.Body: The Infina UX collection stands out through its simplicity and class: a center pole parasol without a heavy structure. This parasol is extremely flexible thanks to its mobile parasol base and can be easily moved for maximum shade. The Infina UX comes fully to its right in any urban or bohemian environment where organic and frivolous accents are important. A charming city garden, a hip bar, a sleek pool house or a trendy restaurant: it's all possible. The Infina UX is available in Sand.

umbrella.Name: ICARUS ALU FRAME 9'10" W/SOLIDIUM CANOPY
umbrella.Body: With its Icarus, Umbrosa kills two birds with one stone. Inspired by nature, we designed an umbrella that at the same time can be used as a windscreen. The Icarus embraces and protects. It creates the safe security of a cocoon, while you can enjoy the beautiful weather to the fullest.

umbrella.Name: MONTEREY 7.5 OCT UMBRELLA / CRANK / AUTO TILT / A FABRIC
umbrella.Body: This solid fiberglass market umbrella is manufactured using the most resilient materials available. The half-inch thick fiberglass ribs allow the frame to bend and flex easily in windy conditions, while the durable aluminum center pole, and maintenance-free resin and stainless-steel parts ensure this umbrella will provide years of worry-free shade. Choose from a heavy gauge pulley system, sturdy crank no-tilt, or industry-best crank auto tilt. Available in six sizes and seven beautiful frame finishes, the Monterey is designed to allow you to bring commercial durability home to your cherished outdoor living space.  Additional sizes available.  Umbrella base is additional.

umbrella.Name: NOVA 16' OCTAGON TELESCOPING GRADE A
umbrella.Body: The Nova offers maximum shade and weather protection for commercial environments. Reinforced extruded aluminum ribs connect to an impressive 4-inch mast supporting a 9 oz. marine grade acrylic canopy. The Nova is exceptionally designed to withstand harsh conditions while being virtually maintenance free. A commercial grade telescopic crank allows you to completely close the umbrella without the burden of moving furniture underneath. Umbrellas comparable to the Nova in size and weight almost always require a permanent installation. The Nova is one of the only large shade structures in the industry with a semi-permanent and non-permanent mount available.  Umbrella base is additional.

umbrella.Name: ECLIPSE 10 SQ CANTILEVER UMBERLLA / MATTE SILVER FINISH / GRADE A
umbrella.Body: This elegant and modern heavy-duty in-ground cantilever umbrella is the ultimate choice for outdoor living and entertaining in both residential and commercial environments. It combines style with strength, size, and durability. With its Infinity Tilt and 360Â° rotation, the EclipseÂ® provides complete shade flexibility.  Additional sizes available.  Umbrella base is additional.

umbrella.Name: AURORA 11' OCT CANTILEVER CRANK MATTE SILVER W/TILT GRADE A
umbrella.Body: Maximize your space without a traditional center post. The Aurora is manufactured using industry best materials and fabric available to provide many years of trouble-free use and enjoyment. Its Infinity Tilt allows you to change positions effortlessly. This modern cantilever is suitable for use in low to moderate wind conditions and ensures hours of protection from the sun and light rain.  Umbrella base is additional.
